Tom Wjw aal gvla Nyiai aal pengkongam mwv so haadvn

Tom ar komcam Tenis soodwn
Tom wmam swwxo lvgab miqbyuqdvn

Tom Meeri hoqgv pui xeqlwqnam ak nvvrwqnum
Tom toxnamam birwqram hvl bel doonum
Tom edin dvnamam dvyok hvnamam tamanum
Tom moodgob hog gokam od abin mab doonum
Ngoqg twnk jisam jitwk hvl Tom ngam hvraqb bepajinum
Issho iky holwgboam Tom seelin kunum
Tom kiir circwrnamam odmabwk hvl betornum
Tom boon nyinam hoqgv Lwb Poolwg 20, 2013 ho doonu kunum
Tom nyi dookho hookur kunum
Tom ayam ai ywwlywngam haadkun
Tom atwg copi aaxiam ramnum
Tom atwg vj koonamam tiql apnum

Tom mwv cengdo hogam Meeri pvvsdvn hvl benum
Tom mwv pwplo camleq vnyigo naadvb nyido hvl benum

Tom mwwg lvgab wwbabo ajin meeg doolo alpa hvl benum

Tom alv lvko sutwl kvrtaq nanho doonum
Tom doabanv ho pota ham poorynum

Tom Meerig bwyirjaqho doonum
Tom lwumgo doolarv pvvkumnum
Tom Meeri mwwg dookub haadunamam kaapanum

Tom kedho hog ak kaapanum
Ngo Pranc agam ham poorykindo hvl Tom benum
Tom Bostanamam mwwbyma hvl benum
Hoq gab swmw ho pil sam dvl swyu dvb mwto,Mwg dvnamv alub dvl swnum hvb mab swyu kuma ‚Äù
Ceenlaq nam agum: no attv hogv dog dvn do doto 
Ceenalq bo Nyi
Nyi tulw nge ceenalq bo nyi awk dokwv hwdq naam,
lwxiam mwam buluwg vs-axaqngam sortam nam 
Algolo mvw bulam mwwnyir bo gon awk betamnam, ho bulv awchjabv nyirnam 
Anyo kokw ho,
mvw bulam ho mwwnyir bo gon akin nam harav betamana, nyi atta anyio gw nyirka teqnem 
Hwdlo ho mwwnyir bo gon akin nam lwoum deeb bedho,bulew heyekaam nyirqma 
Ceenlaq bo nyi ake nyirs nam, ho bulam benam:
Nulew mwwnyir bo gon akin nam nyirdar-nyirdar nyioma tel 
Hogub nulew loxiam vs-axaq akin gab hevdwden 
Ceenlaq nam agum: Mwwdwq dwqnamme vs-axaq ngam alov mwgram, hemabdew mood ngam la ator ram nyiyum ewpaq tai 
Larnbo Opu
Al logolo, opu awk dwnum ho mvw anyia ngam vch larqnum 
Ho opu hog akinchi mlwg manam mew mvw kaac bo taa gvnbo nwmw koc ho swnam 
Alloxiam,
Opu ake,taa gvnbo nwmw akem bej-beparnam, hebmvw taa gvnbo nwmw ake hoggokam birw manam,
mwlw asaq svvn tuluw nge Opu akham kalaq tese mvwnam,
Hebmwvde, opu ake mvw anyia ngam bigy num 
Dwr pool ho,
Boolu ho sokam mw pwtw yekum,
svvn tuluq gam issn doma kunam 
Opu ake sengrum dukho 
Mvw kanum, pvta pwdw nge xiibu hogge iss twdeb hogv taa gvnbo nwmw hoge 
Mvw hvnywnam,
Hvbgekam, mvwe taa gvnbo nwmw ham iss lak jwtv hel benam 
Anya boTaa gvnbo nwmw loolwqnam ajin hev ho bwnge hwntor ja dwr pool ho 
Albo Agum:Hwdlokam nyiyam kanyw jemav bulv huguv kaaden 
Pensil ge gon
Raj mvw mwwdwq mvnam hogav heniylo mvw English ge poorynam alev nyima num 
Mvw xoox ann hew mvw bayium ho donum,
ho mvwm pensil awk jinum 
Haandar mwam Raj mvw xoox ann kaagabnam, ho mvw benum ngo soqv pensil sam nadev nyikma ngo hog poorye al kuma 
Mvw xoox ann benam,
No sogw pensil soge naleq luxi-dwnd cintayin hoguv benlo sogw pensil si nag hen nyiden 
Mvwe cengpapa vc jaqnam pwreqnam mam,
Nogw english poory ho almab cengpaq nam heb kalam 
Hvbjaqkukam,
Pensil mvwe nam svkatayin albo iskul himybv nyinuv 
Pensil mvwg albo nge mvwg ateqge urew ho hadewn 
Hebkelam nokam attor kapatayin sogq hvntoor sowqge 
Ho ayitwr ayinya ho,
Sogw pensil hoguv muxden hvvkelam nokam muxtayin,
Nokam mvwg hekelam muxw appaq tayin luxi-dwad nogq nyites mvvnam ho' 
Raj mvwg nyibia jagb met mvlana atwam, hoge mvw dingrnam atwam alev swdeb 
Albo Agum:Ngul mwlwngv ator doodad ngule hoguv swnev den 
Paca bo Svdam
Al Puqnbo mvw al poochv ngam svdam mvwm baqwam tel kwm kor mvk looxiam al putav wknum 
Lamta ho pobu hocw bo awk epeq num 
Algolo svdum mvwe cingmapaq iss bobu ho yoql num hoge al ge poochv ngam iss ho yoqle pan 
Ale iss laqav mvyo mvco yukam ho al poochi nge badev hvrab kunam 
Ho svdum mvwe havmp num 
Hoge svdum dore looxiam hev kedwa nyiruv paaku 
Ho al puqnbo atw doore svdum nyinam mam cingpa tukwl mvwe namjade nyiswrdav nyipa 
Logwn ho atw doore coopwpa poochi ngam svdum gw lamkw ho bwavbam num 
Svdum doore herav ho sur ngam ngipa mvw megamme baqdev harav tai mvwepa 
Hebmwv coopwpa poochi nge juja yukam hoya-hoya vqw dukho svdum doore vchv hentwr kuna 
Ho svdun mvwe hander paku 
Hoge mvwe hoq sur ham nyikmanum 
Hoge al puqnho attv mvwe hemp kunam 
Albo niten: xijiqname looxiam mwwsw maden 
Albo Agum: xijiqname looxiam mwwsw maden 
Svv ngvla Paat
Svv vpy nyoro ho miipap salap nyook koc ho donum 
Bule alov ja ajin hoge lux-dedam lokuv nyiyin num 
Bule lokum deyin teyin lai dobum num,
Hogam paat la sonyi nyot bulam denyw madum 
Hvbmabde allogo,
Bul ajine ywlu domin sulayil asaq nyok ho des detav vnum 
Paat la sonyi nyote ham kapatel mevnum he alja modw go svv bulam mengel dedev 
Bule nwmw ureq ho kaslil dotel svv ngam loum dwb mengyum kunam,
Akin akin bw 
Taguv se agum: Lokumv doname attore 
Svt la Ajin
Akin chewnye Svt mvwe nyoro ho ajin Mega lenum 
Mvwe Seby kapatel tanum,
"No ngog ajin swta yinrew seb no?"
"no poot jagq pa ngog hem svvn tolo bigl doong ram 
Hogab ngo ngog lagav ajin nyoram",
Seby benum 
Hoge svt mvwe buut kubu ngam vpeq layil tanum, no ngag ajin swtanyin yeh? 
"No poot jagq pa ngog ung ho hawang ram 
No ngogam ajin nyoram",
buut kubu nge bingrenum 
Hoge svt mvwe tvtwq kaam vpeq layil tanum, no ngag ajin swtanyin yeh? 
Tvtwg ge benum,
"No poot layil vgw japa,
No ngog hev juqram nyioram 
Ngam apaq jetuv,
Hvbmabde no ngog ajin swyin ram" 
Hoge svt mvwe siyal ham tapa,
Siyal hekam buleq benam hev bepa,
No poot japa hel 
Login al ho,
mwlwngv svdin nge nyoro ho bossuliye xardul doonam 
Ho svt mvwe svtum mam takapa, hoge nyipan? Ho betum pa paat nge mwlwngv svdin ngam paiyaq dwd ku hel,
Ho svt mvwe mwlwngv laanyi maanbo svdin ngam ywwlin dev hog paat dokuv wylayil benum 
"Xumtden rad ab,
Ngog ajin tulu ngam apaq jetuv 
No mwlwam demav ja" 
Paat doore svt benam mam tama hoge svt benum ngog ategq bon ngam nyis to hel bwrnum 
Svt mvwe asaq lamta kapa malalyil hog nyitup-nyic ngam maya deb 
Svt mvwe hog paat dooram awdo jav duha tel hoge paat ngam nyilum num 
Ho svt mvw mwleg dokum uwkur layil betum pakun hoge nyipa kun hel 
Svte hoguv bwlam ywwlin num hum bwle twtel,
hoge svdin mwlenge lwkin gov hel birnum,
"No hev poot se ngulgam aljapa ngul ajin gav" 
Taguv sa agum: Ajine hoden hogbekav poot ponio ho!
Anyiobo tac la mwg Ann

No ngog legab, hvbpa v?
No mvya paku 
Nam beo penum 
Nam vcjaqb og hwrb nyipa 
No ngog sabi ngam napa 
No ngog vote napaku 
No kws dwb nyipa 
No ngog al ngam mwwpa 
Nog gv hwrs mwx-mwaq paku 
Nog ko nge kangam jaqpa 
Nog nabvr nge jeeneq pa 
Noq cwrw nge kacpa 
Noq belin maanam ngam mwwdeq maabey 
Mwwjwto ngam, mwv hvl beenum 
Hiyv hvvminden? " ngo mwwden "
Doi swkwr bo nge nwknum 
Iky nge lvpia vpy den 
Paat nge svpur nge 
Anyiogo yubnam nge alw tayin 
Mwvn yalyale nge gorub monam 
Nars nge vj pulu bo gvden 
Truk nge iky ngam twnum 
Dupum nge tadubnum 
Tomswr nam nge al hvb nyiden 
Ngog legab mwwlw doon bo nge kitab nyeteqku 
Tom mwwlwg nyinam nge dvnam ngetwq 
Hoq mwwlw nge suyum occu jaqpa 
Ngog legab mwwlw nge al pa 
Ngul mwwlw nge hemp pa 
Ngul mwwlw nge wdkub nyipa

Cenla bo pvta hogv paca bo pvta
Al golo
svvn nwt janbo ak moro lo donum
hoq svvn ho pvta ngv vyigo dogw num 
Mwlw ngam akam yan ak hv mwlw hogv cvnlaq kalaq yanum ho mwv gora aabwb swnum
Al log gol hoq pvta dorv kapanum svvn haqbv racob mins dub
ho hab racob ko hogv dimwrv yol donum
oyu ram wwmv gurob tai hogv moro sam wwmv gutwr hatayiku ‚Äù
ho mvw mwpa,
Ho ceenlq bo pvta dorv hoq svvn ho don bo mwlw ngam dokum ak dogkunum
Ngo ajin tulu
mwv benum  "ngulwg dogw svvn si wwm gurob tadku
so wwmsi moro mwlw sam guyum tamaco
Hoq gab ngulwg soq svvn so donam si bos dev nyipa
Ngulv sogv lenkub nyipa hvl bikunvm!"
cvnla bo pvvta tulu ngv mwg agum mam tanam 
ho bulv ado jab moro asaq geda tasq jarl ukunam 
‚ÄúHvb mabde pacca bo pvta tulu ngv benum:
"gora aab bos sogajado 
mwv mwdu dwd iss ho bor dotawn hwl!
Hoggab ngul vvtayin soq gv atwg aljaqnbo namsam apaqpel?
Hakam maanbo akam wmtuku
Ngulv bos mabju svvn sam mwgwl dotuj hvl benum ‚Äù
ho kakato, mdw anyio ho,
Akam ceenla bo gora abwg mwg benum mw jetw pa ku 
svvn habv racob ko aloqgv mwjwr jarlin layil ook xun ho hop pa svvn urw ho 
ho mwjwr jarlin bo he wwm koi ja gurobl pakw 
svvn nwt janbo ngam wwm gugab pakw 
Ho pacca bo pvvta tulu nga anyi kapa kuma mwkv jucw layil kul 
mwv bulw kwlin ngok mavam, koi gw wwm gowum la sipwku 
Ceenlaq nam agum: xiyv ceenlaq bo tomswram tamadvn, aat mwlwq nyito 
Svv Hvb Iriq Kam Kaneq Nam
All golo , rungo rinbo nyi lagv wnyig koi la atrw bo sww hog eminv ne Koi Bo Lwcw la Anyio bo Lwcw hwl mwv rungo ho dwnum 
Hoq rungo ho anyio bo iriq ak kam sww lagv donum 
sww heh mwv rungo ho bon alv ja nyinum 
Hoq rungo ho iriq heh hogak kam nyima num 
All logolo,
Ho mwv ko nyem gav nyida vir kwnam 
Mwv bwn nyinvbo nyi tulw ngam ho iriq kam dwjw jwm tel nyida gab hel 
ho alwza hoge,
bon nyinvbo nyi tulw nge iriq doram dvs al al bongam jirav kunam 
Ho nyinam mwm katwl,
Anyio bo lwcw binum koi bo lwcw nyi,
"Achi, alo svpe iriqge albo swg alam kakatw!
iriq dor alam kvda dvs al al bongam jido ,
Ngunyiv hintwr jab rungo bon nyido, ngunyiv swmw aro ngam dvdub jiden "
Koi bo Lwcw birwq num,
‚Äùngoq tumanam bor lwcw,
alam kaneq yo 
aloq iriq wv sigwg ngam dudo 
iriq ko alam hoojw tvl nyeda alo mengl dvdub sula  
wyu madav alo iriq alam mengtayuk mwv atew 
Anyio bo tac la mvwg ann buneye iss sugur wnum,
Anyio go mvwnge lekin gov swbobum donum 
Hoge anyio bo tac mvw gorav num wtvs mwne 
Hwbwbde, tac mvw lamta baakinb wdunum 
Mvwg anne Mwam yolu ruqpa hoguv no lamta baakin wma den, alo otuv mwg lwchi atuw wto hel benum 
Anyio bo tac mwe bwr pa,
"ngo alov otuv wtesh mwl wden ann,
Hwbemwbde, ngo cingma hoguv wgng maden,
Ham tatel ,
Mwg ann doore goruv layil katum dev nyinum hoguv wden hel,
Hwbwbde, Ann mwe kam wtu yav lwbw nge lutun nyoma num 
Mwwe mwdar paku mw bwhah jipaq hel 
Ngam Apaq tukum hel wch yoma benum,
Taguv se Agum:Nog nying manam mam asaq kan nyinang ma hel bwng mwav ka 
Hoge mvw sugur ho dokur kunam 
Iky nge Sokam ho
Iky la mwg kwchu ko tulu nge boolu gol dodum,
Hog boolu ho sokam mwkam dodum 
Ik ann he ko ngam benum,
aloq sokam dokuv la sokam bayum ho somav hel 
Kwchu akine mwpa hoguv ngulam sokam agum wum maden,hoge mw kaagaqduv mwnum 
Mwe sokam wngpa 
Sulu aob gwcaa layil hoge urab roochu num 
Ho ure ho,
Mwg lvlaq kam katel mwpa si kwchu akda dopan hel 
Kwchu doore mwg lvlaq kam katel mwnum, bwlo kwchu be ngog nyik-nyik nyid hel 
Hoge mwe hang lengnum mwam nyi-nyima den mwlayil 
Mvwe mibwq kunam hog kwchu dooram mvmin sudkuv hel, hoge mvwe sokam urw poglq kunam 
Hog sokam urw ho kwchu dwk manum 
Mvwe pwdw pwdw del donum hog mood gagub hedlo rongo mvnbo nyi hamadedev mvwe halayil Kwchu ngam nalin num 
Hog kwchu doore mvw pagaq kam cengpa kun 
Taguv sa Agum:Lwxiam axag benammum tato Toxto hwbmwbde
Nyega ngela Haas nge
Allog golo,
Nyega doorg Lamta ho wl dodum ho mvwe tapapa nwmw bwyum hoge haas kabnam mam 
Haas doore coptu tel mwam nalin dev nyinum 
Hedlo nyega doore wuch doho,
Haas doore boos ne ngega dooram hanum 
Nyega doore sogog num wch hoge hwbwbde mvwe ukur manum 
Mvwe herav nyidur-nyidur nyinam,
Mvwe herav haas dooram napoq dev nyidul donum, mwam alaq ho hajaq kukam 
Nyi ak da lamta ho wn bwnge kapatel benum,
"Hev domsuse hel!
Haas mwe atte lendub lamta kapa sutayin kokwngam",
Ngega doore hog benam mam teme-kalw tel haas dooram nalindev nyidu num, hoge mwe haas doora nalin kunam 
Hedlo mwe haas dooram wam tukul 
Mwe lamta hog wn bo dooram bire num,
"Haas si svdin nge,
Hogav Bwlg mwwnam mw haduv la mwdev 
Ngo nyi nge hogav ngog mwwnam mw anya mwwpadev la aldev hel" 
Taguv sa Agum:Nyi mwlegam nyito nam hogub nyitesa mwwden Nag nyiwa hoge nyij-muj ngam loxiam doog to 
Alobo Dvpar ajin, Almanbo Dvpar ajin 
Beet pvta vnyig siraq svvn ho osup supnum 
Bulv bulqg ko anyio vnyi lagv donum,
Bunyiq ko ngam anyia jab sonum 
Ann la aab beet pvta bunyie soram nyirov dvnam nokum tav vpel ho oyum mam hadkun 
Al logolo,
Hedlo bunyiq ann aab bw adov vyro yuk ho,
Anyio bo beet pvta ngam almonbo nyoro gaqkybo nge naal vwg kunam 
Akine almanbo nyoro gaqkybo hoge kelen kuliye ado jab jwrl epaq kunam 
Ho mvwe vp cwkwb swwk nyook ho jwrcv kunam, hoge mvwe albo agumum la anya mwwpanum mum cingcalal swcha kunam 
Ho nyoro gaqkybo nyi doore aken pvta ngum pwtwr ho tump kunam,
Ho vwyu madab mvwe anyio bo agum mum ceenalq kunam 
Nyoro gaqkybo hoge mvw imiq nyie almonum hoge bule albo agumum anyia bevmanum 
Al logolo,
Nyi awk lamta hog wgnvbowe hog nyoro gaqkybo nam bayium ho donu donum 
Pvta doore cingpa num,
Ho pvta doore bvvnum,
"Paacha bo,
No hogub so dopan? Paacha bo! Wtew!
Ngo nog lugu ham petaye"
Bosne,
Mvw lamta hog wgalbonge ado wwknum,
Ho mwg wgk ho,
Mvw vp cwkwb swwk nyook ho wch kunam hoglo asaq beet pvta nge dwnyianum 
Ho vp cwkwb swwk nyook hog beet pvta nge benum,
"Alev hato wgaql yvnbo 
No swrso jav so doto hedgo no donw den" 
Lomlaywl,
Ho wgagbo doore beet pvta doram benum, Mvw nog hev nyinbo pvta ak da kapanum hwbedwe mvwe alma num 
No hoguv alja pan?"
Ho Beet pvta mvwe berwnum ,
"Hog doore ngog vbw hepade,
Ngo vcjaqb cengnbo nyi lagav dobaden,
Ngag vbw hw nyoro gaqkybo nyi lagav doba den 
Ngo cengnbo nyi agum mem cengpa,
Ho ngog vbw he nyoro gaqganbo nyi agum mum cengpa 
Ngul dvpar nyw bibwq den ngule hoguv swtan hel" 
Tagav sa Agum: Albo dvpar aap tow, no albo nyi akuv swnew denw lokam 
Nyikam awk Nampam ho Dodum
Nyikam nyi ak nampam ho donum 
Ho nyikam doore mwle ngam nunu yama bo nyi akuv nyinum geda soq 
Mwam nampam mwle nyi nge wsuv ayav kunam 
Mwe lwxiam kan dvb kwda donum 
Mwe lwxiam sordu twnum hoge alma donum 
Hedego wyu swdudu ho 
Hwdkalam nyikam doore gwnam mwka cumdwq kunam 
Nyi mwlenge mwg hoge aadokunam 
Mwg oburnam mew mwlegam nyudku hel hoggab
Hog luw he jvqtw maanam hoge nyinyi-nyiyanam hev nyinum mwg kwsin ho hvmp namw 
Hog nyikam doore mwg kwsin ho donbo mwlegam hvmp madev mwden 
Hwbmwbde algolo,
Hedlo mwe cam piin vnyi dwk ho,
Mwwjw lamanam ak nyipa 
Sija da nyi tulu nge pui nge yunam 
"Nyikam doore hvmpol dodo sol 
Mwe hoggokam sortum kuma sol, nyirs dodo,
Hoge mwg nyiume kam dwriq duku "
Nampum nyi mwlge dokum jitel 
Nyikam dooram taka pa :
Nyiatta nge: Nam hoge nyipakun?
"Hog koi go nyima 
Cam piin go ngo hvmp gav ruqga num 
Hog mwle dooxa xaaram  
Hoge ngo hwwbwq pakun hvmp doma jaqkukam ngog swnam sam alev swn kuv 
Hogav ngo swja hvmp dukun "
Nyikam doore 
Tagab sa Agum:Hvmp gam ruqgam mav  Nog swnam alev swto 
Ajin aljanbo Donam mw
So gon si Ajin vnyi go diixa-rara ho wldonam
wdudod ho bwng pwkcco haqyaq minsnum,
Ho ajin akine akin nyuqm ngam pitaqnum 
Hog pitaqnam doore mwurnum,
Hwbmwbde mwe hog gokam bwmanum,
Ho mwe xuqxy ho xeqkpan 
"Sol ngog albo ajin ne ngam nyuqm so pitaqpa "
Bwgne wdul donum hedlo pobu dokum wgch ma dedev 
Bwgne birnum gv hursduv 
Hog pitaqnam doore suxu ho xuq tel wrav yoql donum,
Hwbmwbde mwg ajin doore ywwlin num 
Yoqle tak hoge calin layilkul,
Mvwe wlw ho xeqnum 
"Sol ngog albo ajin ne ngag swg ngam ywwlin jipa "
Ho ajin pitaq hoge ywwlin bo doore akiin nam toxw num 
Nam ngo piitaq kokw ho,
No xuqxy ho xeqk pel hoge sega,
No wlw ho xeqk pa, hoguv?"
Ajin akw birqnum 
"Nam hwdlo nyi nge almaqav nying lokam xuqxy ho xeqkto hoglo apaqjinam dooi nge ado tinxaq dev 
Hwbmwbde,
Hwdlo nyi nge ngulam alev nying lokam ,
Ngul ham wlw ho xeqto hwdlo kam dooi ye yiiha nyoma dev 
Taguv sa agum: Nog dvrab dognam xima bw  hwbnawbde, nog hiyv nyi nge nog lwguv doden ham xito 
Rvvswbo Sonyi Nyot
Hogho mwwnyianyima num og al ho,
Hoge sonyi nyot doore mwwdwpa vcuv kanojagpa hel 
Mwe mwg wng hoge lenlayil mmeegagnum tolo-bolo 
Mwe kaapanum buut kubu anyio ko ak  
Mwe nwtw pa anyio bo sudum dooram hanyilayil 
"Sog buut kubu si ngog kepo gav jwt ram hel"
Sonyi doore mwwpa 
Sonyi doore buut kubu dooram mengta dwkho,
Sudum ak jaral wwpa lamtav 
Sonyi doore rvvsw kunam 
Mwwe mwwpa 
"Anyiobo buut kubu sam deta mwab kwlib,
Sudum doort bo alam ngo dedev mwwpa 
Mwwe kubu buut dooram wmtukul, hoge sudum doort bo kokw wngpa 
Hwbmwbde sudum doore nyooro ho nyileq kunam, 
Sonyi doore kubu but dooram wwam nam mwwkurkunam 
Taguv sa Agum:Alaq so pvta nge nwmwv gav xinam vnyi xinamw 
Ajin vnyi la Hoge Sutum
Vijay la Raju bwnyie ajine 
Doonu aal ho bwnyie mooro ho wl donum,
Hemp pwjo layil Anyia bo nwsin nwmw laguv 
Cingmapaq bwnyie sutum ak hadu namam kapapa 
Bwnyie boos layikul 
Raju,
Mww svn aww cawdev cingnum,
Svn aww hwngcha pa nyibav ja 
Mwe Vijay gav mwwma num 
Vijay mwwe cingmanum svn aww caww dev 
Vijay mwwe anyiogo mwwka pel 
Mwwe tapa svdin nge nyi sinbo ga ngam dema den hel,
Hoge mwwe nyikw ho karp num hoge mww sak mav donum 
Hog sutum doore mwwm suka pekul mwwpa sipak hel 
Hoge, sutum mww ulek kunam 
Raju Vijay nen tox pa 
"Hogge nake sutume nam nyrw ho bespa hel?"
Vijay bwrnum,
"Sutume begume nog hek ajin hoge ado to hel"
Hoge mwg lamtav wngpa ku 
Taguv sa Agum:Ajin nwwdo ajinam jvqtwjaqb 
Sonyi Nyoot La Jwwgw bo Nyira
Nyira ak,
Nyinyi nyiya kotel mwg atv hoge 
Mooro ho Kaglw num 
Ho mwwe Sonyi doorog kapanum vch dev, hog lvpia ho taa nge dugav tel donum 
Nyira doore haakamjav otuv vlayil hog sonyi lvpia hog taa ngam mvpaq jinam 
Sonyi doore nyira akam hoggokam nyimav ado vle kunam 
Kokw so,
Nyira door attw mooro gaqtav moorow vnum, vchev svdin nge notu layil pwtwr ho vmapnum 
Nyira dooram mwwg attwg nyinge kapalayil nwtu ne almanbo attw door dokum bwch jiknum 
Att ake paan nyira tulu ngam paat gv ung ho hvrlungto hvl benum.
Nyira doore mwwg sigam kayayal pwtwr ho dodho mwe mwdwr pa hog sonyi si mwwg ywwlin nam hepahel 
Nyira mwwe sonyi dooram ywwlin layil hoge pwtwr hog donbo mwwleg svdin ngam kam ywwlin kunam 
Taguv Sa Agum: Nyinge nyi asaq kam svka dev nyiden, ngule ywwlinam nyijo aminam nam herv kapatayin 
Siyal Ngila Roo Aaxy
Al doony tab tuk ho siyal mwwe moorow ho wkarnum, ho mwwe roo aaxh ngam haqb hoge bwyio dev kapanum 
"Mwwg hvngwr twdev," mwe mwengpa 
anyio go wkurlayil,
Siyal mwwe pwgca pa hevgekam, mwwe pogxa pakun 
Logda Siyal mwwe anyio go wkurlayil roo ngam wch dev nyipa herav pogxapa 
Nyitwr nyinyav,
Jipaq kunam,
Siyal mwge nyipum mam tuxi layil benum 
Toloq roo aaxy to kusuq pade hel,"
Hoge wruv pakun ado wdd kuv 
Taguv Sa Agum: HNog nanying manum
Alto Nog Nyemaq Kam
Wtu ho,
Nyiga ko anyio bo ak donum ho emine Sammy hel 
Mwwe all jinbo nyiga gov nyinum  Mwwg poorynge alpa,
Ann-aab benam mam kam tanum,
Vchv cenglaq yanum asaq nyega ko hoge, herv mwlengam anyia num 
Akam tel hoge mwwam anyio yan bo tulu nge mwwam vchev aby num 
Hwbmwbde kaaneq bo ngam nalq donum, heyie Sammy hev kelam aby nwniden 
Hoge, Nyega ko asaq ak kam donum hog emine Timmy hel, mwwe Sammy lakuv poory riyin num 
Sammy hev nyimav,
Mwwe poory ho kam almanum, hoge School poorydw ngam sokar num 
Mwwe ann abb ngam kam nyixiaq num 
Mwwg poory reyin ajin nam nying-nyiya num hoge Sammy nwn kam almanum 
Lwxiam mwwe Sammy nen ako katum dev hoge almadev katum dev mwlege ko asaq lo 
Hwbmwbde, mwwe hoguv kan nyijaq kukam,
Sammy ge poory nge al yayia dodum 
poory ho, hoge soka mwngus nam jaqkam mwwg ajin tulu hoge,
Sammy mwwlege hoge paqkum namguv nyinum 
Mwwg piin ko bed al ho,
Sammy ann aabe mwwam xeqn nan ak lvqc cenum 
Ham mwwe school ho baqwa layil xeqn duv hoge, mwwg poory reg bo tulu betum nam ngam 
Hog xeqn nan he vchv anyia num hoge xeqn dev aljanum 
Hwdlo Timmy ham kapa pakun,
Mwwe Sammy vchev kaaneq ja nume 
Mwwe Sammy nen tox pa,
"No hem hoglo nge napan? Nog rwnum mwye?"
"Ngog ann aabe ngam ko bwd ho lvc cenamme "
Sammy berqnum 
Timmy mwwe kaaneq la hang lengmnamne mviya kunam 
Mwwe almanbo nyega ko pa,
Mwwg ann aabe log logav mwwam lvc jenum 
Mwwe Sammy Xaqn nen ham doocho dev mwwnum 
Doonu doyin,
Hwdlo mwwle nge poory tav uyum yekun,
Tmmy mwwe Sammy cuk ngam mwwko layil hog xeqn nen ngam napakun 
hoge mwwe mwwg cuk wrre ho kvs tel hoge mwwe dvnam detav wle num 
Hwdlo Sammy hakur duk ho, mwwg Xeqn nenum kaapa kuma nume,
Mwwe mwwg poory rwg bo ngam betum num 
Hog xeqn nenam mwwle nge meegaqnum, hoge poory reg bo nge bwwleg koochum bo ngam bepa mwwlg cuk urw ngam kam kato hel 
Ho nyin bo xeqn nenam Timmy nge cuk hoge kapakunam, hoge hang lengtel mwwam tox num,
"Swja Timmy, No hoge betan sam?"
Timmy mwwe nyiqs lenpa  Mwwe hoggokam berq kumwb 
Hwdlo Sammy mwwe Timmy kabnum mam kapatel,
Mwwe anyia mwwpa num hog nyega ko ham 
Mwwe albo nyega ko pa,
Mwwe almav mwwma num mwwg poory rin num 
Mwwe poory req bo ham humpa Timmy nen jwwmam hel 
Seja mwwg nyin bo xeqn nen nanam kapapakun 
Sog nyinam me Timmy vyin kam mwwko jipkun 
Sija mwwe kapku Sammy hwdgo albo nyega ko go hel 
Mwwe Sammy nen la poory rig bo ngam xumpa apaq jut kum hel 
Hog all hoge,
Mwwe Sammy nen ajin kunam hoge nyinyia bwb mwwe kam albo gov sammy hev nyik num 
Meelenge Timmy nen al kunum hoge bwwle larn kunam bwwleg nyit ajin nam ham 
Timmy mwwam kaaneq kujaqkam,
Sammy mwwam anyia nge jekur kunam 
Sog swv ngle atweq nyemaq ngam kam alav nyito 
Heyie cenden ?
Al golo,
Nyulg nyij-muje bulam mwder meden bulam al dev 
Taguv Sa Agum: Nyi ak kam hentur mwwamav nam hwntur mwwjakam  Meelengam al to 
Al toh Nam Hengxa Bongam
Al log golo,
Rongo Rinbo ngi ak donum, mwwge kwd anyio go donum 
Mwwg emine Tuan hel hoge mwwe albo nyij-muj bo nyigov nyinum 
Mwwe nomcum ho mwwg nyem la koo lagov donum, hoge mwwg anyio bo rongo ho hogehi melin nam ham puql dvdnum 
Tuan mwwe nyi asaq ngam saka dev alja num 
Hwdlo kam nyi nge vc tayin, hog mwle ho,
Tuan mwwe ho donum asaq kam seka dev 
hwdlo nyi nge nampum ho sitayin 
Tuan mwwe nyig dev sirro nam vmek nyingam hogekam lamta ho 
Heyiekam aikan ngam vc tayin,
Tuan mwwe nampum bayium ho doktor gav seka num dubai mwx-mvaq la kaonam vc bo ngam 
Heyiekam sog nyi sam oyum manum 
Mwwe mwelengam anyia bo akuv kapanum 
Hwbmwbde, nyi ak Tuan nen hang hoge kaaneq bo ak donum 
Hog emine Juan hel 
Mwwe Tuan ge nam bayium ho donum 
Mwwe Tuan ge rongo ked bayium ho donum 
Mwwg nyij-muje jaamabo akuv nyinum,
Juan mwwe alev rongo ngam mwleq manum, Tuan nyinam hev rongo melin dev 
Hedlo kam vnyw nge rongo nacum de mood hikun,
Juan mwwg puqx vly nge anyio dev kapaden 
Tuan hoge,
Anyia jav mwwg nyiqtuq ngam kam puqlayil kapanum 
Vnyi nyig golo,
Juan mwwg kaaneq ngam chingkumanum,
Login da ho Tuan mwwg rongo ngam nochum tadho,
Juan mwwe aam ngam wm relq kunam ai kanho 
Tuan yupl donam hog nyidu do ho, Mwwg nam bayium hog nyi doon bonge mwwam bepa num hog nyi ake aam ngam guyum momav yelin jeknum ,hedlo Juan mwwe gorov duk ho  
Hedlo wm moi nge cumta duk ho,
Tuan Kapa hogloge wm si gorov pakun hel 
Juan Kaaneq jav mwden hel ham Tuan mwwe cengma num 
Hwbmwbde, mwwe hog nyinam mam dohamoknum hoge lok da Juan nyidar kuba lokam benuv hel 
Hog vnyi ho,
Tuan mwwg aam wm gungo nam ngam albo tenkho puqnum,hwbmwbde mwwe alov nyiqtuq ngam kapa kumanam 
Mwwg hang nge al manum hwbmwbde mwwe heyenyikam ham betum manum 
Login kokw da ho,
Tuan mwwe huurabnum bulg mwwdwq nam yal hoge 
Mwwe wgub lenlayil kapa nyi acam go Juang nam bayam ho 
Mwwe nyebia jaqb kapapa Juan ge ko nyega nge vch doden hel 
Mwwe tapapa nampam nge doqtor nge ho ko gav dubai kapakuma hel 
Juan cingpa hoge nyiduv nyipan hel 
Mwwe mwwg svpur ngam poqsuq layil wengpa 
Hoge mwwe nyebia jaqb pamda cam lamta wlayil doqtor alv cingn bo ngam katum kunam 
Sog doqtor he ko vch ngam alev cingtel ho dubai albo ngam jipa 
Hog mood dara ho 
Nyega ko doore alev ja yubl donum, hoge Tuan mwwe pamdav doqtor ham bokur tav wknum 
Al login ho,
Juan mwwe Tuan ge Nam wlayil dwqc-dwq jav xabnum 
Mwwe betum pa mwwg nych ngam , Hwbmwbde Tuan bepa ngo cingpan hel 
"Nog cingpa nog aam ngam ngo wm relq bo nge hel?
Herav no ngog ko ngam doqtor dokuv wng jipa?"
Juan lomlayil tox num 
Tuan lopa hoge benum,
"Ngo nyipa hoge aleden 
Ngo nog nyixa gav nog ko ngam hoguv nyixa tayin?"
Juan goruv ne Tuan nen loorwq num 
Nyega vnyi nge nyiqs lenum hoge daqn bo mwlege,
Hog al ja hoge,
Juan mwwe kwly kunam 
Vnyw vnyi ho,
Mwwe vly vcb napa mwwg ator bon nyinam mam 
Hedlo nginge mwwam toxyn hed no kwly pakun,
Mwwe hev ja beriden,
"hoghe Tuan ge al ngela anyio nge ngam kwly pakun "
Taguv Sa Agum: Alto nam kaanaq bo ngam, hoge acv alto nog hengxa bo ngam 
Nam Hengxa bo ngam alto
Naleq Naleq wtuq ho,
iky emine Tom hel donum 
Tom nen nyi gumn donbo nyi nge sonum, loxiam mwwm albo dvnam ngela abynam mwwg attwg nyem Havisham he 
All loxiam,
Tom gav nam donum hoge mmwg atteq nyem nam bayium ho dotel mwwe alv ja nam ngam rakqy jinum 
Hedlokam dvcobo nge door-doopw nyook ho kapayin,
Tom vcjav pwden nyimur nyi ngam bos mwwmdev 
Mwwe Atteg nyem hogav vc jav kwlwqnam nge 
Hedlam ai kan nam,
Mwwe kombol al jaq bo lagev yubden mwwg nam ho , hoge aal ngam mwwg denam nge mwwg aga ho app jiden 
Hwbwmbde, Koc hog iky nge mwwg ham xijiq manum, hogav mwle nge mwwm kaaneq num 
Wtu hokam, sija kam,
Bwle pwnam Tom nge nam bayium hoge, hoge mwwm beenam 
Sog mwle si Tom nen almanum,
Hwbwmbde, mwwe hel betenum 
"jwwgw bo ajin tulu,
Bwle vc jav nyelin dors jav nyiden bwlg tos gav, hoglo ngo de nvtaq ja 
Ngo bulam sogoq madav nyipa bwlg hentwram koi mwdev "
Hogav mwwe wcvu kabv la mwwg nyis ngam nginam,
Bwlg bying-byia ngam rwtr bohev nyinam 
algolo,
Mwwe mwwg atteq nyem lagav wdu num,
Tom kapa pa anyio bo nyega ko nge tulu nge iky tulungam wle hwrxal dodev, hoglo iky mwwm bying-byia bo atta ham 
Ho iky tulunge dook domabo tulunge, hoge bwle hoglo kam wk domanum 
Bulam wle hwranbo hoge hoglo kam kek domanum 
Nalq yangone wyi lwgl donam, hoge vc jav pwl donam 
Hwbmwbde, nyega atta nge wm dev memanum 
Bulv wle pwt bo lagav hwrxal donum, nying-nyia donum iky tulug laanyi maanam katel 
Svka bo doma nam iky ngam 
Tom mwwm atte kam notu ngomav 
Mwwe dort janum hoge vc jav pwlden 
Mwwe cingpa mwwe hog nyega ko tulu ngam bos mwnyi tan hel 
Mwwe mwwam gai rwwnam pulayil mwwnge atteq alaq hoge hog nyega ko tulu dokum jaxlnum 
Ho ko nyega tulunge bos num Tom twnk jav bulam pwnam 
Bulvg wyi nge tapum hev nyitkul Tom dort al hxl pwlayil bulv tayiav wnam katel 
Bulv alaq ho wle bwnam mam appaq pekul keknum nyiba jav hedgo bulv jrnge pakun 
"Nam wnk"
Tom bepa hog wi lenbo iky ngam 
"Heyiekam nulam nying-nyia kuram hedlokam "
Mwwe mwwg atteq nyem dokuv hakur kunam hog mwle kal donum Tom nyimam 
Mwwe Tom nen no al ja nyipa hel paqnam 
Hog ai kaan ho,
Tom ge atteq nyem doore kapa pa lusaq nyimam ak 
Hog iky tulunge heyiam Tomg ywwnam tulunge mwwg nam sulu bayium ho hakuml donum 
Mwwm kapaname iky tulu nge Tom nyi hog go beden hel 
"Hvvkams lo bulv Tom nen bulam ywwgam gam paqyalincho hel "
Mwwe mwwpa 
Hog mwwnam mw mwjq pa!
Hog al ja hoge,
Tom al mwwm benyi bo tulunge ajin kunam 
Tom ge all nge mwwm benyi-beya tulu hoge mwya pakun,hoge mwwm bulv aby kunam,
Moduname la hemp mwwpaname sog geda so hog laga beka reng maden 
Taguv Sa Agum: Mwle ngam al to, nogav hengxa bo jaqkam 
Mwwdq Bo Tvvi Taaxo
Kangam janbo Tvvi Taaxo ak donum heye mwle
Nas soden nyodo alam 
Hwdlo mwwe mwwg nyubu ham kangam do hel nyidu do ho'
Mwwe tac bo gule mwwge anyia-kasur modw hagtakubo 
Mwwg mwle hvmp nge mwwg lagav dokmanum 
Mwwe habdev nyiqs lengta num,
Cingmapaq,
Mwwe tapapa bio sooliq pvta havnam mam koc ho 
Tatel Pung anyia jaqv gaan benam mam 
Mwwg anyia-kasur modw hadkubo hel 
Mwwe mwwram paku hoguv ja ngo beenam pakun sav ja 
Ho modw ho,
Juno,
Mwle ngam koi yanbo pwnbo nge,
Halayil hoge pvta ngam betum pa 
"No hoguv hangnge al mapan?"
Juno mwwe pvta dooram tox num 
Tvvi Taaxo doore mwwg tac bo gav sortam pa hogam mwwe dux dwgden hel bepa 
"bio sooliq pvta gwl nge tangum jav tel 
Ngoge hoguv dema?"
Tvvi Taaxo doore benam mam taxotel,
Juno bekin kunam,
"Mwle swnbo nge kinam mw nyem la nyega swtaq lo 
Bulam pwnbo nge mwpa albo la koi bo gav 
Aw, bio sooliq pvta nge anyia gwle ngam lvqc cilnam pa,
Hwbmwbde no ka lvqc namw 
Anyia bo la hern bo nyubu lagov!
Hog Bwdw si nwreq dev nyipa, nog galo hoge doden "
Tvvi Taaxo doore mwwepa hog benin jaq ngo atam kac swtkunyu nyi asaq lagov, atteg henam mam mwleq layil 
Mwwe mwdar kunam hog al hoge,
Mwle nge lusaq den lamta akin malo akin ho 
Taguv Sa Agum:
Attam Nwreq nwme atug hampe 
Mwto aljav no hoge dong pan,
Mwdk mav Nog lagov hoge domaden 
Ngui Oum
Ngui oum go sokam ho donum 
Bulv ajin num hoge hog loxi dedngam lekin gov nyinum 
Al golo,
Ngui notu bonge wpaq layil ngui ngam kapa tel hemp num 
Mwwe pwrrwnam wswq tardev hoge bulv notu dev mwwnam 
Mwle ngam cinglaq yanbo doore pwrrwnam sokam asaq wdev 
Ho ngui akine twreq pa 
Akine wram hepa 
Bepanum sog sokam si ngog nam nge hoge ngo wleq ram sam 
Ngui oum denhe herav bepa wtuq hoge hoggokam sigv domanum sog sokam so 
"Ngo kapa ma sokam sam wleq dev agum 
Ngo mwwnam mw bos bo hev nyind "
wtung nyui vnyi nge bunging ajin akin nam loodwb beng manum,
Hogav bulv asaq-asaq lamtav wknum 
Al login ho,
Hwdlo nyui notu bo nyie wswq tarp doho,
Wtung nyui vnyi nge kelin kunam 
hvbjakam,
omm den akam nwtu kunam 
ho mwwe ajin benam mam tama kogam heng doknum 
Taguv sa Agum:
Cinglaq name jiden hedlam vs-axaq ke hikun 
Mwwgam toh mwwle vs-axaq ke lusaq den 
hoqgab, pvvb ngeka asaq den 
Sonyi nyot ko nyega
Al logolo swrdorxeq hang lengl la yolu dul bulvg svdinpwngko ho 
Bulv bemin swdu num heye ko nye mwwgam aljaq den!
Mwle nge bulv tvtwq la yala poobarb hoge kubu boot la kubu bulv bernum heye gekam wmeq nyige bulv ham ko bemaden hel hoge bulv anyia mwwpa do bulv ko hoge ko hoge ko ngekam bulv hab koi maden heye gedwa ngam adeq dev 
hvbjaqkam,
Bulv benam,
bulv wlayil bulg nying ho nyitayen 
yala poobarb nge la tvtwq ke pwp lww go pwnam 
kubu boot nge nit wung hoge kubu ngekam naleq ja wk bulvgab naknum 
hoge hevjaq berdev nyipa yala poobarb nge la,
tvtwq ,kubu hoge kubu boot,
dopa yuunam gob gewda ngam ko aljav bwpa 
Bulv mwle nge birnum ak golo,
Bwdu mws mwab,
Bulv anyi nyig kaya deb 
Hoge bulv Raja Jupiter dokub putu wdeb 
Tadev sog bemin sam pvvb mvkdeb bulgab 
anyi nyig gab bulv dor-dwk ngam bema num 
hog btwr bnya ho,
bulv pui belq pa raja putu ho 
Bulam goqto alev mulv mwle wmik nyi lagov 
Raja Jupiter Mwwg hwlaqbo pwdum ngam gwtel dopa hoge putq bayium ho svdin mwle nge aso jav dooqpnum 
Putq olympus nge luusaq jav kapanum 
hwbmwbde lokin sog dokum nam si mwle ngam al yamane 
Atucocib, Aab nge la aan sis 
vcb acum tel bulv 
Bulv anyio bo kvn hebja lwxa-lwma la acum tel 
Bulv hedlo Roja Jupiter nen kapa,
bulv nalv loum layil bulam kwrav kunam wtuv be la kartel cwwb donam mwwg aggyia ho 
heb dojaq kukam kac kuname 
sis aan doore bws num ho lapa ho ngo atoor dev nyipa hel 
nalq ja mwwg ko anyia ngam la hedgo ko dopan 
sis nge lamta mwppa ku 
hebkujaq kam,
nalq twpr dev- nam mwle sopin nge
lekin gov ann la aab soopin bwng,
ho anyio bo camleqvny nyiger la yapa go lukin emin nam go
bulv nyinag lwci anyio pwnam logv nyibav aal la nyibu ho wname mwta den hev 
bulv putu mwle ngam wyum kunam 
twpum nootu la bis dema roja jupiter al mwl manum 
hwbmwbde bulv kam 
bwyium wdev nyinum tvtwq dobam tulu ho mwwnam tadav 
hev palokam nalq name meya layil luusaq jajnab kangam do hel lwcq balokam
tvtwq jag ke najyen do 
aan la aab nyui vnyiq pwtum la dwrt 
wba bo nge lww go lwchi hed nyia tel 
bulv hev kelam
bulv diindadajab lenum pobu hanyio bo hoge nalq jav hog aar ho 
juja bo wng hoge la nyoma jav lamta bwci lagov
hevbja nampum ajine mwwpa bulv nyido aao domwk hoge ywgl pan hel 
bulv yul wnum bulg aan aab legov hoge ruja jupite betayin tadav hel 
hwbmwbde bulv hwk hog gokan nyimanumkam 
hoge heb mwle nge luusaq la lumdwb nyinam ho aal ho olypus putu ho 
hoge yala poobarb hapa 
hoge kubu ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶hoge kubu boot ngekam hapa 
hoge bulv mwleg nge bulq swtaq ko ngam haqpa
heyekam nyiq hoge koi manu
Hoge Siyal ngela Sutum, hoge vdin dvnbo svdin
hwbmwbde atuw-anyia ho
putq awo hocabq
sonyi nyote hapa
kangam jaqtel hoge awtur tel
hoge mwwe ko akin gotew
anyio bo pwnam logab vnyiq ke hun hab nyitel hoge
Mwwe ham Ruja Jupiter dokum wch goknum hoge mwwe mwwg
Kakal mwwg ko anyia ngam cooikab 
Ruja Jupiter mwwg hwlaq bo bwpyia hoge vpoqne hoge mwwg alaq ke wrabane birpa kwtaqjab la wcjav gwle hoge 
"Tato, no Ann la Aab hog kubu boot tulu
Kwrtabo hoge Tvtwq
Si bejiq deye no ko naleq jaq wkbo anyi ho ko betel hoge Sonyi nyot akin go bepan!
Hwbmwbde hog ak nge Sonyi nyot nge!
Sonyi nyot nyem gab, hogab, ngo mwwm lvqc gwdekun 
Mwwg ko nge, sog mood soge gogtayin xinam dvpar gob 
Ngo mwwm emin geikun, hogab, mwwleg dortbo svdin Ruja gob "
Mwwe anyio bo sonyi nyot dumpo ngam vdaq pa anyio mood gob mwwg alaq loge 
Hoge Sonyi nyot doore tuukup layil herab jimy jema hoge mwwg ko nyega ngam putung lvpia wng lo vpkunam 
Mwwe atam paqsnam nyinam ho nyiba manam hog anyio bo svdin tulug nyinam hvb 
Mwwe loxiam cinpa mwwg ko nyega si alyanbo pwnam gweda soq gam jwnam nge 
Mwwe ko akin go doteqpa 
Hwbmwbde Jupiter bepa 
Hog ko akine Sonyi nyot nge 
Togub sa agum: soqg si koi ngam bema hvbmabdv aljaqg nam ngam bedwb nyipa.
Kato Nog all nge Dwngrav Madev
Al golo, Siyal Nge Hangur jaqnum 
Mwwe sokam koi jagnbo ak agum ho kapatel hoge kocq kapa hov 
Siyal doore sokam wrav yuqle kunam 
Mwwe caalin dav nyipa 
Hwbmwbde, mwwe caalin nyak manum 
Mwwca kokw ho,
Svin ak wnum he kam hangur num 
Mwwe kam hog sokambe kobu kanum 
Siyal doore svin dooram kapatel benum sokam wrav hoge 
"Sog iss se ticher jagpa hel 
Hato hwgdel hemp dwto "
Pacca bo svin doore kam sokam wurav poqle paku 
Hog hengkuv bo siyal doore svin ge lamkw ko poqcalayil sokam hoge wgv lenkqnum 
Nyijwr ngv Tvb ak Nyol Naanum
Lok mood golo,
Bramin ak la mwwg nyixwngv doonum 
Bulv ko doomanum 
Ko doodwb bulv aal looxiam swgwnum 
Aal loog golo Braminwg nyixwngv tvb ak ko bwwnum 
Nyi mwlwngv ham apaq tvk hvl mwnwn agam goonum 
Hvbmabde mwn ham apdvb mwwbwq kunum 
Mwn tvb k ak ham naleqgo abynum hoo mwam aljaqb hoocuml doognum 
Vnyw oiyu kokwso mwam nyem nvvj dvb mwn mwwbwq kunum 
Hebmabde vs-axaq ak dookynum, hiyv yu tvb ak ham nyega naadwb loorwq tayin 
Aal golo Bramin ak hv mwwg nyixwngam xobdul doodwb kaapanum
Hognvk vs-axaqkv doodo hvl mwnwn tateq kvleq yikam,
mwn lwar popo tvl begamv,
‚ÄúNoqg ko tuupam no hog mwwma do,
no mwwg gab nyem tagaq (meegaq) jima ‚Äù
Bramin ak hv lomkaq-saqnum,
‚ÄúHiyv yu tvbam nyol nvvj tayin?‚Äù
Hvbsujaqkam mwwg nyixwg mwwdwqnam mam mwv kaatwl mwv nyem tagaq (meegaq) dvb mwwbwq kunum 
Mwv nyem tagaq kunv mwv bopam ak golo hvvc kunum hoo hoqho mwwg ajin ak doonboam mwv mwwpa paqnum 
Mwwg ajin nam dookwb mwv wnum
Ajin ak hv mwam svgagvrwqnum hoo mwwg haanam pagoqkam mwv toxnum 
Mwwg ko tuup gab mwv nyem tagaq (meegaq) dvn hvl mwam betamnum 
Nyebia jaqb ajin ak hv mwwg nyem koam jitayin hvl birnum 
Bramin akv mwwg ko tuupam otuqcob kaaka cooto hvl mwam benum 
Hvbmabde mwwg ajin hv kaama jaqkam alv hvl benum hoo mwwg nyem koam Bramin lvgab wmin gvl hoo mwwg ko tuupam nyol naata hvl kanam kunum 
Nyem ak hv nampamho wccil kaaknamv Bramin ko tuup hv tvb ak gob nyinum hvbsujaqkam mwn mwnwg abbwg agam goornam mam pvvdwb mwwnum 
Ho tvb akv la kangambo nyemhv nyem-nyega naaknum 
Mwn aljaqnbo nyixw akwb swwknum 
Ai yubg golo nyem ak hv yubdub nyita yukho, mwn kangam jaqnbo yaapa ak mwn yubk cwwrho doqdul doonum 
Mwn sogoq kiir tanum hvbmabde nyega ak hv mwnwn nyebia jaqb betamnum mwv mwnwg nyol ak hvvk hvl betamnum 
Mwvk hvl kaakin dvb,
mwwg tvb vpin urab mwv haanum 
Hoqkv jaq mwv ai yubxiam mwwg gv apongv swlynum (kwlynum) 
Bramin ak hv ai yubg golo mwwg ko tuupwg yubk cwwrw hoqgv yal dulinam mam tapanum hoo mwv huurabnum 
Mwwg ko tuupv tvb hoqgv nyiib swlynam (kwlynam) mam mwv kaapanum 
Mwv nyebia jaqb mwwg ko cwwrwb haalayil hoo tvb vpinam naanv ham wmmwb hurlwqnum 
Ko tuupv mwwg abbam paqyalinco paql hoo benum,
‚ÄúNo ngam beenam hoqgv ywwlin paku ‚Äù
Hoq mood hoqgv jaq Bramin ngvla,
mwwg nyixwngv,
mwwg ko tuuphv hoo mwwg nyeexwngv hemppwl lvgab gob dooknum 
Ngui Cinyi gola Tvtwq twqg (ak)
Lok mood ak golo ngui cinyi go swnyiq golo doonum 
Bulv tvtwq ajin ak doonum 
Bul oumv aal looxiam mood oiyu go soobaml yvkynum 
Aal golo ngui mengn bo nyi vnyi go swnyiqho haanum 
Ngui mengn bo akwn hv akwn ham benum 
‚ÄúSoq so nguiyv naleqgo doode 
Lok so ngulv haagdvl bulam nootu tuj ‚Äù
Ham tvtwq ak hv tapanum hoo mwwg ajin vnyiam svka dvb mwwbwqnum 
Tvtwqkv ngui cinyiam siggv hvl beo-belaml betamnv,
‚ÄúSoq swnyiq soqgv nunyiv wleqto hvl benum ‚Äù
Hvbmabde bunyiv,
ham hog hvvtw gob mwwmanum hoo birwql begamv,
‚ÄúAjin tvtwqka ngulgab hog mwwdwq maabv,
ngulv iss ura lo doodwb cengdwn hoo ngulug mwwlaq maanv ngulam ywwlin tayin ‚Äù
‚ÄúAgam gootwqnam mam ngulv bosram hoo ngulv so hvraqb doos tayin ‚Äù
Hvlkam bulv benum 
Hvbmabde tvtwqkv mwwg ajin tulug mwwdwq maab birwqnam mam mwv al mwwpa maanum 
Mwv atv mwwsnum,
‚ÄúHoggub jaq bulv ngui mengn bo wswq hoqgv keleq nyotayin?‚Äù
Mwwg atwg swwgam ywwlin sudub tvtwqkv mwwbwq kunum 
Hogloq nyook lo doobnyiloqkam mwv alyin ham mwwg gab mwv atv meepanum 
Swnyiq bviywrg nwmw swwk uraho mwv kvsil doodwb mwwbwq kunum 
Aal loogin so ngui mengnbo vnyiv haanum
Bulv wswqkam iss urab hurlwqnum,
ham tvtwqkv mwwg kvsil dook hoqgv kaal doonum 
Swnyiqho doonbo mwwg ajin tulu gab mwv vcjaqb mwwdwqnum 
Ngui mengn bov anyio go kayayal donam 
cooikab wswqkam meeg mvmab 
Kokwso ngui mengn bo tulungv wswqkam joorabnum
Hoqho nguiyv naleqgo doonum hoo mwwg ajin tulungv svka tvbwk hvl xabnam mam tvtwqkv kaapanum 
Hvbmabde hoqhv vigo duggub kunum 
Tvtwqkv vcjaqb mwwdwqnum hvbmabde bulam svka nyok maanum 
Mwwg ajin tulungam ngui mengn bo tulungv baql wgnam mam mwv svka kaanyi kuma kaamin gwt yaaknum 
Swnyiq bviywrho vp-cwkwb dootwl,
tvtwqv mwwin twql doonum,
‚ÄúNgoqg benam mam ngoqg ajin tulungv tosum-talam maanyi loqkam hoo ngoqg beo-belamnam mam tagab nyiloqkam,
bulv solo ngoqg lvgab cumciq so doomin gvs dvcco "
Pacabo Sonyi Nyot la Surbo Buut Kubu
Lok ak donum larnbo,
la kor jaqnbo Sonyi Nyot nyoro roodw golo,
Mwv svdin tulungam mengsam-mengyaml mengnum 
Hoqgab nyoro hoq doonbo svdin mwlwngv mwwdwqnum 
Hoqgab bulv sonyi nyot lvgab dookum ak doobam dvb hwwbwqnum hoo hoggub jaq bulv lvkin gob doob nyiloqkam altayin hvb bibwq hvnum 
Bulv sonyi nyot akam svvn nyiikum golo hookum tvk hvl pui benum 
Sonyi nyot akv svdin tulungam toxnum,
‚ÄúHog-gab ngulv soq dookum sam doogyin?
Ho svdin tulungv haakam alwb sonyi nyot akam bulug vs-axaqkam betamnum 
Bulv begamv soq vs-axaq sam ngulv pvvb niqtuq ak kaapa do hvl benum 
‚Äú hoggv hoqhv?‚Äù
Sonyi nyot dorv toxnum 
Svdin pengko hoqgv svdin akwn benum,
‚ÄúNgulug pengko soqgv ak-akwb looxiam noqg dookub kanam jitayin 
Noqg dvs gab no asaq svdin tulungam cenam-cecal cex maabv ‚Äù
Sonyi nyotv ham loorwqnum 
Hoq aal jaq hoqgv,
aal looxiam,
svdin tulug pengko hoqgv ak-akwb sonyi nyot lwwpwqb kanam jinum 
Aal loog golo buut kubug wdv haaknum 
Mwv wwnw yoomanum 
Hoqgab mwv mood meeg naanv hoggub jaq mwv la mwwg svdin ajin tulungam ywwlin tayin ham mwwrabnum 
Mwv sonyi nyotwg lwwpwqho hvvc maatab aljaqnbo mood go kaapanum 
Mwwg dwd moodv wleq ko-gab sonyi nyotv vcjaqb kano kunum hoo mwv nyiqrin kaagin tvl kaanamv dornyo koonbo buut kubu akam kaapanum 
Sonyi nyot akv svdin mwlwngam mengdwb mwwbwqnum 
Buut kubu hv mvnyi-moiyul benum,
‚ÄúKv-v no hang lengma jijaq bvka ‚Äù
Bitw jaqb bebnyiloqkam buut kubungv ang go solo noqg dookub hoodul doonum hvbmabde asaq sonyi nyot ak lengb 
vpy gonam mengl dvgnvn 
Ho mwv gvda soqg lvpw atv hvlakam mwv bede 
Hvb nyik lakkam ngo keleq yukun 
Sonyi nyot dorv vi yaiya go hang lengtwrnum 
Mwv benum,
‚ÄúHvb nyila ramlak 
Hogloqho mwam no kaapen?
Hoqb ngam bool wgtvb,
mwam ngo mengpaq tayin ‚Äù
Ho buut kubuhv mwam boolayil sokum ura jaqb dukoq tvl issiv bwwrtvl dook golo boocnum 
‚ÄúMwv soqso doonum,
ngo mwwnamv mwv ura bolo kvsil doode 
Ho Sonyi nyot dorv sokum urab nyiilwqnv kaanum hoo mwwg atwg yal bobongam kaapanum 
Asaq Sonyi nyot ak dood hvl mwv koomor suknum 
Mwv duggumnum hoo sokum hoqgv yalv duggum gumrwqnum 
Ho Sonyi nyot dorv mwwgamv asaq Sonyi nyot dorg duggum gumrwq dede mwwnum 
Hang lingtwr twrya bo sonyi nyot dorv lokta duggum gumnum,
‚ÄúNgo arro soq gvda soqgv lvpw atv ‚Äù
Mwwg benam hvb yalv mwam durwq lengnum,
‚ÄúNgo arro soq gvda soqgv lvpw atv ‚Äù
Sonyi nyot dorv vc loodab hang lengnv asaq Sonyi nyotam cetab sokum urab poqlwqnum 
Ho mwwg dumpongam wlwho xwdaqnum hoo mwv sokam urab holwqnum 
Ho mwwlaqbo buut kubu akv wkurnum hoo asaq svdin tulungam gonam xwwkin kunum 
Bul mwlwngv hempnum hoo buut kubu ham paqyalinco paqnum 
Ho bulv cingxiq kunam mwwlaq-henglaqnamv mwlwngam ator yaanbo ceebiongam kam mviya duk nvnyi 
Seby la Bur
Lok golo seby dorg pobu bviywrho daqn bo rilw svvnho doonum 
Svvn hoq aaxiv vigo dvngamnum hoo ham seby dorhv hwdlo jaqkam dwn yin mwv dvminl doonum 
Lok golo bur dorg rilw svvn niikumho doonu taab haanum 
Seby dorhv ajin akkam doomanum hoqgab burram mwv ajin dvb mwwnum 
Ho mwv burram rilw aaxiv meeg jinum 
Burrv ham hemp jaqb dvnum hoo sebiam paqyalinco paqnum 
Mwv lokta hookur tayin hvl bir peekul wleq kunum 
Burrv la sebiv ajin jinbwb nyiba suknum 
Bulv aal looxiam kaapa minsnum 
Aal loog golo sebiv bur hoqg nyixw gabkam rilw aaxiv jilwqnum 
Mwwg nyixwngv tiiswr bvla kobiuq-kasaq nyinbo rilw aaxy tulungam dvngam jaqb dvnum 
Mwn benum,
‚ÄúSoq rilw aaxy tulu si dvngam jaqn dvnyiloqkam,
ham dvnbo seby dorhv vigo tiiswr yaad dede ‚Äù
Mwwc-mwwiya bo nyixw ak hv benum,
seby hoqg hangam ngam baqa taab 
Hoq ham ngo dwnw do 
Seby dorhv mwwg ajin jinbw ngvk hvl burrv aljaqb mwwg nyixwngam betin-betinl beknum,
hvbmabde mwn kwpwq kamanum 
Nyixw dorhv seby hangam dvma deedib mwn hog akkam dvram hvl bel doonum 
Vtwr-anya so burrv sebiam mwwg nyixw dookub baqa jinkub mwwbwq kunum 
Aal loogwn so, burrv sebiam mwwg namho dvs dvtwl hvl goqnum 
Sebiv loorwqnum hvbmabde mwv hoggub iss aoho wjiqtan yu mwwnum 
Mwv benum ngo iss jaacin ma 
Burrv benum,
‚ÄúMwwdwq maabv, no ngoqg langk so dooto 
Ngoqg nam alo nam bvqc tayin 
Sebiv bur langkho doonum hoo mwv iss aoho jaarab gvknum 
Ho burrv sebiam iss ura jaqb haag bvqlwqnum hoo sebiam yoqlwq mvdvb burrv iss uraho kuukub-kuuxeql wgnum 
Sebiv bosnum hoo mwam toxnum hoggab soq sib nyil no ngam wg gviyin 
Burrv benum,
‚ÄúNgoqg tumanam ajin, nam ngo surb benyoql baqg yukun 
Ngoqg nyixwngv noqg hangam dvka nwwdo hvl begam gab, ngo nam mengd kub soq so bvqlwq pakun hoo ngoqg nyixwg mwwbynam mam xumtvl niqtuq lengm tayin ‚Äù
Ho seby dorhv mwwdwq kunv hog looma twqb nyiknum 
Hvbmabde mwv nyebia jaqb mwwnum 
Mwv cooikab dootwl hoo mwam birwnum,
‚ÄúNgoqg ajin bur,
ngoqg hangam noqg nyixwngam jidwb ngo vigo mwwngam do,
hvbmabde ngoqg hangam svvn swwru tv apaqpen hvl benum 
Hangam ngam naam dvb, no ngam svvn dookub boqkur bvi yv ‚Äù
Burrv hog mwwmab ham loorwqnum 
Burrv sebiam svvn lwkwho bvqnwq kvlam twqda,
sebiv bur gorbw hoqgv svvn aob poqca kunum 
Mwv svvn haqb hoqgv svgoqnv benum,
‚ÄúPaca bo bur no,
‚Äúnyiv mwwg hangam atwg gv apo hoqgv pulinl ap dvn yv?
No dooxa bo ajin goknyi hoo gvda soq mwlwngam paca caangar yaanboam nyol naapa hvl noqg nyixwngam no bekin ta ‚Äù
Ho bur dorhv hemp kumab cooikab wleq kunum 
Svtwg Kwly Daqnam
Kol otuqho,
nampa golo,
svt rvkybo ak la svt dorg doonum 
aal looxiam svt rvkybov pobub bool wgnum,
Svtam gv hurs mvdwb 
Pobu hoqgv bulv lwxiam kwm-kor mvt hatib vj homk dukan bviywrb wpeq keenum 
Vj homn bo ak hv svtam aby jaqnum 
Mwv svtam aaxiv la wj-oo ngv dvmdvb jikynum 
Ho svtv kam vj homn bo ak ham meetiq-meenyiql nyiky jinum hoo mwwg dukanho lwxiam doqnu keenum 
Aal loog golo vj homn bo ak hv mwwg vnyiq-hangv luusaq jaqnum 
Mwv svtam nyij-nyipar tvs mwwnum hoqgab,
hwdlo svtv haaikam,
mwam dvs jimab,
vj homn bo ak hv mwwg vj homnvn pis lvgab svt memiam nwqlwqnum 
Svtv vc loodab hentwrnum 
Mwv ui sarjol wleq kunum 
Vtwr-anya jaqb mwwg nyi mvtws mwwnamv, hoq vj homn bo ak ham 
Vc jaqb vc cijo ywtwl mwwg mwwlwqb hoq vj homn bo ak ham kwly naadwb mwv mwwbwq kunum 
Lwxiam nyinam hvb,
svt rvkybov svtam loogwn so pobub bool wgnum 
Hoge, Svtv mwwg meemyho sulyungam duugub svqlwqnum 
Hwdlo wkur yukho,
lwxiam nyicw hvb svtv vj homk dukanho doqnunum 
Lwxiam nyinam hvb vj homn bo ak hv agab daqlinum 
Svtv mwwg meemyho svqlwq kunam sulyu iss lvgab vj homn boam mwwg dukanam hurs mvnum 
Vj homn bo akam dumpo hoqgv lwci niqtuq namgob tooiyiq-tooxeql tooiyaqnum 
Mwwg vj mwlw ngamla dukan namkam tooiyaqnum 
Nyiilungv mwwg dukan bviywrho doqkum tvl tvmdwr hwqdu bo vj homn bo akam bej-beparnum 
Svt rvkybov la svtv bul atwg lamtab wleqq kunum 
Vj homn bo ak hv mwwg nyixiq kunam mam mwwdar kunum hoq lvg-lvgab,
mwv vi go hvnywnum 
Mwv cengs ak hoqgv cengknum 
Kub ngvla Mwwg Ajin Tulu
Lok mood golo kubu ak,
sudum dorg, raakap ak hoo poaq dorg doonum 
Bulv vpiv albo ajin jinbwb nyinum 
Nyorog swnyiq bviywr golo bulv oiyum mam lvkin gob doobam keenum 
Bulv mood-mooma cengmab mood oiyu go naanv lvkin gob agam goombaml doonum 
Oiyum golo,
lwxiam nyicwb ajin mwlwngv hookumnum hvbmabde sudumv haamanum 
Bulv meeg kaaiya kvkanum hvbmabde bulv vigo mwwdwqnum 
Bulv mwam meegaqdvb hwwbwqnum 
Poaqkv begamv,
‚ÄúNgo jardeen, hoo ngo sudum ajinham aob jarg dvl kaaka tadeen 
Sam mwv bejoywl, mwv cwwnyiaq-doonyiaq aob jarnum 
Ho sudum mam nyotum gaqn bog wswq golo tumtunam mam nyebia jaqb kaapanum 
Sudum dorhv wswq hoqgv kelin dukub mwv tvra-gaanya twqb nyidul doonum 
Hwdlo poaqkv ham kaapa yin,
mwv nyebia jaqb ajin tulu dookub jorkur kunum 
Poaqkv kubu ngamla raakap pam bepanum 
Ho bulv lvkin gob dookum tvl bulug ajinam hoggub nyil svka tayin ham hwwnum 
Kubu dorhv poaq langk ho dootwl nyebia jaqb sudum dookho wcnum 
Bulv hoggub jaqb nyidwb hwwknum,
hvbjaq kubu dorhv wswqkam ciriqtvl hoo sudum mam kelin mvknum 
Mwwg ajin oum lvgab Raakap ak hvvkam wmin gvnum 
Hoq mood jaqho nyotum gaqnbo ak hvvkam hoqho hvvcnum 
Mwam kaapa yin,
kenyi maanbo raakap pam apaq twqtwl vx-cwrv keleqnum 
Hvbmabde nyotum gaqnbo akv raakap pam nootu kunum 
Raaka pam mwv tuila vj uraho vlwqtvl mwwg langk ho baql wgnum 
Hvb nyiyikun Poaq,
kvla sudumv hoo kubungv raakap ajin ham hoggub jaq ywwlin tayin ham hwwbwqnum 
Bulv hvb hwwbwq kunum sudumv sidwn hvb nyitwl nyotum gaqnbog lamta wgaho gel kar ya dvb hvvnum 
Nyotum gaqnbo akv mwwg lamta wgaho sudum edin dviyin jaja tvl gel karnam mam kaapanum 
Ho mwv raakap pam apaqpel hoo sudum daiyab nyebia jaqb xarnum 
Nyotum gaqnbo akv sudum dookho hvvnwq svqb nyiyikam,
sudum dorhv rwdwq paqb juqrab banv hog hwdgo mwv nyebiab kela dvn hwdgo nyoro urab keknum 
Hvb nyidu yikho,
raakap dorhv tuila vj hoqgv lyusuql lyulin layinl nwmw uraho kvs kunum 
Nyotum gaqnbov meeg sudum mam ruqka peekul ruqc kuma yin hoo mwv raakap pam naata kub wkurnum 
Mwv wkur kaaknamv raakap pam kaapa kumanum 
Mwv swrdorxeq gob mwwknum hoo bos larub bosnum 
Mwv nyorongam nyebia jaqb wleq kunum 
Ho hwdlo nyotum gaqnbov wleq yukun, ajin vpiv bulug swrso gab soomin-nyir kunum 
Ho bulv lokta hemp-hvnyirl doobam kunum 
Pacabo Buupy Tvlw
Lok mood golo rongo golo naleqgo buupy tvlwngv doonum 
Sw-soxo ak la bwxeq-nalo tvb soog hoq rongo rwqkinho doonum 
Sw-soxo hvvla bwxeq-nalo tvb hv akwn-akwn hang baqmin sunum 
Hvbsujaqkam bunyiv buupy tvlw tulungam dvdwb abynum 
Soq arro si vnyi gab nyinam luukinam nyinum 
Aal loog golo bwxeq-nalo tvb hv buupy tvlwngam nootu sv twqb nyiyikho sw-soxo dorg haqma-paq golo lengnum 
Mwv kam hoq buupy tvlw dorkin ham ruqmin gvnum 
Ho bwxeq-nalo ngvla sw-soxo bunyig pengkoho vc jaqb yolu paiyaqminsnum 
Hvb nyiyikam buupy tvlw hv vnyi galoqkv keleq kunum 
Keleq kunbo buupy tvlw dorhv vc loodab hempnum 
Ho mwwg hoq puiyam buupy tvlwg xilobo lvgab pui bekin dvb mwv mwwbwq kunum 
Mwv benum,
‚ÄúKoibo, soq si tugu pui ak doodo 
Ngulug ceebio tulu - bwxeq-nalo ngvla sw-soxongv bunyig pengko lo paiyaq yoqdu mins deen 
Ngo mwwdo bulv akwn-akwn mengmin supkude 
Ngulv swrsob gaql yvmin taikun ‚Äù
bos hai kumab "
Hwdlo asaq buupy tvlwngv ham tapayin bul mwlwngv hempnum 
Bulv soomin nyirminv ‚Äì nosso sool hoo bemin berapnum 
Bulgab kokw swwgv jomp bvla alv ku hvl bulug pengkoho bulv akwn-akwn paqmin sunnum 
Bwxeq-nalo ngvla sw-soxongv buupy tvlw tulu soomin-nyirminam mam kaapanum 
Bulug swwca bumpwho hwdjaqgo buupy tvlw tulug lvkin gob yvnam nywywngam kaaka ma 
Hoqhv bulug paiyaqmins yoqdu minsnam mam mwwpa maab nyimnum 
Bulug mood mwciq-mwiyiq maab,
bwxeq-nalo ngvla sw-soxongv buupy tvlw tulungam mva-num 
Bulug buupy tvlwngam nootunam mwlwngam bulv mengnv dvnum 
Hiyv siknum hoq tulu gab, hiyv sig hoqgv keleq kunbo buupy tvlw tuluhv vigo mwwdwqnum 
Ho bulv mwwdar kunum, hwdgo bulv paca bob nyiknum hoo ciql swwnamv bulgab hwdgo hvvtw poot dvn ham cingxiq kunum 
Tvtwq twqtaq gola Tong hoo Svt dorg
Lok mood golo iss sviyin bviywr golo naleqgo tvtwq twqtaqgo doonum 
Aal golo hwdlo bulv soominl doodu yikho,
bulam bos tapadvb,
vc jaqb sogoqnam yalam bulv tapanum 
Bulv hog akkam mwwmio hoo keleq kamatab,
dort jaqnbo svt dorg hog mwlwngam aya mwwpa maab cumjab-cumyiql wnum 
Mwv bosbo tvtwq twqtaqkam kaapanum hvbsujaqkam ham hog gokam mwwmab,
wdul doonum 
Svtwg lvpia niikumho naleqgo tvtwqkam caajabl caaxnum 
Sikbo tulu gab swwl doonbo tulungv bulub ajin tulu gab xabnum 
Bulv vc loodab hang lengnum hoo bulv kwly naadwb mwwnum 
Bulug pengkoho bulv hwwmin sunum hvbmabde bulv ham mengnyi kamanum hoo hwdgo dortbo bulug nyemaq ham hog mvnyi maanum 
Tvtwq tulug pengko hoqgv tvtwq twqgwn benum,
‚ÄúNgo tong ajin ak doodwn 
Ngo mwwjwdo mwn ngulam svka yin pv 
Tvtwq asaqkv mwwmo-sooso benum hoggub nyil tong cici koonbov hwdgo dortbo svdinam hog mvnyi tayin 
Hvbsujaqkam bulv hog asaq mwwlin maanum,
hoo ham alyanbo pagoq gokam mwwcoq maanum,
hoqgab bulv hoq tvtwq hoqg benam mam loomin gvnum 
Tvtwqhv tong ajinam kvvrwqnum 
Hang lengnbo svt hoggub bulug imiq dvpar ramla bulug ajin tulungam mwwg lvpia uraho aya mwwpa maab caajabl wnam mam mwv aadoho dootwl kaanam gonam mwv xwwkinum 
Ho Tong ngvla tvtwqhv, tvtwq ajin tulungam mengn bo svt dorham hoggub jaq kwly naak yin dvn ham hwwbwq kunum 
Albo moodam kaaiyal doonum,
hwdlo svthv doonu yukho,
tonghv mwwg nyuru dookub jaranum 
Ho hwdlo svt vnyiqkv nyiqbio kalam twqda,
tongngv svt vnyiq nyiqny-nyiqnyiam ponnum 
Hvb nyigam gab svtv nyiqcanum 
Mwv vc layil vc jaqb xabnum hoo taqg-loosaqb tobkub-tabxeql yvnum 
Mwwg vnyiqkam iss hwrxaqdvb mwv iss meekarnum 
Mwv hog akkam kaapa maanum hoo mood mwlwho tvtwq kodoql yal duka hvvnam wl yvnum 
Mwwg lamtangam mwv kaapa kumanum 
Lok-lokob mwv pwtbo wlw tuluho dwqtupnum hoo lok-lokob svvn tuluho tubgaql yvnum 
Tvtwq mwlwngv ung uut rarabo bviywr golo 
Bulv kodoq doql doonum vc jav Svtv mwv iss lwkw gol yvdwn hvbjaq mwwda 
Svtv mwv Issiv hoqho dood dede mwwnv svtv hoq lamatab mwv wknum 
Tvtwq kvla tongngv hoggub hwwmin suknum,
hvbjaq mwv ung urab yoqlwqnum hoo mwv vc loodab hentwr hengknum 
Svtv tvtwq twqtaqkam mwv meng gam gab mwam soq gorgy sam baqm gvi nvbo hvl tvtwq twqtaq kvla tongngv hemp poknum 
Bemin benbo Svdam
Nyoro rodw golo,
Kol oiyuho,
svdam dorg la siyali dorg doonum 
Vnyiv albo ajin jinbwb nyinum 
Ai golo vnyiv nyebia jaqb wdul dooiyikho nyiyuq pujuqbo aaxy boolu golo wpeqnum 
Bunyiv doqnu tvl ham kaanum 
Ho bunyig agamho tacorv lengnum 
Vnyiv aaxy boolu hoqgv dvcol dvdwb hwwbwqnum 
Vnyiv boolu urab cooikab haalayil hoo aaxy nyinyin boam punv dvnum 
Bunyiv dvdeq dvb dvnum hoo svvn niikumho doonu dvb hwwbwq kunum 
Svdam dorhv nyirs-puiyumnv benum,
‚ÄúSoq aaxy tulu si la soq pool huto si ngam hemp jaqb bemin binw mvdo‚Ä¶
Ngo bemin binw do ‚Äù
Siyali akv mwam mvturdvb nyikanum,
‚ÄúKv-v bema jijaqbv,
no boolu rvkyboam bihu tai yi hvl,‚Äù
mwv belamnum 
Hvbmabde svdamv hvraqb liil doodunum,
ho mwv tangam jaqb bemin bednvbo hvl mwv mwwnum 
‚ÄúKv-v rongo atv haata yikv ‚Äù
‚ÄúSiyali hv lokta benum,
Hvbmabde svdamv hvraqb liil doodunum,
ho mwv tangam jaqb bemin bednvbo hvl mwv mwwnum 
Rongo at tuluhv svdamg yalam tapanum hoo bulug alaqho svvda bvvlayil xarlin nyanum 
Siyali akhv nwmw niikumho atv mwv kvsnum 
Mwv hwdlo bulam kaapa yin svdamv bosil lamngaqkunv mwv doqdunum 
Rongo at tulu ngvla mwwg nyi tulungv vc loodab svdam mam jwwnyaql mvnum 
Hwdlo svdam mam svvda lvgab gv apoho jwwdaq yin mwv sogoq circirl xabnum 
Mwv keleqdvb nyikanum hvbmabde nyiingv mvqlw ko-gab mwv keleq nyok maanum 
Siyali akhv,
Nwmw niikumho kvsil doonbo nge,
nyi tulungv aaxy boolu hoqgv wknam mam kaapanum 
Svdam akam bulv wlw put rarbo wlw golo rwwtul apnum 
Ho Siyali ak hv svdam mam kvvrwqtab wnum 
Mwam vc loodab un baqmnum  Ho siyali akv anya mwwpanv benum,
‚ÄúNoqg bemin bejo akiam no naapa ku i?‚Äù
Svdam ak hv mwwg bemin benam mam mwwkurv lwwyw kunum hoo mwwg ajin benam mam tanyi loqkam mwv alsuba de hvl mwwknum 
Sviya Rvkybo Ko Ak la Svca Dorg
Lok mood golo nampam hoqgv aado yoomab yorn puutu golo sviya rvkybo ko akv mwwg sviya pvtwngam aal looxiam hoqho ww dvmdvb bool yvgnum 
Aal loopwngam sviya tulungam ww dvmtvl mwv kaal yviyanum 
Mwv agam goobam ajin doomanum hoge hoogav,
hoo bon nyinam akinam nyigam gab mwwg bon nyinamho mwv jaama-paqmnum 
Aal loog golo,
hogloq ak luusaq jaqb nyidwb mwwnum 
hvl mwv wlw ao golo daqtwl sogoq kiirnum,
‚ÄúSvka tvbv! Svka tvbv!‚Äù Svcangv ngoqg sviyanagm ruqmin gvdo 
‚ÄúSvka tvbv! Svka tvbv!‚Äù
Bviywrho rongo mvnbo tulungv mwwg yalam tapanum 
Bulub alaqho svvdangam bwwtwl sviyangam ruqpy taab bulv xarlinum 
Hwdlo bulv yorn puutuho wc yukho,
sviya rvkybo ko akam bulv nyirminl doodwb kaapanum 
‚ÄúOo ngo nulam xaalyol bik-bemaql bekanum 
Ngo nulam paca dvb mvtknun,
Mwv bej-beparnv 
Ham tapa tvl,
rongo menbo tulungv vc loodab hang lengnum hoo bulam bej-bepar pa mwwnum 
Mwlwngam akam yaanbo nyiixa akv sviya rvkybo ko akam bepa no soq sib xaalyol bik-bemaql kuiyum mam lokam bek maab hvl benum 
Meeg aal kokwso,
jvqtw jaqb svcangv yorn puutuho lengnum 
Sviya pvtwngam kaapa tvl svcangv bulug pengko juqlinum 
Sviya pvtwngv atv kipy sudwb mwlwngv cirsaq twqb toloq-boloqb kenum 
Sviya rvkybo ko hvvkam bos kunum hoo mwwg swwg gab mwvkam kenum 
Mwv puutu niqtuq galo xarlin layil,
nampam daiyab coonbo hoge,
sogoqnv benum,
sogoqnv benum,Svka tvbka! Svka tvbka! Svcangv ngo sviyangam duiyum gvde ku 
Kvlv nyebia jaqb caat bvka 
Mwv vc loodab vs-axaq ko-gab, mwv exin-arinv jarlin tvl svka tvbwk hvl sogoqnum 
Rongo mvnbo tulungv sviya rvkybo ko hoqg sogoqnam mam tapa sunam,
hvbmabde kenlob hvb bulam nyitayin mwwnv bulv mwam svka taab xarca maanum,Hogloqkv yalv duanum hoqb bulv lok nywkurl kvvtwqnum hoo benum,
‚ÄúMwv ngulam lokta pacab mvnyi kuram ‚Äù
Bulug bon nyitwngam bulv nyidul doonum, ho hiyvkam wma dvb hvl bulv bibwqnum hoo bul atwg rongoho hal toqdul doonum 
Hiyvkam svka taab wmanum,
hoqgab sviya rvkybo ko akv mwv svca hoqgv kegin layil mwv dooi mvlinko nam ura golo kvsil doonum 
Hoqgv mwwg sviya pvtwngam svcangv cexwl bulam dvmin doonam mam mwv kanum 
Hoq kokwb so,
svcangv yornwb poqpol wleq kunum 
oiyum dwkho,
Dvngo sviya pvtwngam oiyum nampamb sviya rvkybo ko akv hookur gvknum 
Rongo mvnbo ak mwam beo-belamnum hoo mwwg vs-axaqkam kaatwl mwv toxnum,
ko, hoggv nam nyinum? Noqg sviya tuugin hoqloq mvpeen?‚Äù
Sviya rvkybo ko akv mooxa-kaiya tvl hog mwlw nyiknam mam mwv xwwkin kunum 
Rongo mvnbo akv benum,
‚ÄúNgo ko, kenlo nam ngo beo-belamnum 
No otuqho rongo mvnbo tulungam paca mvpa manyiloqkam,
sool buv nam tvjwl hoo noqg sviya pvtwngam ruqpy jib nvpv ‚Äù
Hoq hoqgv sviya rvkybo ko akv,
hog cens ak cengknum,
hoo nywywngam nyiilungam bik-bemaql paca mvpa kuram hvl dingr kunum 
Haas akwg Pw-hwwnam
Lok golo kwrw jaqb bon nyinbo biituam koota pvta ak nyoro rokam golo doonum
Swwxw svvn nwwt rara golo mwnwg osup pam supnum 
Hoqho mwn vnyw naleqgo dooknum 
Mwn mwlwngam ayanum hoo anyo-amaqbo svdin tulu ngvla pvta tulungv mwnwg ajinb nyinum 
Aal loogolo,
biitum koota pvta akv mwn anyo koon osup pam apaqpel dvs meegaqtab wnum 
Mwn vigo aadob jarl wnum 
Mwn jard-jard kunv vtwr-anyaho am rongo rwqt albo dook golo jvrcnum 
Hoqhv am nvvd moodwb nyiknum hoo ammv akam kamtv tvl dooknum 
Biitum koota pvta akv ham dvdwb aby jaqnum 
Mwn hog hwdgo dvla dvn hwdgo dvnum 
Hiyv hoqham dvtab hoqho haanbo pvta asaq tulungam kam mwn ajinum 
Mwn oiyu moodgob hoq rongoho dvl doonum 
Hwdlo biitum koota pvta akv wleq yikho,
buut kubu ak dvs meegaq bov hoq pvta ak hoqg assarbo osup pam kaapanum 
Buut kubungv biitum koota pvtag osup pam vigo aby dvn 
Ho hoqham mwwg nam gob mvtkul hoqho mwv doorab kunum 
Mwv vigo hempnum hoo mwwg bviywr-bvcwrho doonbo pvta ngvla svdin tulungv mwwg ajinb nyiknum 
Hwdlo biitum koota pvtangv hookur yukho,
buut kubu akv mwnwg osupho doonum hoqgab mwn vc jaqb hang lengnum 
No hiyv?
No hog-gab so doodwn? Paca! Wtuk!
Soq nam si ngoqgv lak ‚Äù
‚ÄúBiitum koota pvta dorhv sogoql benum,
‚ÄúSi noqg nammv lv?‚Äù
but kubu lomlayil benum 
Soq nam si sija ngoqg gvku 
Soq so ngo naleq mood go doopa kun ‚Äù
‚ÄúHoggub no so doola kindo ‚Äù
Biitum koota pvtangv benum,
‚ÄúSoqg namsam ngo mvnum hoo ngo so naleqgo doodu kunum 
No mwwd nyiloqkam,
no door-doopw tulungam tox kakato ‚Äù
Mwv benum,
‚ÄúNgo soq namsam assar dvb kaapanum,
hoqgab ngo so haanum 
Hiyv sija namho doodu dvn, namsi hoq-gv ji hoo namsi sija ngoqg gvku ‚Äù
‚ÄúHvbma, soq namsi ngoqg nammv ‚Äù
Biitum koota pvta dorrv sogoq circirl benum,
‚ÄúNgo anyo mood go dvs meegaq taab wleqnum 
Ngo sija hookur pakun,
hoqgab ngoqg nammam no ngam jikur tuku?‚Äù
‚ÄúMa, Buut kubungv birwqnum,
ngo nam hoggub nyijaqkam namsam jikur nyody ma 
Ngo so nywyw xaqb dootayin ‚Äù
Oiyu mood gob bunyiv yolu paiyaq minswl doondum 
Naleqgo svdin nvla pvta tulungv bviywrho hwwiyum tvl doonum 
Biitum koota pvta gvla buut kubug agam goonam mam bulv tal doonum 
Hvbmabde nam hv buut kubu gviyv ma biitum koota pvta gviyv ham hiyv kam pvvb mwwbwq nyomanum 
Hoqgab svdin tulungv begamv yolu sam pvvb mvm dvb ngulv hvvky loq ak tox kvka dvb nyipa hvl benum 
Hvbmabde albo hvvky meepa dvb vigo vs-axaqnum 
Buut kubu hvvla biitum koota pvtangv bunyiv oiyu mood gob albo hvvky meegaqtab wnum 
Kokwso,
bulv nyoro taqc gonho wcnum 
Wlw put rarbo wlw golo
Manu ngvk hvl eminam has ak doonum 
Mwv nyic-nyia bvla bos dvb nyinbo akv 
Hwdlo Manu buut kubu ngvla biitum koota pvtangv hoodul doonam mam kaapa yin,
mwv swgw dvn hvb nyik-nyimaqnv vnyiqkam nyiqcw dvn hvb nyinum,
lvpia lvkin gon daqtwl 
Mwwg alaqho,
swgw nan tvsw soog bwwnum,
hoo biitum koota pvta ngamla buut kukungam tapa mvdwb, mwv Pwnbog eminam vcjaqb sogoql bel doonum 
Haas, Manunvn biitum koota pvta ngvla buut kubungv kaapa tvl vc jaqb al dvbo mwwnum 
Bulv mwam yan bvla Pwnboam mwwgwl swwnbob kaapanum 
Ho bulug yolungam pw-hwwbwq mvdwb bulv mwam hvvkib mvdwb mwwbwqnum 
‚ÄúHvbmabde ngulv vcjaqb hvvmin tuju ‚Äù
Biitum koota pvtangv benum,
Manug swgwnam mam mvnya namgub bulv kaaiyal doonum 
‚ÄúDvrwqbo sarra,
biitum koota pvta gvla ngoqg pengko si anyo koonbo yolu ak doodo 
Soq si pvvblo hvvtw poot jaqkv 
anya mwwpa gvdwl hiyv kvtaqdvn hoo hiyv kvtaq maadwn hoo ham laqm baqm dvb pw-hwwka tvbv ‚Äù
Buut kubungv benum,
"Ngoqg ajin tulu,
hoq hvkwg almanam nywywngam bemabv
Hwdlo ngo asaqg vc nammam kaapa yin, hoqhv ngam vigo hentwr mvdo 
Manu begamv,
‚ÄúAsaqkam hentwr dvb mvnboam Pwnbov laqm baqm tayin 
Kv i, sija nunyig yolungam ngam betam kaato ‚Äù
Biitum koota pvtangv begamv, ‚ÄúSoq sib jaq nyinum,‚Äù
‚ÄúMeeg aal gab ngo dvs meegaqtab ngoqg osup pam wleqnum 
Hwdlo ngo hookur yukho,
ngoqg namho soq buut kubu si gilwq tvl doodwb ngo kaapanum ‚Äù
‚ÄúSoqg namso ngo oiyu mood gob doodunum hoqgab soq si ngoqg nammv ku hvl sija soq buut kubu si gaqdo hoo noqg kuma hvdo ‚Äù
buut kubu benum 
‚ÄúKv nunyi vnyiv ngum-ngum alwb beto 
Ngo vigo nyikam paku 
Ngo nunyig benam mam tadar kama hoo pwwbw bvkam kaadar ma 
Hoqgab nunyiv anya mwwpa gvdvl ngoqg ogumb hvvnwq gvdvl lokta ngam pwwbw alwb betamto?‚Äù
Buut kubu ngvla biitum koota pvtangv
Manunvn bos kumab,
bunyiv mwwg ogumb hvvnum 
Ho dara haas ak hv vnyi-bwbwngam poqrab banv nootul hoo bunyiam mengnum 
Ho mwwg kanongam hang xwmt dvb mwv bunyiam dvknum 
Mwwlaql Tomswrnam
Ramu la Samu bunyiv albo ajinb nyinum 
Vnyiv wsw pagaqbob nyinum hoo bunyiv nyoro bviywr golo doonum 
Aal loog golo,
Vnyiv aal loog golo swwxin wsw kwrtab wnum 
Samu larnv mwwg haakamnam mam Ramunvn betamnum,
‚ÄúNgo nyoro svdin tulungam bos maadwn 
Ngoqg hvreqbo vxy soqgv bulam uukin ciqnyi ho paxwl mengla taiyin ‚Äù
Ramu ham tatwl hoo benum,
‚ÄúNo haakam jaq palak!
Ngo nam ajin jen gam gab ngo atv koi gob mwwdo ‚Äù
Haqma-paq golo sutum dorg vnyig dookub hoodunum 
Sutum mam Samu kaapa twqpel bosnv mwv keleqnum hoo Ramun vpwb apaqpel bviywr hoq svvnwb xencanum 
Mwv mwwnum,
‚ÄúHoggv ngo sija nyika kub yu?
Sutumv sinbo nyiingam idaq maad nvk hvl benam mam ngo lok tatwn 
Hoqgab ngo sija sidkun hvb geqp tvl atam ngo ywwlin sutayin ‚Äù
Sutumv nyebia jaqb Ramu dookub xaranum 
Mwv nyebia jaqb kedho sidkun hvb geqp tvl karnum 
Hwdlo sutumv mwwg dookub hvvnwq yin,
Ramu saqmab doonum hoo mwv sidkun hvb nyitwl doonum 
Sutumv mwam wkin-wiyil nyinum hoo mwam suukanum 
Ramun sidkubo mwwpel,
sutumv wleqnv hoo nyoro urab haaleq kunum 
Sutumv wleq kokwso,
Samu svvn hoqgv geepoq kunum 
Mwv Ramu dookub wnnv mwam toxnum,
‚ÄúRamu, noqg nyuruho sutumv hog jebs dvb ngo kaapanum 
Hoggv mwv nam bede?‚Äù
Ramu birwqnum,
‚ÄúJvqtw jaqb sutumv mwwlaql ngam tomswrnum 
Mwv ngam betamde atam paqs bo ajinam nywywngam ajin jenma bvk hvl bede,
hoggab mwv vs-axaq moodam nam nyebia jaqb apaqdvn ‚Äù
Samu mwwg nyixiaqkam mwwdar laikul mwv atv atam vc jaqb hvnyw kunum 
Jwwgwbo Bramin
Lok golo jwwgwbo Bramin ak pamda golo doonum 
Mwv vigo jwwgw ko-gab nywywngam vj albo koopa maanum ho dvngam bo dvs lokkam dvka maanum 
nvm reqmanum hoo lvqsin samanum 
Mwv dumparnum,
nvm reqmanum hoo lvqsin samanum
Mwwg gv ho vj kooma ko-gab mwam swkwr cwwnamv,
doonyi kaanamv ho dooi yidaqnamv la ho nyodo hoiyaq ko-gab
mwv vc loodab any maanum hoo sooriq koonum 
Nyetbo nyi ak mwam anya kaapa banv svv ko dornyi go mwam jinum 
mwv vc jaqb aby banv,
Bramin svv ko dornyiam hoo koocum-kaapil aljaqb dvngam bo dvssv la nwmwngv jinum 
Svv ko dornyiv bobuq banv jwwtw jaqb swwnum 
Aal golo,
dvcobo akv mwv svv ko dornyiam kaapanum hoo mwv atv mwwsnum,
‚ÄúNgo hoggub nyijaqkam bulam dvco layil puqtayin 
Bulam ngo puqb nyiloqkam ngo vigo twngk naam tayi ‚Äù
Hoq aiho mwv Braminwg nammwb wnum 
Hoq lamta ho,
Mwv hungku bo nyi ak kaapanum hoqhv dumv tuudur-bussu tvl,
vxiv xiigo-xiiro tvl, lvqsinv yvkiq-pisuq tvl,
nyupumv pumt rara tvl hoo vnyiqkv nyiqlw-nyiqka tvl bos kaapanum 
Dvcobo hv mwv bosunum,
hvbjaqkam mwv mwam toxnum,
‚ÄúSar, no hiyv?‚Äù
Ngo apa roorrv 
No hiyv hoo soq ai kanso no hogloqb wdu dvn?‚Äù
Bos kunv dvcobo akv mwv jvqtwngam belinum,
‚ÄúNgo dvco bv 
Braminwg svv ko dornyiam dvco taab ngo wdu dvn ‚Äù
Dvcobo agam goonam mam apa roor tvjwnum hoo benum,
‚ÄúAal ngo ariyum arongam dvs dvdwn hoqgab ngo Bramin akam mengdvl ngoqg dvs gob mvtayin ‚Äù
Vnyi bwbwngv Braminwg nammwb wnum 
jwwgwbo Bramin akam apa roor mengtab jinganum 
Ho dvcobo akv mwam putu banv begamv,
‚ÄúNgo svv ko dorniyam naal wgmatab Bramin akam mengnam si alma ‚Äù
Apa roor benum,
‚ÄúSvv ko dornyiv nam bookmab nyil yal dul yubdu bo Bramin akam muu tayi,
hoo ngo mwam mengnyi kuram ‚Äù
Dvcobov birwqnum,
‚ÄúNo mwam mengdwb vs-axaq baloqkam,
ho ngo svv ko dornyiam dvco coola dema 
hvbnyiloqkam ngo nam soq sam nyim dvb tomswrbov ‚Äù
Ngoqg nyisam nyiyum maady deedib no cooikab dooiya to,
Ho dvcobo la apa roor bunyiv hiyv wco otuqb nyico tayin hoq pagoq gab yolu paiyaq minsnum 
Vnyig yolu paiyaq minsnam yalv Bramin akam duu kunum hoo bulam mwv toxnum nulv hiyv hoo hognvk pagoq gab paiyaq mins dvn 
Dvcobo akv apa roornvn ciqgabnv benum,
‚ÄúBramin-na, soq apa roor si nam mengl mwwg dvs gob mvtanum ‚Äù
Apa roor hvbmak hvl benum hoo mwv birwqnum,
‚ÄúBramin-na , soq dvcobo si noqg svv ko dornyiam dvcol wgtanum ‚Äù
Bramin akv nyebia jaqb mwwg pwnboam swgwnum hoo swgwnam huqlw hoqgv apa roornvn ruqlin kunum 
Ho svvda lvgab dvcoboam Bramin akv ruqpaq kunum 
Vj cumn bov Dumpo Pwnyinam
Lok mood golo vj cumn bo nyi ak doonum,
vj cumn bo nyi ak doonum, hoqg eminv Mantaraka 
Aal loog golo,
hwdlo mwv vj cumdu yikho,
mwwg vj cumgwnvn svvdangv dwrtunum 
Mwv vxam bwwlayil hoo nyoro wl svvda pal nitbo vj cumgwnanam mvdar dvb nyinum 
Mwv nyoroho svvda meegaqnum hvbmabde albo kaapa maanum 
Ho mwv sa-svlo sugur daiyab wnum hoo mwv svvn nwwt rara bo nwwg kaapanum 
Mwv hoq svvn hoqgv svvda palin dvb mwwnum,
ho vj cumgwnan mwlwngam mvdar nadwb svvdangam palin layil mvdar tvl mwwg swwnam bupwho doomin dvb mwwnum 
Vj cumnbo akv mwwg vxam lwwrabnv svvnam pata taiyam,
svvnho doonbo yalv ak agam goqlinv begamv,
‚ÄúKv‚Ä¶v vj cumnboa, soq svvn si ngoqg nammv hoo sam hoggub nyijaqkam pama bvka,
hog-gab hvbnyiloqkam sa-svlo hoqg swkwr dooi yilinboam ngoqg gv cwwgw nanv ‚Äù
Mantaraka benum,
‚ÄúSar, ngo svvn sam patab layil sam nammwb wg mabnyiloqkam,
ngoqg imiq dvparv kanol sita yuku 
Hoqgab no hog golo wleq yaato, ngo soq svvn sam patab dvb nyiky do ‚Äù
Ho yal ak hv mwam benyioql biyuqnum,
‚ÄúNo soq svvn sam patab mabnyiloqkam,
ngo noqg daagabnam mam koi yaab jitayin ‚Äù
Vj cumnbo akv meeg oiyu go mool doopel hoo benum,
‚ÄúSar, hvbpanyiloqkam,
ngoqg nammwb ngo wkur gvdwl ngoqg nywxwngam la ajin tulungam taka taden 
Hwdlo ngo hookur yukun,
ngo hoggv nam kotayin, ham no ngam jiky dvb nyiyi kunpv ‚Äù
Yalv ham loonum hoo vj cumnbo akv hemp-hvnyirl nammwb wkur kunum 
Lamtaho wkurl wdu yikho, mwwg ajin akam kapanum,
dum cabn bo ajinam kaapanum hoo benum, ‚ÄúAjin, yal ak ngoqg daagabnam mam koi yaab jitayinwk hvl bedo hoo ngoqg ajin tulungam la ngoqg nywxwngam tokur mvdwb ngam mood jipa 
Ngam betam kvka tvna, mwwg galoqkv hoggv ngo koiyin do ‚Äù
Dum cabn bo ak hv birwqnum,
‚ÄúNgoqg ajin,
lvpw-haty loq ak koto, hoqho no lvpw at gob nyil doodwb hoo ngoqg lvgab ngo xilo rad gob nyil doodwb 
Ho no lvpw atwg namlo dook ak dootayin,
hoqho ngulug swwnamv hemp-hvnyirl swwtayin ‚Äù
Mantaraka, benum, hv jvqtw go 
Hvbsujaqkam, ngoqg nywxwngam kam ngo taka tvnpv ‚Äù
Mwwg Xilo Rad gob swwta tanamv niqtuq lengmab nyitwqto mwwnv, Dum cabn bo ak hv Mantarakanvn mwwg nywxwgam tox mvma dvb bitur tanum hog-gab hvbnyiloqkam mwv at gab arro mwwnbo nyiib nyinum 
Mwv birwqnum, ‚ÄúSoq si albo bvrwq sujaqkam,
ngoqg nywxwngam ngo taka yin do,
hoggab mwn ngoqg gv taqc gon ‚Äù
Namho hvvc layil,
mwwg nywxwngam yalv mwam hoggv beknum ham hog mwlwngam xwwtam kunum 
Ho hognvkv dum cabn bo akv mwam tomswrnum ham kam mwwg nywxwngam bekin kunum 
Mwwg nywxwngv benum,
Oa! Ngoqg ata, cenglakbo nyi akv ko tulungam, dum cabn bo tulungam, nyera tulungam,ho kogaql dvnbo tulungam tomswr kudub taka maadwn 
Lvpw at akwg swwnamv vs-axaq looda dvn 
Mwv vcwr gokam doonu dvb mood kaapa maadwn ‚Äù
Vj cumnbo ak hv birwqnum,
‚ÄúNo kvtaq jaqb bedo 
Hvbmabde ngo hognvkv kobnyiloqkam al hindwn ham no ngam bekin ma ‚Äù
Mwn birwqnum,
‚ÄúAal looxiam no vj rumkin go cumlin twqdo, hoqhv ngulug looxiam dvn-twwn dvb juqnaq-juqxiq twqdo 
Hoqgab no alaq loq lvqnyi gota hoo dumpo loq pwgta kota, haabo taqcib akwn hoo langk taqcib akwn, ho hvbnyib nyiloqkam no lvkin ciqnyi ho vj rumnyi go cumlin tayi 
Akine noqg Otuq, la akine noqg kokw 
Otuq rumham ngulug looxiam nyin-mvn sanam mam nyin dvb nyitayin 
Akine ngulg alv nyin-mvn sanam mam nyin dvb nyitayin 
Ho, ngulv doongam al bvla hempwl dootayin ‚Äù
Mantaraka mwwg nywxw benam mam loorwqnum 
Mwv hemp jaqb yalwg dookub wknv hoo benum,
‚ÄúSar, no ngam aljaqb atam xuqs mvdwb jijpa 
Ngo nam mvnyi-moiyul bedwn, ngam alaq loq lvqnyi gota hoo dumpo loq pwgta jitbv ‚Äù
Mwv alaq lvqpy gola dumpo pwnyi go dooma taiyikho agam vigo goomanum 
Hemp-hvnyir kunv, jwwgw bo vj cumnbo akv mwwg nammwb wkur kunum 
Nyiilungv mwam lamtaho kaapanum hoo mwam orram gob kaaknum,
hoo mwam wlw hurx kunum 
Hun Jinbo Tvb
Lok mood golo
Haridatta ngvk hvl eminam Bramin rongo mvnbo jwwgw bo ak doonum 
Mwv rongo kwrw jaqb mvnbob nyinum,
hvbmabde hoq hoggv hog akkam naapa maanum 
Aal loog golo rongo nyitar pel gv-ngv nyelin layil
mwv rongo rwqra lvpaho svvn daqnbo donyium niikumho doonunum  Hvb doa kvlam twqda,
Hvb doa kvlam twqda, torub rubj puutu hoqgv mwv tvb soog dumpo dumdap piapiatvl lengnam mam kaapanum 
Ho tvb hv rongongam rvkil doogbo pwnbo gokam de mwv mwwnum hoo ham mwv nywywngam xumka jima hvl mwwdul doonum,
lokam hoqgab rongongv vly-aaxeq swwma deede mwwnum 
Ho nyebia jaqb, mwv pukaq golo gwwiyam naalayil hoo ham tvbab jinum 
Gwwiyam jijo ywwtwl, mwv tvbam hvl agam benum,
mwv tvbam hvl agam benum,
‚ÄúKv! Rongongam rvky jinboa 
No so doodwn hvl ngo cengmanum hoqgab ngo nywywngam nam hog akkam aky jijma 
Hoqgab ngam paqnyi tvbka,‚Äù
hvl bejo ywwl mwv pukaqkam naarab mav hoo mwwg nammwb wknum 
Aal loogwn so jwwgwbo rongo mvnbo akv rongongam tuqtab haanum,
hoo mwv pukaq uraho hun taiyin taqg doodwb kaapanum 
Ho Braminwg swwcangv hvb nyikil swwl dooknum 
Aal looxiam mwv tvbab pukaq ho gwwi jinum hookur kaaikam hun taiyin taqg kaapa keenum 
aal loogwn ho,
Aal loog golo Haridatta nyoodo gvda golo wdwb nyinum 
Mwv nam hoqgv meeg aal gab wleq tai mwwnv hoo
hoo mwwg ko tuupam tvbab kaaiyak hvl beppel wleqnum 
Ko tuup hv gwwiyam bwwlayil rubj puutu lwkwho bwa layil hoo ham tvbab hoonum 
aal loogwn ho,
Hwdlo mwv hookur yin ho,
pukaq uraho hun taiyin taqg mwv kaapa keenum 
Hun taiyinam naaxo kokwso,
mwv mwwgamv,
‚ÄúSoq rubj puutu so hun taiyin rooxo pade mwwnum 
Ngo tvbab mengpaq tvl hoo mwlwngam naatayin ‚Äù
Aal loogwn so,
Braminwg ko tuup hv gwwiyam la svvda daag bwwlayil rongob haanum 
Mwv tvbab gwwiyam hoonum,
hoo svvda lvgab tvb dumpongam jwwnum 
Tvbv svvda jwwjiq kumab keleqnum hoo hang lengnv kongam sidwb cex kunum 
Aal loonyi kokwso,
Haridatta mwwg nampamb hookur kunum hoo mwwg ko tuup sinam mam mwv cengknum 
Mwv mwwdwql nyix-riinum 
Hvbmabde meeg kokwso mwv hvraqb rongob wnum 
mwv hvraqb rongob wnum 
Mwv vc looda sogoqnv tvbab paqnum hoo gwwiyam rubj puutu lwkwho tvp jinum 
Tvbv rubj puutu hoqgv lvvgwb lengnum hoo benum,
‚ÄúBramin, nam soq so noqg rvvsw-roogubnamv boa paku 
Noqg ko tuup sinam mam no hog gokam mwwdwq dvb mwwpa maab no so haapa!
Hoqgab sija ngunyig ajin jinbamnamv jengla deekma 
Hwdlo no vs-axaq yikho ngo nam svkanum hvbmabde noqg rvvsw-roogubnam mam ngo nam svka nyokram 
Pacabo Seby
Lok mood golo,
lvpw at ak sebiam sonum 
Seby ak hv lvpw atam hoggv xeq nyidwb nyila dvn ham nyijnum 
Lvpw ho hiyvkam mwam bej-bepar dvb hampeq nyomanum 
Mwv xinam namlo uraho mwwg mwwkwb xarminl yvnum hog-gab hvbnyiloqkam mwv lvpw atwg sonam ak gob nyinum 
Ogbo aal golo,
seby akv yubdu bo lvpw atwg bvywrho dootwl mviyab yabkal doonum 
Tviyw cig lvpw atwg swqbwho jarpwl doodwb kaapanum,
hoqhv lvpw atam hins-kaaxaq dvb mvnum 
seby dorhv tviywngam lvpw atwg hoqgv ruqpaq dvb nyikanum ho Lvpw atam swrso alwb yubdvb,
Tviywngv meeg mood gob jargin peel hoo hvraqb jorkur banv lvpw atwg swqbw hv jarp tvl doonum 
Seby dorhv oiyu-ado kama daqb mwv mwwnum,
‚ÄúTviyw san ngo cens loq ak tomswr tayin mwwnum ‚Äù
Mwv cooikab lvpw atwg cwwrwb haanv tviywngam mengn dvb yoqciq meegaqnum 
Hwdlo mwv ham kaapa yukun,
mwv lvpw atwg cwwrwb hookur kunum 
Tviyw cirhv hvraqb lvpw atwg swqbwho doodunum 
Mwv hog hwdgo atorv doodwn hwdkalam go Seby dorhv yoqciqkam lwwrab banv tviywngam xutin dvb hvl xulwqnum 
Tviywngv jarleqnum hoo seby hoqg yoqciq nwqgam gab lvpw atv siknum 
Lvpw Atwg Nyemko la ho Peerin
Aal log gol,
kaangam jaqnbo Lvpw Atwg ko tuup ak hv nywxw naadkub mwwbwq kunum 
No jvqtw jaqnbo Lvpw atwg ko nyem akja nyem naato,
Lvpw Koory ak hv nintin jijinl benum,
Mwn kaangamjaqnbo, dengkyjaqnbo, koojubjaqnbo ho hang haatjaqnbo akam naato 
Hvb nyimaboam ak kam naama jijaq bvka ngoq ko 
Ngog ko!
Mwg anwg benamam talayil,
mwv kvtaqjaqnbo Lvpw atwg ko nyem ak nywxw naadvb hvl mwv gvda gvtwb wwknum 
Hoq ho lvpw at nyem kov vigo kaapa sunum,
hvbmab kvtaqjaqnbo ho aljaqnbo ak kam kaapa maanum 
Hiyekam Hog malo hog ak juqc yoomab nyinum 
Kvtaqjaqnbo ak kam kaapa maanum, Hog malo hog ak juqc yoomab nyinum 
Tuugin vigo mwam ao yaanum ho tuugin mwam vigo ootu yaanum,
ho tuugin vigo dornyonum ho tuugin vigo doortnum 
Tuugin mwam vigo akam yaanum ho tuugin vigo mwam anyo yaanum 
Lvpw atwg ko tuup ak hv vigo mwwdwq kunum 
‚ÄúNgo hoglo jaqkam aljaqnbo, kvtaqjaqnbo lvpw atwg nyembo ak kam kaapa nyookma‚Äù
hvl mwwdwq kunv ho hvnyi kunv mwwg lvpwb wwkur kunum 
vtaqjaqnbo lvpw atwg nyem ko ak mwwg nywxwgab naadvb vigo mwwnum 
Hvbmab, hvdlo mwv namub wwkur yikho,
Mwwg mwwl wwnam mwlwngam axia kunum 
Ai kan ak gol doogum-tayam kooi jaqnbo ak haanum,
hoq ho doogum guuml ho tayam byoql haknaam,
Hoge nyodongv ecjaqb hoanum 
Doogum-tayamv duce suja kuqkam,
Lvpw at ak hv mwwg vyapam nyi ak padin numam tapanum 
Ai ywyw so hiyvjaq vyapam padin dvnyu ?
Lvpw at ak hv vyapam mvkotab wwdu yikho, Koory ak hv benum,
Vyap bwywrho nyem nyijir ak daql doonum 
Mwnwg vjv bomjuq tukul ho catam nanv jvyu pumtu tvl daqnum 
Mwnwg nyuqm hoqgv nyodo isv biqlnum ho mwnwg hun dumpye jujanum ho kac tanyaqkunum 
‚ÄúNo hiyv‚Äù?
Lvpw atv nyumnyumjaql mwnwn toxnum,
‚ÄúNgo lvpw atwg nyem ko akv,
Ngo uurab haada i? hvl mwn sogoqnum 
Lvpw atwg nyem ko ge ko ma ge,
otuq coob imiqb haal wwm dookub haato
Lvpw at ak hv bel mwnwn mwwg namlo kooijaqnbo uuraab haagnum 
hedlo lvpe atwg nyem ko ak hv wm ho henl dooyikho,
lvpw at hoqg nyega ko ak hv mwnwn kaapa daqtwl mwnwn mwg nyuxwb naadvb mwwnum 
Hvbmabde, koory ak hv mwnwn kaatwl mwnwg tuqte tiqxumnum 
hoqgab mwndi jvqtw ho kvtaqbo lvpw atwg nyem ko ram
Mwn kaada namv kaajubma,
hvl koory ak hv mwwnum 
Albo ho kvtaqbo akam ngum nyibiab kaapasutain‚Äù hvl koory ak hv mwwnum
hvbmab mwn hog ak kam gobbeq maanum 
Koory ak hv imiq dookub hvvnwqnum
Hog pvvkumko bada hoqgv,
mwn anio ko sengkbo peerin ak naanum ho cooikab ramaq dayag pacgon dayab haanum 
Hoqho yubtaqnan vjam naarobl tel,
peerin ak ham pvvsnum 
Mwn mwnwg nam hoqg paqn mwlwngam goqkumnv benum,
‚ÄúNulug bada hoqgv kvrtaqnanlo camnygo sija dara ngoqg kvrkso so joal paal apto 
Ho pvta vm nyiniaqjaqnbo lo camnygo kvrtamnan camny aolo apto 
Paqn tulu hv kaatwl lamnum,
hvbmab bulv vvijaqkam kvrtaqkam nyibiajaqb joonyial soqdu ruxul saql goos goopel goonyial joonyianum 
Kvrtaq awi wra ho 
Kvrtaqnanv jookum kunamv aokongo ko gab paqn tulungv cooc lakmanum 
Hoqgab koory ak hv mwnwg bor ko ak ham vbialo aaso koyobolo joatvk hvl benum 
Paqn tulungv pvta vmam vbiangam joa namgob pvvnyianum, kookw jaqso, bulv bonam nyiyum kunum ho Koory ak hv xumtkunum 
Hoq tulu si nyidu yikho,
Lvpw atwg nyem ko hoqg vj juja kunboam xampy kunum ho yubta kunum 
Koory ak hv mwnwn yubkub yumdvb wwgkunum 
Lvpw atwg nyem k oak hv kvrtaq nan ho pvta vm camny aob ebiab geeca kunum 
Mwn hoq aob ai yupw ho yubdub nyiknum 
Ar rogwnwg ar komc ho doogum tayamv byoql nyodo homa dukho 
Dooyv ywqnyin kul ho doogum tayamv byoqnyin kul doa nvg ao hoqgv nyiiknum 
Dony lvlaqkv lvpw hoqg nam uurab duanum ho hoq aal hv aljaqnbo aalvb nyinum 
hoq aal hv aljaqnbo aalvb nyinum 
Hvbmab, lvpw atwg nyem ko ak hv moopu mooxa tvl ho ator ayaq doomadvn hvb nyitwl ipuq kunum 
Koory ak hv toxnam,
No alvb yubn mvi?
‚ÄúOh, sija alma!‚Äù hel lvpw atwg nyem ko ak he benum
‚Äú Ngo bos banv ai yupw ho ngoqg vniqkam nyiqcitvl doonum 
Ao lvpwngv centwqdo yubtaqnan ho hogv dodwn,
hvbmab ngo alarko aoho yubnum 
Ngoqg v apo si puulubvla yajub nyidku 
Lvpw atwg nywxw ak hv vigo hempnum,
ham nyi asaq mwlwngv lomnum 
Mwn lvpw atwg nyemko hoqg alaqkam gvbwl mwnwn nyiin yubnu ko dookub wgnum 
Mwn nam hoqg svkabo nyegako ak ham bel yubtaq kamla pvta vm ham naaxiamvmnum 
Hem ak hv akin-akin naal pvta vm hamla yubtaqkam naaxianum 
Hoq ho, yubtaq nan lvpa jaqho perin cirg doonum!
‚Äú Jvqtwbo, aljaqnbo lvpw atwg nyemko ak roxongv pvta vm gvla yubtaq nan pengko hoqg cirnyokobo perin cirgam kapatain 
Hiyvkam cirnyoko ak jaq ham cengram,‚Äù
hvl lvpw atwg nywxw ak hv hempwl nywrnum 
Hedlo lvpw atwg nyegako ak hv hoqg gon ak ham tapatvl,
mwv lvpw atwg nyemko ak ham nywxwb naatainwk hvl benum 
Mwn jvqtwbo, aljaqnbo lvpw atwg nyemkov hvl nyil kaatamma,
hvbmab mwv mwnwn otuqjaqb kaapadaqyikho mwnwn kaabynum 
Hoqgab, lvpw atwg nyemko ak ham lvpw atwg nyega k oak hv nyem naal ho bunye kokw namgob hempub swwl dooknum 
KAANGAM YUBNAM
Otuqho lvpw at akla lvpw at hoqg nyem ak doonum bunye aal loxiam begomv,
‚Äú ngunyv ko ak ja doonyo kam alkindo‚Äù hvl bel doonum,
hvbmab bunye ko doomab vigob swwl doonum 
Aal loog gol, lvpw atwg nywxw hv horsul dooyikho,
tatwg ak agub gwlin num, ho mwnwn benum,
‚Äú Noqg mwwnamv nyiqtu lengtain, 
vnyingv wyum madab,
no nyemko ak bwtain‚Äù hvl benum
Ho tatwg tulungv swr dorxeq akjab nyil,
lamnam gob nyil lvpw atwg nywxw ak hv vnyw maadab nyemko ak bwwnum 
Nyemko akwg kaangam mam kaal lvpw at ak hv hempv ciqtaq lakmab nyinum 
Mwv mwg ajin tulu, imiq nyi tulu ho mwam cengnbo nyi tulu ngam goqkuml hempol dvs dvgnum 
Mwv ko ak ham anial ho leqc cimdvb gwwnbo nyijir tulu ham kam goqnum 
Mwg lvpw ho wyil oumgo doonum,
hvbmab mwg lvpw ho dvn nan hun betv ngv tvyil tvom go dotwq ko gab akwn goqdub nyimanum 
Bulv hoge akwn goqdub nyimanum 
Wyilv oum den gwwnbo nyijir ak hv hang lengal ho cvbio baqkybo gab goqmanam ham hog mwdwqmanum 
Kooija dvs dvkum dvyum tab nyiyikho,
gwwnbo nyijir vxy cirv ko ham gwwn-nyiqr lvqcam cinum 
Akwn nyici jaqb nyinam lvqc cinum, vnydvn hv kaangamam cinum, oumdvn hv nyet lvqcam, ho hvb kalam mwlwngv gvda soqg luuxy lvqcam cinum 
Hvdlo wyilv akin den ak hv lvqc ciyikho,
wyilv oumden ak hv haqmapa gol lengnum 
Mwn hang lengtwrjaql mwnwn goqmanamgab cekol nyidub haanum 
Hog bus kamab mwn sogoql benum,
‚ÄùLvpw atwg nyemko ak si mwnwg vnyi camleq nyiing yam mwn atv atwg vj hamnan silo hoq lvgab vnyiqkam nwqpiqsul,
ho tabtol sitayin‚Äù hvl beenum 
Hoqg kokwb mwn gomgkam bemav,
koseq kumab yubk hoqgv tobkurl wleq kunum 
gwwnbo nyijir vxy cirv ko ham gwwn-nyiqr lvqcam cinum 
Mwlwngv lomknum ho Lvpw atwg nywxw hv xabl dvlab tabto kunum
hbmabde wyilv vny den gwwnbo nyijir lvqc cimatanbo, hv cooikab daqanum 
Cooikab wtub taqlinnam 
Mwnwg ator hv beenamam mvxianumanum,
hvbmab mwn ham ator maadub mvlanum,
ho mwn benum, ‚ÄúMwn siram,
Lvpw at ak hv hoqg beenam ham mvturdvbjaq mwwnum,
ho gaml jilin kunv mwg lvpw hoqg mwlw vj homnan silo ngam mvpaqtvk hvl beknum 
Mwnwn mwdwq mvmamvmdub Lvpw atwg nyijir ham beenamam ak kam betam maabwk hvl benum 
Vnyi vigo kokwso,
gwwnbo nyijir tulug lvqc cinamv akin akin gob lengrob kunum 
Lvpw atwg nyemko ak hv kaangamjaqb, oduq alaqmab, hindjaqb, ho mwlaqjaqnbo akwb swrob kunum,
hvb nyigam gab mwnwn hiyvkam svkadub nyima hvbmab mwnwn abydub nyitwqnum 
Aal log gol hvdlo mwnwg vnyingv nywyil nywwng yikug ho,
Lvpw atwg nyemko ak hv ar komc ho,
nyibiajaqb gorobnum 
Mwn nyibiajaqb gorob ko gab mwn mwlwngam yubdudub kaapanum 
hoqgab mwn lvpw ho gaqkar yinum,
mwnwg mwlwqho yubknam, dookum dook ho kakarl yenum ho kokwjaqso kucujaqnbo nam ak gol haaknum 
Mwn aceqjaqnbo vbiab sencanum ho anio ko bo vyap ak kapanum 
Tador ee dvxob kunam tala ak heqtum tvl doonum, ho hvdlo mwn ham heqka kalam vyapam heqko kunum 
Anio ko dook gol huux ak svcaq caql doonum 
‚ÄúAlbo ar komc, an‚Äù hvl bel lvpw atwg nyemko ak hv bel,
‚Äúhogv no nyidwn?‚Äù hvl toxnum 
‚ÄúNgo svcaq caqdwn‚Äù hvl hoox ak hv birwqnum 
‚ÄúKaangam jaqb pwrnbo is hogv‚Äù ?
hvl lvpw atwg nyemko ak hv toxwl ho mwn svcaq caqn nanam naal mwnkam caqkadvb nyinum 
Hvbmab tacaq caqn nan silo ham haqmapagob nyil mwnwg lvqcingam hulwgnum 
Hoq mod daraho, hvdlo mwnwg lvqcingam nwqpa hvl hempa kalam, mwnwg dookho yubtaq ak ho mwn tabtokunv, ho mwn yubngaqjaql yubknum 
soq yubngaqnam hv lvpw hoqg mwlw ho wyiq kunum 
Lvpw at, lvpw at hoqg nywxwngv, ho lvpw hoqg mwlw ngyiingv ar komcam nyisam nyidudvb mwlwngvkam yubngaql yubknum 
Ikyv vyab haagaho, svpurv rwwl apko ho, pvtangv nam mwwloho,
tvyingv ciqc ho, mwlwngv yubknum 
Wm ak hvjaq kamjija vcib yaqngoqtvl cooikab yaqdul doonum,
imiqho paqnv rwrw hvvkam,
poroq vmam pungotvl yubl doonum 
Dooyv yiqngotvl dooknum ho nam dook hoqg svvn okvkam biik-tabkmab dooknum 
Taa ngv svvrob kunv lvpw hoqg namam hwrlup kunum 
Hebmabde taa ngv lekin gov hwrlupnam 
Swl doden hebjaq,
Hvbmab taa ngv simabo hvb nyil swtum ko gab lvpw atwg nyega ko tulu ham tentul haalamab nyil vigo hentwrl sinianum 
vnyi viyig kokw jaqso,
kangam jaqnbo lvpw atwg nyega ko ak hoq nampum ho haanum ho lvpw hoqg gonam nyekam tulungv mwam taa urag vnyi lwwgub yubdul doonbo kaangam jaqnbo lvpw atwg nyemko pagoqkam xwtumnum 
Ham mwam kam mwg ab hoqg abwg xwwtum namam tapanum,
ham tal lvpw atwg nyega kov vigo taa ngam,
Hoge mvkol namub haadub nyikanum,
hvbmab akin gookam haac lamab nyil taa ngv vigo nwql ho siniakunum 
Lvpw atwg nyegako ak hv benum,
‚Äú Ngo bosma 
Ngo haal Yubnam Kaangam ham kaatain‚Äù
Nyekam tulungv hamaloda maabwk hvl betwr suku,
hvbmab lvpw atwg nyega ko ak hv tamanum 
Hoq mod ho vnyi lwwgv wyum kunum daqknum,
ho kaangam yubnam hv gorobdub modv haaknum 
lvpw atwg nyegakov urab haaikam,
Kaangam jaqnbo Roos opu lvgab taa ngv hwrluptvl dook ho
hv atv tabkonv ho mwam hog ak kam taa nge nwqmanum 
Ho mwg kokwg taa ngv tabtum kunv hvraqb tabtumkunum 
Lvpw atwg nam bwyir ho,
