ho lvpw atwg nyega kov hvnwql mwv kaanum, ho ikyv vyap haagoho, svpurv rwwl apko ho yubl doodev,
ho pvtangv ham mwloho,
Hedlo mwv naam urab hadkuxo,
ho pvtangv ham mwloho, tvyingv ciqcho, ho nyera-paqnv dookum dook ho yubl doonianum 
Lvpw atwg pwqlw bwyirho Lvpw atv, lvpw atwg nywxwngv,
akwn akwn gv bwyirho aniajaqb yubl donianum 
Imiqho wmv gudul doonum,
ho pqnv poroq vmam puxaqtab nyitwl yubl doonianum 
Mwwlwngv cooikab doogamgab mwv atwg saqnam mamkam tapasunum 
Mwv hvraqb urab haanum ho nam ak go haackunum  Ho mwv ao caokunv, lvpw atwg nyemkog yubdul dook ham mvkol haackunum 
Ho mwv yupnam,
Mwnwg yubnamv kaangam jaqkogab mwv mwg vnyiqkv tabkor lakmanum,
ho mwv nywabanv mwnwn moopupnum 
Hvb nyil mwv mwnwn moopup kalam
Kangam Yubnbog vnyiqkv nyiqpio kunum, ho mwam nywrs-puyumnum 
Bunye lvpw atwg namub ibasuknum 
Lvpw atwg nam hoqg
nyi mwlwngv hurab kunv akwn akwn kaaminsul lomknum 
Mood anio kookwso, mood vigo od kumab dookbo nam ak hv sija hemp pol, bemin bel,
tal dwwl-pal durab nyaknum ho hempbo lvpw atwg nyega ko ak hv kangam yubnbo lvpw atwg nyemko ak ham nyem naaknum,
hoq kokwb bunyv hemp aljaqb swwknum 
TATWG LVPW ATWG KO TUUP
Al log gol,
hun hoqg pwnam akam xum paql doonbo lvpw atwg nyem ko ak doonum 
Mwnwg xiswjaqnam soon nanv hun hoqg pwnam vp ak doonum 
Dwr pool ho, mwn kucuqbo sokam bwyirgv hvywq nyora ho,
hordu-horbabl sool doonum 
Al loog gol, mwnwg hun vp hv mwnwg alaq hoqgv pulel sokam urab holwqnum 
Mwn sokam urab nyibubl sokamv hwdgo ura dvnyu hvl kaanum,
hvbmabde sokamv vigo ura ko gab mwn hog ak kam kappa manum 
‚ÄúOh hun vp, nam ngo kappa lakram‚Äù
hvl bel lvpw atwg nyem ko hv xabl doonum 
Haqmapa gol, nyikum hoqgv yal ak tapa num 
‚ÄúKangam albo lvpw atwg nyemko, hogv no nyipa?
Hog gab no xabdwn?‚Äù
Lvpw atwg nyemko ak hv mwlwngam kakwr-kawrnum, hvbmabde mwn hog ak kam kappa manum 
‚Äú Lvpw atwg Nyemko, nyikum silak‚Äù
Mwnwn tapa mvmdub,
Lvpw atwg nyemko hv sokum urab kaal num ho mwn jeneqbo tatwg ak iss ura hoqgv nyiteqtvl doonam
‚ÄúOh! No I‚Äù hvl mwn bel ho bunyv vigo birwq sul,
mwn bel ho bunyv vigo birwq sul,
‚ÄúNo cenkam pade, ngoqg hun vpv sokum urab holwqko gab ngo xabl dodwn‚Äù hvl benum 
‚ÄúNgo Ngogab belam naying tayin,"
Tatwg ak hv sokum gamb ho poqlin layil 
‚ÄúHvbmab, no ngam hog nvkv najo ngam jitain?‚Äù hvl toxnum 
Lvpw atwg nyem ko hv xabkmab dooknum 
‚ÄúNgoqg ajin tatwg, hogv no hogekam kotain,
tasw-tayin‚Äù
Lvpw atwg nyemko beepa‚Äúngoqg hum bopia ngamjaqkam‚Äù
‚ÄúNoqg tasw-tayin ho hun bopia ngam ngo naal hogv mvntain?‚Äù
hvl tatwg ak hv birwqnum 
Mwnwg nyiqsam tvmv tuudwrl ho mwnwg dumpo ngv nyibobl,
lvpw atwg nyemko hv toxnum,
"Heb nyilokam?"
‚ÄúNo holo hog ak dinr tainvi?‚Äù
Lvpw atwg nyemko ak hv micung go mwwl ho birwqnum,
‚ÄúHmm‚Ä¶holo hoqhv hogv?‚Äù
‚ÄúNo ngam ajin jinbw akvb mvl,
ho noqg lvpw ho wgwl dvs dvgwl ho yumtain hvl no dinrto‚Äù hvl benum 
holo no ngoqg ajin jinbwb ngo nam mvtain‚Äù
hvl lvpw atwg nyem ko hv loorwqnum,
Tatwg hoqg benamam tadwr yomab
Tatwg ak hv iss urab poqlwql ho hun vp ham mwg agam ho cegab tvl baqlin jiknum 
Hun vpv lvpw atwg nyemko akwg al dookho duqckalam,
mwn narobl tatwg akam paqyaco hvl bekam kumab namub xarl wwknum 
‚ÄúDaqyato‚Äù hvl tatwkv sogoql,
‚Äúnoqg xarnam hvb ngo xarlama‚Äù hvl benum 
Hvbmab lvpw atwg nyemko hv mwn takmab xarl wwknum 
Lvpw ho xarckunv,
lvpw atwg nyemko hv tatwg kam hog ak kam mwwpa kumanum,
hvbmab aal loogwn ho,
mwnwg ab dookub ecin dvdul dooyikho,
vyap ho nyi ak padin numam mwn tapanum 
Ho yal ak benum,
‚ÄúLvpw atwg nyemko, vyapam mvkoto!‚Äù hvnamam tapanum 
Lvpw atwg nyemko hv xarl vyapam mvkonum,
hvbmab tatwg akam daql doodum mwn kapanum,
jene pempam tvl issv bwdwq rwyil doonum,
mwn atwg nyuqmam pitaqsul mwnwg dookub xarkur kunum 
Lvpw at ak hv mwwpa hog akja nyipade hvl mwwnum 
‚ÄúNam oramv notu tab nyipaye?‚Äù
hvl toxnum 
‚ÄúOh, ab, hvbma  Hoq hv surjaqnbo tatwg ak sumab‚Äù
hvl mwn birwqnum 
‚ÄúHo tatwg ak hv noqg hoqgv hog nvkv kodo?‚Äù
hvl lvpw at hv cendub mwnv mwnwn toxnum 
Lvpw atwg nyemko hv betoml doyikho,
vyapam vi yaya gob padin num 
‚ÄúLvpw atwg nyemko, ngam haamto‚Äù
hvl tatwg ak hv bel doonum 
‚ÄúNo noqg dingr numam mwpa kumayv?‚Äù hvl toxwl doonum 
Tatwg ak hoqg benam gomx ciram lvpw at ak hv tal doonum 
‚ÄúNo dingr jipalo, no ham nyidub nyido  Mwn urab hamto‚Äù
hvl lvpw at hv benum 
Lvpw atwg nyemko hv hang lengnum hvbmab mwnwg abam kam mwn abynum ho mwg benamam tamab nyilamanum 
Mwn vyapam mvkol ho tatwg ak ham ecin dvkub hag kunum 
‚ÄúNgam jorub gvdwl dok ho doomtub,
noqg dookho dool dvmtub,‚Äù
hvl lvpw atwg nyemko ham tatwg ak hv benum 
‚ÄúMa! Ngo ham nyilaram
hvl lvpw atwg nyemko hv benum benum hvbmab mwnwg abwg mwnwn kaagamgab mwnwg mwnamv kwly kunum 
Dotam nan hv cac magam gab dvtam nam aob jocatvb hvl tatwg ak hv benum 
Ho mwam joca kalamda,
Mwv beenam,
‚Äúnoqg dvdunam ham ngoq dokub tvnwqtvb, ngo noql lvgab dvtain‚Äù hvl benum 
Lvpw atwg nyemko hv mwnwg dvdu nam ham tatwg dookub xwrbo jinum
hvbmab mwnwg hangv alkumab nyil dvknum 
Tatwg ak hv ecinam dvnia kalamda,
‚ÄúNgo agwr jaqpaku, hvl benum 
Ngam yubkub jool caag tub, ngo yubta yikun
hvyiq cicibo tatwg ak ham mwnwg yubkho yubgdub vigo mwdwq kunv lvwp atwg nyemko hvl xabl dooknum 
Hvbmab lvpw at hv benum,
‚ÄúNgo ko no yubgdub nyipa,
noqg vs-axaq moodho svkaboam, no apadub nyilaram‚Äù hvl tomswrnum 
‚ÄúV, ab‚Äù
hvl lvpw atwg nyemko hv birwqnum,
ho hengabjaqb tatwg ham cingrobnum 
Hvdlo mwn mwnwg yubkho haac yikugho,
tatwg ham cuuki jaqho mwnwg yubk hoqgv aado jaqho apnum 
Hvbmab hvdlo mwn gorabl wwddub nyiyikho
mwnwg dookub poqmin gvnamam mwn tapanum 
‚ÄúNgokam yubnw duku‚Äù
Tatwg hv hvl benv,
‚ÄúNoqg yubkho ngamkam jocatub‚Äù hvl benum 
Lvpw atwg nyemko hv tatwg ham cooikab mwnwg yubkub jocanum,
ho jenebo mwg dumpongv nyinyiaqbo dumtumho yubknum 
Hvbmab hvdlo mwnwg pamnam ej pengko ho yubdul doyikho,
tatwg hoqg cooikab xabnamam tatwl mwn lamnum 
‚Äúno hognvkv nyipa,
Anio boTatwg ?"
hvl mwn toxnum 
‚ÄúNgam ajin koodub hvlja ngo mwnum‚Äù
hvl tatwg hv birwqnum 
‚ÄúHvbmab no ngam kanw jaqmanyi! hvl birwqnum 
Ngo sokumb wwkur kulo alkindo‚Äù
Ham tatwl, lvpw atwg nyemko hoqg haangv aljaq kumanum 
Mwn tatwg dokwg bwyirho karknum 
‚ÄúNgo nam ajin tain‚Äù
hvl mwn birwqnum,
ho hoq moodho mwnwg bekho nyiknum 
Hoke lvpw atwg nyemko hv tatwg hoqg jenetvl nyuqm anioko ho alub yubtwk hvl mopupnum 
Hvb nyida kalam swrdorxeq ak nyinum 
Tatwg ak hv kangam jaqnbo lvpw atwg nyegako akvb nyiknum!
Mwnwg dookho kaka manam kangam jaqnbo lvpw atwg nyegako doqnam ham asaka swrdorxeq kapakumanum 
Lvpw atwg nyegako hv lvpw atwg nyemko ham nyirs puyuml betamnum,
‚ÄúNgam almanbo nyijir ak beenum 
Mwn ngam tatwg nyimdub beenum hvdgo namgob lvpw atwg nyemko ak haal naalinl ngam sokum ura ho doomdvb beenum‚Äù
mwnwg dvkho dvl madebib,
mwnwg yubkho yubg madedib,
ho mwn ngam mopub ma dedib
‚ÄúNo, ngoqg kangamjaqnbo lvpw atwg nyemkogo‚Äù
lvpw atwg nyegako hv bedunam,
ho ‚Äúsija hoqg beenam ham mvpya jinam ham paqyaco hvl paqlakuram hvbmab nam ngo nyem natain,
ho nam ngo swwl doodedib abytain 
No ngam nyega natain i?‚Äù
nyibiajaqb lvpw atwg nyemko birqnam,
natain hvnam ham lorwqnum,
ho bunye nyem nyega naaknv hoq kokwb hemp jaqnbo imiq akvb swwknum 
SINDERELA
Mood ak gol,
Sinderela hvl benam kaangam jaqnam nyijir ak doonum 
Mwn mwnwg ab laguv dobanam,
Ann ciw ho bwrm vnyig lvgab doonum 
Mwnwg abwg sixo kokwso,
mwnwg aljaqmabo an cw hvvla ho mwnwg nyem ko vnyv Sinderela nvn paqn hvb mvknum 
Mwnwn nam hoqg nyis mwlwngam nyimnum ho mwnwn atwg imiq nyivbo hvl mwwk maanum 
Sinderela vp cikwb yvknum 
Aal log gol,
lvpw at ak hv mwg lvpw hoqg nyem nyijir kaangambo mwlw ngam goql mwg nyega ko gab nyem naajdub nyinum 
An cw hvvla mwnwg nyemko vnyv vj koox korwlayil lvpw atwg namub wwnum 
Bulv aro kasobo Sinderelanvn nam ho vpcikwb nam hoqg nyis wsam nyimdvb doomnum 
Sinderela mwnwg hang urwjaqho mwnum mwn kam wwnyo albade hvl 
Sinderela mwnwg hang urwjaqho mwnum mwn kam wwnyo albade hvl 
Mwn Sinderelanvn toxnum,
‚ÄúNo lvpw atwg goqkum kob wnwdo i?‚Äù hvl
Sinderela birwqnum,
‚ÄúV ngo wnwdo‚Äù 
Hvbmab mwn atam kaastvl haangv pwnyonum 
‚ÄúNgo soqsib kaacjaqnbo vjsam gvtwl hogub wlatain?‚Äù 
Mwn gwwnbo nyijir ham toxnum,
Gwwnbo nyijir ak hv nyirspuyum banv mwnwg gwwn nan beqnya hv mwnwn lwyumnum 
Sinderela mwnwg log kam kaakamanam vj ho luxuq ham mwn gvdub kapatukul vcjaqb lomnum 
Mwn jvqtwjaqb kaangam jaqkunum 
Gwwnbo nyijir ak hv Sinderelanvn tap pwtkarabo ak bwatvk hvl benum,
ho mwnwg mekri ham tornbo kubulo kvn go bwatvk hvl benum 
Mwnwg gwwn nan beqnya hv lwyum kalam tap pwgv byoqci byoqyibo gora gari akvb nyiknum,
ho kubu nyem dorx hv gora dorxgob nyiknum ho kubu nyega kvn hv kangamjaqnbo gora gari wwgbob nyiknum 
Sinderela atam kaastukul mwjwmab nyiknum 
Sinderelag wrob madab,
gwwnbo nyijir ak hv mwn tomswrnum,
‚Äúmwwgabto, no 12 mood madab hokurla 
Hoq mood namgob ngoqg gwwnamv dotwqtain 
Ngo hogv nam jipan hv nyiyum taikun ho no otuqho hogub nyinum hvb no nyitayikun ‚Äù
Sinderela birwqnum,
‚ÄúVv, ngo ham nyitain‚Äù 
Dookumko ho
Mwlenge mvn kwda kaagav nam hoge kangamjaqpa hvl bekumnum 
Mwnwg bwrm cw hvvkam mwnwn kaacin kumanum!
Lvpw atwg nyega ko hv mwnwg lvgab vigo nas soonum ho mwnwn kaabynum 
Sinderela ai yiylig otuqg tal dwwnamam tapatvl gwwnbo nyijirg benamam mwpanum 
Mwn dookum ko hoqgv keqlinnum 
Mwn nam hoqgv nyibiajaqb keqlin yik ho
mwnwg luxuq akwn pisuqnum 
Hvbmab mwn daqmyomab nyibiajaqb keql luxuqkam opaqpel keqknum 
Lvpw atwg nyega ko hv mwnwn ruqmin gvnv,
luxuqkam nanum ho mwg nyi ngam benum,
‚ÄúWwn, ho soq luxuqsi hiig al hoqgv ham meelintak‚Äù hvl kanam kunum 
Lvpw hoqg nyijir vx ciram kaaka kunum ho kapakumanum hvbmab Sinderela roxon kappa manum 
Aal login ho,
lvpw atwg nyega ko hv luxuqkam bwlayil Sinderelag namub haanum 
Mwnwg bwrm cw tulug alam pikanum hvbmab akwn gvkam kvtaqmanum 
Kokwjaqho, lvpw atwg nyega ko hv Sinderelan gvka tvk hvl benum 
Luxuq ak hv mwnwn al ho kvtaqkvlaqjaq kunum 
Lvpw atwg nyega ko hv vcjaqb hemp kunum 
Sinderelag an cw hvla bwrm cw bulv lomknum 
Lvpw atwg nyega ko hv Sinderelan hvraqb aby jaq kunum 
Ho mwv mwnwn nyem naaknv mwg lvpwb wwgkunv,
ho bulv hemp al jaqnbo imiq akvb swwknum 
RAMPELISTILISKIN
Mood gol arobo aam pwrnbo ak doonum,
mwv kangamjaqnbo nyemko ak doonum 
Aal log gol,
Mwam lvpw atv goqnum 
Aam pwrnbo ak hv lvpw atwg namub lwgkam wwkamab,
Mwv tvmdwrnum 
Hendwr hempwr mab,
Ho, mwv cooikab doos sanamam opaqpel
hvl lvpw atam betomnum 
‚ÄúNgoqg nyemkov aam piil hoqgv hun pwlindvn‚Äù
Ham tatwl lvpw at hv aam pwrnbo mwam xibin yainup hvl mwwnum 
Lvpw atv aam pwrnbo ham benum,
‚ÄúHv aljab nyilabo ak go, ngo ham tatwl hempdo,
Noqg benam hvb noqg nyemko hv nyijaq dvnlo,
Aramam ngoqg namso mwnwn boata,
ho ngo mwnwn mvka mvtayin‚Äù
Aal loogin ho,
Aam pwrnbo hv mwg nyemko ham lvpw atwg namub boanum 
Hoq mod daraho,
lvpw at hv mwnwn aam piil vi jaqgo doonbo cwrwgol boanum 
Hoq cwrwho hog asaq doma hvbmab aam piil pwrmwqnan ak dootwqnum 
‚ÄúSija, no pwrob tuku‚Äù
hvl lvpw atv manwn beknum,
‚Äúho suyig aiso no soq aam piil mwlwsam hunub pwk mablo,
no sidub nyitain ‚Äù
Hoq kokwb, lvpw at hv mwvjaq atv cwrw ham heqtumtvl,
mwn roxon doonnum 
Ho, arobo aam pwrbog kangam albo nyemko
hog ak kam cengma
hv hogub nyil aam piilam hunub pwstainvyu hvl mwwl doonum 
Mwn bos soknv soknv,
ho mwnwg vjv tumlubtvl xabl dooknum 
Haqmapagol, vyapv yabkol ho nyi otubo ak haanum 
Mwg vjv puulubo svcaq hoqg mvnam,
hoq lvgab lwcwbo ngv neelwqnamgo 
Mwg dumpo ho mwg bopiangv pulubo ho lwcwbog porog vm hoqg xwqlwqnum 
Mwg alaq lvqbw ak ho gwwn nan beqnyiangv bwwnum 
‚Äú Albo oyum,
Aam pwrnbog nyemko,
hog gab no xabl doodwn‚Äù hvl mwnwn toxnum 
‚ÄúAya!‚Äù hvl sogoql nyemko ak hv xabl birwqnum 
‚ÄúNgam soq aam piil tulu sam hunub pwtwk hvpa, hvbmab sam hogub ngo hunub pwstainvyu cengma‚Äù hvl betomnum 
‚ÄúNgo pwjtain‚Äù
hvl bel toxnum,
‚Äú Noqgab ngo sam pwjbalo, no ngam hogv jitain?‚Äù hvnum 
‚ÄúNgoqg rija gvnamsam‚Äù
jitain hvl aam pwrnbo hoqg nyemko hv birwqnum 
Otubo nyi ak hv mwnwg rija gvnamam bvvtwl aam piil pwrnan dookub doanum 
Mwv ai yupw pwrnv ar komc namgob pwrl doonum,
cwrw ho hun roxo kunum 
Hoge anyio go xumlayil mwv ho mwv coikab nyiiknum 
Donyi caalin yikho lvpw atv haaknum,
ho hun tulungam kaatkul lomknum 
Hvbmab ham kaatkul vigoya mvmdub mwwnum 
Ho mwv aam pwrnbog nyemko ham cwrw rwtyanbo gol boanum,
hoq cwrw hv aam pilv nampw ho doonum,
ho mwv benum,
‚ÄúHo no doato,
Ho habmabde,
ho suyig uraso, aram Donyi caalin madab
no sam pwryumto,
hvbmabalo, no sidub yitain ‚Äù
Vp cwkwb doonbo nyemko hv hogub nyitayik nuyu hvl mwn mwwnum,
ho mwn xabrab kunum 
Hvbmab oyumadab, vyapv yabkonum ho otubo nyi ak hv hvraqb haal mwnwg dook ho daqanum 
‚ÄúNgo soq mwlw sam hunub pwrjbalo no ngam hogv jitain?‚Äù hvl toxnum 
Mwv benum,
‚ÄúNgo ngoqg lvqc sam jitain‚Äù
hvl birwqnum 
Otubo nyi ak hv lvqcam naal
ho pwrkho atwq ho doanum
Ho mwv pwrknv,
pwrknv mwlw aam piilv niiknum ho cwrwhv hun roxo kunum 
Ho coikab nyinv otubo nyi ak hv lwgta niiknum 
Ar kon akwn ho lvpw atv haayikho,
mwv byoql doonbo hunam kaatkul mwv hemp jaqknum 
Hvbmab mwv hvraqb xumtmanum 
Mwv mwwnum,
‚ÄúMwn aam pwrnbog nyemko sujakam,
gvda gvtso mwnwn nyet yanbo nyem kaaparam‚Äù
Ho aam pwrnbog nyemko ham cwrw rwtyanbo akho hvraqb bool wwgnum,
aam piilv cwrw mwlwho doonum,
soq moods mwv benum,
‚ÄúSam no hunub pwbalo, nam ngo nyem natayin 
Ngo aram Donyi caalinyam hvraqb haatain‚Äù hvl benum 
Ho mwv mwnwg hoqgv lengleqkunum 
Hvdlo nyemkohv vpub dooyikho,
otubo nyi ak hv lwumdvb haanum,
ho nyemko hv hvraqb xabl doodub kaapanum 
Mwv toxnum,
‚ÄúSo mood akso ngo aam piil sam pwrj balo, no hogv ngam jitain?‚Äù
‚ÄúAya, ngo jis dokmalak‚Äù
hvl nyemko ak hv birwqnum 
‚ÄúHolokam, hvl no dingrto
hvdlo no lvpw atwg nyemub nyiykukan,
no noqg otuqjag koam ngam jitain‚Äù
‚ÄúHiyv cengdwn, ngo lvpw atwg nyemdub nyikam suiyv ma nyimab nyikamsuiyv‚Äù
hvl aam pwrnbog nyemko hv mwwnum 
Ho mwn mwg benam hvb mwn dingr kunum,
ho mwv lwgta doakul aam piil mwlwngam hunub pwjkunum 
Ho mwg otuqho nyinam hvbkalam mwv coikab nyiiknum 
Hedlo ar komc ho,
lvpw atwg mwwkjaqb hvb hunam kaapatukul,
mwv aam pwrnbog nyemko ham mwwg nyemub naaknum 
Ho aam pwrnbog nyemko hv lvpw atwg nyemub nyiknum 
Vnyi nyiig kokwho,
lvpw at gvla lvpw atwg nyem ho ko kaangam jaqnbo ak dooknum,
Lvpw atwg nyem hv mwnwg dingr kunamam mwpakumab nyiknum ho hemp alvb swwl dooknum,
Aal gol hoq otubo nyi ak hv lvpw atwg nyemko yubkho haanum
Ho benam,
ho dingrnumam jitkub hvl koonum 
Nakur twku,
Lamknv lvpw atwg nyem hv mwnwg koam cegabtukul mwnwg nyet mwlw ngam nasto hvbmab koam roxo komab hvl beknum 
Ho an ak hv mwnwg haanv duqpiqdukun hvb xabl dooknum 
Kokw jaqho,
otubo nyi ak hv ania mwwpakunv,
mwnwn benum,
‚ÄúNam aal loumgo jigyin, no ngoqg eminam cengbalo,
no noqg koam pvvlatain‚Äù hvl benum 
Ho lvpw atwg nyem ak hv ai yupw yubkmab,
mwnwg taka takamanam nyi eminam mwwrob kunum 
Aal looginho otubo nyi ak hv hvraqb haanum,
lvpw atwg nyem ak hv mwnwg emin cengnam mwlwngam beknum 
Akin kokw akin,
Hebmab lwx cer ho otubo nyiv
hv ngoqg eminma‚Äù hvl benum 
Ar komc akwn ho,
mwnwg lvpw mwlwho eminam jikum tvk hvl pui jilin kunum 
Loogin ho hedlo otubo nyi ake,
Loogin ho emin taka taka manam nookum nam mwlwngam lvpw atwg nyem ak hv benum 
Hvbmab,
emin ax ceram tatwl,
mopwgnv, hv ngoqg eminma‚Äù hvl benum 
‚ÄúMa,
Hv ngog emin ma hepa,
Aal lowumdvn ho,
emin nokumbo tulu hv haal hoge beepa,
‚Äúngo nit emin tapa kuma,
hvbmab nyora gol ngo wwl yvyikho,
putu lwkwgol,
ngo nam namnyokobo ak kapanum 
Nam hagaho wmv pvrnum,
wmho almanbo nyi otubo ak juqdu-juqbabl,
al lvkinho juql ho bemin bel doonum 
Solo ngo opo mvl ecin mvl doosjaqkam,
Aramam ngo lvpw atwg koam natayin 
Ho albogab,
hiyekam betomram,
Ngoqg eminv Rampelistiliskn hvl ‚Äù
Oh! Ham tapa tukul lvpw atwg nyem ak hv hvdjaqgo hvmp sukbayv!
Hoq kokw daraho, otubo nyi ak hv haal toxnum,
‚Äú sija betomto Lvpw atwg nyem,,
ngoqg eminv hogv?‚Äù
Ho lvpw atwg nyem ak hv surjaqb nyil,
mwg emin jaqgam bemab
asaq emin tulungam beikam,
otubo nyi ak hv, ‚ÄúHv, nga eminma‚Äù
Ho mwv hemp kunum, lvpw atwg nyem hv mwnwg koam jitayukbo hvl 
Otubo nyi akwg hemp numam hempatvl lvpw atwg nyem ak hv hempkunv,
sogoql benum, ‚ÄúHvvlokam,
noqg eminv Rampilistiliskin‚Äùhvl
Ham tada tukul,
otubo nyi ak hv vcjaqb hang lengl jvrobkunum,
‚ÄúNam almanbo gwwnbo nyijirv betam pade!‚Äù hvl bel
mwv sogoq circir kunv mwwg lvbwq alv duknv alv urab hoyum daqdub dunum 
Ho, vcjaqb hang lengknv,
mwg alaq leqnye mwg al lvcam pul atam taqnygob swrc sunum 
Ho Rampelistiliskin nyomab nyiknv wwknum ho mwam lwgkam tapakumanum 
Ho lvpw atwg nyem ak hv mwnwg ko lvgab hempub swwl dooknum 
KAPEQ-KAYEQNAM VP
Mood akgol,
Gwwnbo dvn ak doonum,
mwnwg kov nyega ko oumgo doonum 
Bul oumv lwkin gob dool ho vigo abyminsnum,
hvbmab bulug anv bulam mwgw manum,
ho mwn mwwsnum bulv mwnwg atoram nareqtai hvl 
Hvb mwwsil,
mwnwg ko vbw jaq ham xokumb mvnum,
ho mwam wlw lwpwqgol doomnum,
ho donyi pool aoho jwrkarl yvnamam lwxiam kapanum 
Mwnwg ko vnydvn ham nguiyub mvnum,
hv swnwq uraho doonum,
ho mwam lwkin lwkin gob iss aob jvrlin namam kapanum 
Ko vx cvrv, aal loogam swlw duur vnygobtw nyia kob nyilanum

mwwg anv mwam almanbo svdin gob mvyadela
mwv coikab kisil nyileqnum

ho mwnwn mvdar kodwb mwwl dodwn hvl,
Hiyv ham mvdardvb mwdwn, hv atwg swwgam mwwxatvl nyidub nyidwn hvl tapanum 
Yaapa Camnyil oumgo ham mvdartanv hentwrjaql siknum,
ho sija akin gotwq nyikadub nyidkun hvl benum 
Ho mwv mwg haangv hog gokam bosmanum,
ho mwv Dony Hun Nam ham mepadub mwwrobnum 
Aado mood gob mwv wwldoonum hvbmab hoq nam ham kapamanum,
ho hoq nyega ko ak hv nyora ura jaq gol haaknum 
Mwv nyoro hoqgv lengdkub nyidul dooyikho, haqmapagob nyil,
mwv nyiixamjam vnygo haatwk hvl hoqyap namam kapanum 
Mwv hvdlo bulug dookub hvnwq yikho,
bulv mwam begomv,
‚ÄúNgunyv kucuqbo bopia ak gab yolu dumin sudwn,
si hi gab dooyindo

ngunyv hiyvnvkam mvya mins lama 
Aniobo nyiv ngulam cox yaadwn,
ho no bedar kaatna‚Äù
‚ÄúNunyv kucuqbo bopia gab hog gab yolu dumin sudwn?‚Äù
hvl yaapa ak hv toxnum 
‚ÄúNo cengmab bedla, soq bopia si hvdgo ator doodwn ham cengmab!‚Äù
hvl nyiixamjam akwn hv benum

‚ÄúSoqsi alub swwnan bopiangv

hoglo ho wwnwdvn,
nyiyaqb-nyiqpyio ho atwg mwwkho wwcdvn‚Äù hvl betomnum

hvdlo nunyiam goqykam, nunyv lyoka suto 
nunyv lyoka suto

Mwv bopiangam gvtwl ho wwl doonum 
Mwv wwdul dooyikho,
mwv lvpw atwg nyem koam mwwpanum ho nyiixamjam vnyiam mwwpakumanum 
Aniogo wwda kalam mwv mwwg hang urajaqho mwwnum,

‚ÄúAh, ngo Dony Hun namwb wwc nyoja‚Äù hvl mwwnum,

meg urab haaknum ho cwrw mwlwho wwl,
lvpw atwg nyem ko ham kappama dedib wwl doonum

vnyiqkv nyiqlwtvl ,
ho duumv lwci-poriaqtvl doonum 
lvpw atwg nyemko ak hvyv?‚Äù

hvl mwnwn mwjwmab toxnum 
‚ÄúVv,
ngo‚Äù hvl birwqnum,
‚ÄúHvbmab soq si ngoqg ww-apoma

Ho mwv benum,

ngo hog gokam bosmadwn‚Äù

ho ngo ngoqg jvqtw apob nyitayukun‚Äù

‚Äúsoqgab nyiv vigo sinkun 
No yaapa xeqdo ngo vigo noqgab mwdwqdo hoggab no hoqg atoram mvrwq nyotain ‚Äù
‚ÄúNo mwdwqmab‚Äù
hvl mwv mwnwn binyubnum 
‚ÄúHam nyila mvmab hog ak kam ngam mvtor nyoram‚Äù

ngo nam betomtain‚Äù
hvl mwn birwqnum 
‚ÄúHvdlo no soqg nam putu soqgv geepoqyin,
pobu soyoqgol talin ak kaapatain

no ham mvyakul mengkbalo,
gwwnbo pvta ak hoq hoqgv jvrlintain

ho hoq pwpho kapeq-tayeqbo vp ak pwp pwmub nyitwl dotain

ho jwrobdub nyinum,

hv domwq aoo ho xarldw bonge,

mwg hiibu hoqgv mwam vcjaqb pal
mwv vcjaqv,
pwpv yoql ma dedib panum

hvdlo swnwq hoqgv issv huqrob yikho,

RAPUNJEL
Mood gol,
twrngumbo imiq ak doonum 
Bule ko doomab vigo dooknum 
Bulug nam anioko pupum hoqgv kaalinyin,
Bulv baaluho kaangam jaqnbo opu anyinv hoge swn ngekam kaapanum 
Hog hv,
Hvbja kaangamnum hvbmab bvlyv ngam taqtumnum
ho bosbanv hiyvkam ho halamanum, hoggab, hoqho jwqr nyinbo dvnv bvlyv nge,
mwn almanbo atorv doogamgab mwlwngv ho haadub bosnum 
Aal log gol dvn ak hv mwnwg pupum ho daqlinnum,
ho mwv kapapa kaangam jaqnbo Rapunjelam nen svn hoge yubtaq ngam 
Hoqhv jeneqtvl kaangam jaqnum ho mwn ham nvnwnum,
ho tugin mwn dvnwjaqnum 
Hoq ham nyidul logya-log vi yayanum,
ho mwn ham ak kam nalayima hvl cengtwl,
ham nyilakumab mwdwq jaqlayil,
ho mwn sengxukunv lwcikul mwdwqjaqkunum

mwnwn toxnum,
‚ÄúNo hog nvkamja no mwdwqdvn,
ngo nywxwngv?‚Äù

‚ÄúNgulug bollu taqcgonwg ,
ngo sitayuk‚Äù hvl mwn birwqnum

mwg nywxwngam aby jaqnum

ngo mwn gab Rapunjel lo ak naajdvb nyipa‚Äù

nyibiajaqb nyil Rapunjel haatamgo twrnum,
ho mwg nywxwngam jinum

ho looginho mwn hamya koi yab dvnwyaknum

ho mwv hvrqb baalub geebokunum

mwv vcjaqb bosnum,
hoggab hvblo mwwg dookjaqho jwqr nyinbo dvn ak hv daql doonum

‚Äú Ngoqg nyimuram opaqtub, ngo sam naadvbjaq nyigam gab naapan 
ngo sam naadvbjaq nyigam gab naapan

hv benum

ngo nam namtain ho no hvdgo nvnwdo no hvdgo nalahe

jwqr nyinbo hv haaknum,
ho koam Rapunjel hvl emin pvvknum,

hoq nam hv vbia gokam dooma ho vyab gookam doomanum,

‚ÄúRapunjel, Rapunjel,
noqg dumpyiam ngoqgab topoqto‚Äù hvl goqnum

loqd camnygob asodvb topoqjinum,
ho jwqr nyinbo hv ham gvbwl sencanum

Hoqhv Rapunjel,
Hv mwv vpvb ngam,
Nyis domab tangambo guulylvgab mood dooyikam bemin bel doonum,

ho namub caodub vyap kagaqnum,
hvbmab ak kam mwv kapamanum

mwv jwqr nyinbog haanam kapanum ho
hvl benamam tal doonum

hvl mwwnum

hoggab xox ak hv aalam haagamgab

"Ngam betumto,

hvl jwqr nyinbo xox ak hv xabal sogoqnum 
‚ÄúNgo hogv noqg benamam tadudvn?

Mwn hang lengkbanv mwnwg alaqkv Rapunjelwg kaangamjaqnbo dumpyiam peetukunum

Hoge dumpyiam peetukunum

jwqr nyinbo dvn ak hv Rapunjelwg kaangam jaqnbo dumpyiam,

pupum hoqg svda ho hoqtutvl
lvpw atwg ko tuup ak ham kaayal doonum

mwv jwqr nyinbo hamya doodub kaapakunum, ho mwam almanbog yoqciqkv mwam hutin kunum 
‚ÄúAha‚Äù, hvl bel mwn mwam nyirnyiakul,

hass nge baqg nekba,
ho noqg vniqk hvkam kaapakuram 
Noqg Rapunjel dookma 
No mwnwn lwgkam kaapakuram‚Äù

hvbmab mwwg vnyiqho taa ngv nwqlwqnum

TAPAM PULU HO OTUBO KVN
Mood gol, lvpw atwg nywxw hv nyemko kaangam jaqnbo ak ko bvvnum 
Mwn kaangam jaqnum,
vnyiqkv jvne pempyiamtvl ho dumv kayatvl asoo jaqnum 
Mwnwg epinv pulutvl ho kaangam jaqnum ho mwnwg nobcirv ui lwci nam hvbjaq nyinum 
Lvpw atwg nywxw hv mwnwn Tapam Pulu hvl emin num 
Vnyi nyiiny nyiyum kokwso,
Tapam Pulug anv siknum ho mwnwg abv hvraqb nyem ak naaknum 
Lvpw atwg nyit nywxw,
Tapam Pulug an ci,
hv kaangam jaq dvn akvb nyinum,
hvbmab mwn aljaqma bvkam nyinum 
Mwlwngam opaqtvl,
mwn gvda soqg mwlwg dvnam kaangam yaadub mwwnum 
Lvpw atwg nywxw hv gwwnbo vrsy ak doognum hv jvqtwngam benub logkam apaqman 
Aal loxiam,
mwn hoq vrsy ho kaatwl ho,
‚ÄúVrse, vrse, xapnam,
hiyvjaq mwlwngam kaangam yado?‚Äù
Ho vrsy ak hv lwxiam birqnam,
‚ÄúNotwq paku, lvpw atwg nyemv,
mwlwngam no kaangam yaapa‚Äù
Lvpw atwg nywxw hv ham tatwl vcjaqb hempnum 
Vnyi nywg yaya nywg yaya,
Tapam Pulu kangam yaya kangam yayanum 
Aal log gol,
mwnwg an ci hv vrsyiam kaal ho,
‚ÄúVrse, vrse xapnam,
‚ÄúVrse, vrse hiyv mwlwngam kaangam yaado?‚Äù
Ho vrse birwqnv,
‚ÄúNoopa, no kaangam jaqdo,
hv jvqtwngv,
hvbmab Tapam Pulu nam sija kaangam yaadku‚Äù
An ci ak hv kaneqkunum ho mwnwg ko ci ham mempaqdub mwwrob kunum 
Mwnw mwnwg nyera ak gon goqbnv,
‚ÄúTapam Pulun nyoro ura gol bool,
nam soqgv aadob booxarl ho mempaqta 
Mwnwg haangam peelinl ngam bvatab‚Äù
Nyera ak hv vcjaqb mwdwq kunum 
Lvpw atwg namho doonbo mwlwg nyinam hvb,
Tapam Pulu nvn mwvkam vigo abynum, hvbmab mwv cengpaku goml jinamam tadvb nyidku hvl Mwv Tapam Pulun nyoro urajaq gol bool wwgnum ho hvdlo mwv yoqciqkam naalinl mengta yikho,

ngo dingdwn‚Äù

Ator kumanum,
vp cwkw ho kanokunv,
vcjaqb mwn xabrob kunum

aaxy-amar dvl kano sitamab hvl meekarnum

vyapvkam aniungko,

ho twws pvtaqho ho dvsv hukuho doonum

Yvnv doolaram atoryaamadvn
Yaapa nyi akhv nyirkbanv buqpurkunum
Sircubnanv ngoqg jaketho swrtup kunum
Vnyig nyem-nyega naaknamv mwnyi oxyaminskunum
Bulug an-abv ngulug an-abam hoox-nyekam yaado

Hvb nyiba lookam ngo lyuuxapaku
Japanho 43go nyigbov doodwn

Bulv nyika layil cengdwb nyidul doonum aal ya ai 
Bulv svn naleq jaqb kartabnum hulu mwdwb 
Bulb mwwg nyij ngam al jaqn gob abynum kor anyo mwdwb henam nga 
Bulv aby mins kunum hwdlo bulg vnyiq nge kaareq mins dukho 
Bulv nyeba jab agam gooreq gootaq rabkunum 
Bulv mwwnum bulg nyin bo nge mvya taiku hvl 1860 ho 
Bulv sv ngam wmin gwnum haapa ho kabw 
Bulv nyem-nyega naamin suknum hwdlo anyo dukho 
Bulv ang mood ho goorubdwb nyinum aram 
Bulv popum hoge iss ho puqleqnum 
Bulv mwlw ngam cengnum v ham cengdwb nyinum 
Bulv wknum nyil doonam nge nyiyum maadab 
Bulv twngk anyo hoge nyin twknum 
Bulv benum bulam vpb apaq twqtub hvl 
Bulv nyiba jab goodo ngo cenglama 
Bulv mwv hospital baqnum soqh og swkwr ko gab

Bulv Olympic sook ho nyibadwb mwwnum 
Bulv vm ngam mutum dwb lekin gob nyinum 
Bulv pui pota xeqdaqnum akin-akin ngam nyiba nyibab 
Bulv ngul hoge leoum go koi yatapa

No dictionary ngam nyindvb nyinyoqdvb nyipa 
No Tomgv nyium ngam kanyilokam hwdlo mwv cengpa yukho 
No hinlwqdvb nyitayin hoq nyituqkam hatumam riyum yukam 
No kvtaq jaqb cengdvb nyido no Tom nen hoggabkam yolu ruqmadab 
No hang hengleq madwb jaq nyido kinlo kappa mins jaqd hoq nyinam hvb kelam 
No hog ak nyitis mwmado ngulvkam hog gokam nyiram 
No sol donyi tab yukam sob hanyi tayinyv? "om, ngo mwdo ngo nyinyi tayin hvl "
No so uraso hanum? " ngo pupum ao hogv gecalayil hanum "
Ngo pwrl dooden Tom nen svkadvb kaar dvcodwb "hog hv al mwjma "
Tom vi ata go mwleq doonum" v, ngo ha kaanum "
Tom vnyw camum akam ngeku  "mwv jvqtw jaqb hwd akam ram padey, mwv hvbyv?"
Ngulv hoq pagoq ham Tom nen betam dwb nyipa sija  "hv daqye ko pagoq doomapa "
Ngog vrs nge hoglo nyaku? "no bulam dotaq ao ho apaqnum "
No ngam coffee petaq go naj nyiotayinyv? "hemp lvgab, ngog tumanam "
Ngog ajin ak midul doodo hiyv akgon mwv French agam golaqdwn 
Alub nyaanbo roxongv altwqdo, anyo mood uraho wctayin swnyiq lwkw ho 
Nyingv hwdwg axatayin hvbkalam mwdo, hoqgv nyemv hogub akamdvn hvbkalam kacydo 
Nity jaqg nokum num, sipy jaka sudub nyikho 
Silvar nyem nanam okum mam sogdvn nywyw cvmnyleq nywng vnyw nyem bodam 
Bulq bewa bebanyilokam, hoqg nyega ko hv al jaqb bemin belaqdvn hvl
Ngoqg vyap mutum ko dukho, Ngo mwgampa ngo ngog sabi ngam apaq kunmey 
Aso jaqb bemin suho dukho, Atur ania ho ngo mwvn gaqdwb bebwq kunum 
Pool pin kokw ho, mwv herab nyijir lvgab agam gorab kunum 
Mwg bank poissa ngv wyum dukho, Mwv mwwg lvpia ho lokda daqrab nyok manum
Nyob paxo kokwho, Mwlwq-hengleq nyiwa doodvb mwj ngv Japan gwda ho paaknum 
Mwlw nyijir yunam ngv dotaq akin ho Cafeteria ho doodvn
Bulv abw-bor gob nyitwl kam, Bulv agam gomin sumab doonum 
Kaanam ngv ngog lvpia lukuk gwma nam ngv mwvn vs-axaq dvb nyinum hoqg luxi hoqgv 
No cengdvnyv Okinawa ngv China ngam ogum yadvn hvl Honshu hogv?
No jvqtw jaqb betam dvyv Tom lusaq gwda hoqgv haanbo ngv hvl?
Hwdlo ganta ngv pabeq daikuho Porey reqbo ngv class urab haknum 
Mwlw atuq ho mwv nit nam ho donyoqdvb vs-axaqnum 
Gwda asaq-asaq nyingv dokum ho naleq go hanum 
Dvrab ngam nam-nam ho baqc jidvn pool atuq hoq beleq nam ngam 
No ngam moi bemanumyv no sol dugub ram hvl?
No mwjwdvnyv gwda og ngam ngv nyiwa ko nyij-wj hogv hvl?
No TV katam nam lu ngam xeqlin dvb mwyadvnyv?
No mwgab payv hoqg dubai emin ngam ngog swg ngam dorn bo ngam?
No noqg mood ngam noqg ajin lvgab doyadvnyv ma noqg imiq nyi lvgab?
No mwdnwyv dvs swab swmabo ngv swg gab vs-vxaq tayin hvl?
No mwd nwyv no noqg atwg vs-axaq ngam ap ngv nyilin tayin hvl?
Tom sija godab Mary lvgab hvvi aal ngam agab wbadvnyv mwvg nyik nam hvb?
Noqg atwq mwnam ngam nog bon nyik lamta ho ham mabka 
Tom nvn tamabeka, Mwv cengmadvn mwv hogam agam gol doodvn 
Mwvn pupum ngam mutub ko gab laqm baqm mab  Mwvm bendvb nyima

Hoq lvgab hogv ngulv nyitadvn?
No Bostonso hogv nyidwn?
No Kristmasgab hogv no nyidub mwwdo?
Nam urangv hogub nyinbogo?

Joonwg pagoqham Meeri hogam Tomwn betomnum?
No muyum oyumho hogv nyitwn?
Soolog aal dvsho no hogv dvtwn?
Oloq tulu alam no hog hvl bedwn?
Tomwg namam no hoghvl mwwdo?
No ngam hog pagoqkam kvvnwdo?
Doonudv moodam no hogv nyidwn?
Noqg suyitkeesho hogv no pvvpan?
No hogamja vigo xwwl dvnwdvn?
Wjw aal tulungam no hogamja nyinwdvn?
Aal dvsam hogam no dvnwdvn?
No soyam hogv nyidub mwwdo?
Mood ak doonunamam hogv no bedo?

Tom hogam mwwdo hvl no mwwdo?
Soqg nyidub mwwnamsam no hogub mwwdo?
Oloq nyi tulu alam no hog hvl mwwdo?
Soqg suitarsam no hogub mwwdo?
Soqsi hog hokv pwpa hvl no mwwdo?
Wjw aal tulungam hogv no nyikydvn?
Aal dvsam no hogv dvkydvn?

Aal dvsam no hogv dvnwdo?
Ham no hognvkgab cengtws hvl mwwdo?
Tom ham hog nvkgab nyinwdo?
Tom hogv Meerin betso hvl mwwdo?
Tomwg nit kaarv hogub kaanamgo?

Ngoqlvgab soqsi hogv nyitayin?
Ngululvgab soqsi hogv nyitayin?

Mwv ngoqg acig ajin jingbwjaqkv 
Mwv doktorv ho gon xeqnbovkam 
Mwv agum gomng go belaqdvn 
Mwv ura jaaj jaadub bosdvn 
Mwv lwxiam ngam nyimuram kaapadvn 
Mwv lwxiam haadsanam ham mwwl doodwn 
Mwv kompaniho ekontent akub nyidwn 
Mwv mwwg nyegakoog nyinam ham kaatwl hvnyi jaqdwn 
Mwv hogub nyijaqkam lwg haakytayin 
Mwv Londonho doomalo Parisho dookytayin 
Mwv ngoqg bwrmam nyem begaqpan 
Mwv otuqhvb hvnyibo nyegakoob nyikma 
Mwv bosy sokyboma 
Mwv art ham nyidub hwrciloodama 
Mwv metametik ham vigo cengma 
Mwv namub wwl doonudvb mwwnum 
Mwv arodo, hvbmab mwv lwgkam haqma 
Mwv lwgin iskulho doomab nyinum 
Mwv at hoqg seketereb nyinum 
Mwwgv nyegakov oumgo doodwn 
Ngoqg kaayal doonam nyi akv mwvpa 
Mwv vnyi nyiiywbo nyega akvb nyistvl surjaqdo 
Telipun haanamham mwv kaayal doodo 
Mwam ngulv atv pwsbo nyi akv hvl bedwn 
Mwwg boon nyinam ham wwleqtayi hvl mwv bosynum 
Mwv ngam vigo kaayal doomdub nyipan 
Mwv cumdwkam atv twwxwl sisnum 
Nyiam hogub berwqtayin ham mwv cengdo 
Mwv takamanam rwxw-gomga dunam vigo cengdwn 
Mwv ajin jingla jaqdwn 
Mwv ektor akub swwlaq loodama 
Mwv nam hoqgv piindvn moodho lengnum 
Mwv mwwg kitapam hatyho holmvnum 
Svpuram opaqtvl mwv svdin mwlwngam abydvn 
Mwv boolungam kaal doodub abyjaqdwn 
Mwv goonbo lwkwjaqb hvvnwql tanum 
Mwv ngulug hoqgv lamtangam wwbol taqcgonho doodwn 
Mwv sookumko bwwyir kvtaqho doopan 
Mwv swlw duur akgob mwwg kitapam meegaqnum 
Mwv mwwg vbwham boryab kaado 
Mwv haang lengkbanv ho nyegakoam kwnum 
Mwv nyimurpa ho cumdwkam twwpan 
Mwv lwxiam nyinam hvb, mwv nyimur ak nyipan 
Mwv doktor akjaqb nyidub mwwrkunum 
Mwv ngulam ai kan namgob boon nyimnum 
Klasgab mood jaqkam hvvcdub nyikynum 
Ngoqg kaagaqnam nyi akv mwv jaqpade 
Mwv mwwg an-ab dook hoqgv lengknum 
Mwv lwxiam Japanb wwl kwm-kor mvkynum 
Mwv mubuq ham rooxe nvvnwnum ho soominum 
Mwwg nyiqtuq lengnam hv mwwg an-abwg svkakogab nyipan hvl benum 
Mood kaan nan kor kooijaqnbo ak mwv gvnum 
Aal dvsam mwv potaho puucinum 
Mwwg ekontho mwv twnk jilwqnum 
Ngam kaapamab mwv wwbonum 
Mwv interens ekjam ham paasnum 
Mwwg mwwkjaqho mwv testam paasnum 
Sookho mwv aniogobo nyinam akvb nyimin gvnum 
Mwv kvn akam lwumgob soonum 
Taabaram tv doodo hvl mwv lvqcingam ciknum 
Mwv tayinam mwwg cuk hoqgv pulinum 
Mwv mwwg acam nyibiayab xarnum 
Mwv jvqtwjaqb giitaram soodub abyjaqpa 
Mwwg kwm-koram mwwg nyegako tuulu lvgab nyinum 
Mwv nyibiajaqb hookurtayin hvl mwv benum

"Kuj micung moodgob doonutvj" hvl mwv benum 
Atv mensul sinam hvvtwq lamtago hvl mwv kaapasuknum 
Nyinyuqkogab mwv atv mwwg dumpongam axaqsunum 
Mwv aal loopwho pui xeqnamham meekarnum 
Mwv kaanamv hog ak kam soocinma

Mwv kontemporari lvr-takam poorydvn

Mwv mwwg kaan nan ham naapaqtvl hoq kookwb 
Mwwpamab mwv asaq teren hoya caapnum

Mwv ar komcam pooryl mwwkaal doodwn 
Mwv pencilam ponyujaqnam ak lvgab nyin nadwn 
Mwv nyi sookumkoho ar roxiam wwgaql yvdwn

Doogum dooi nyigumgab mwv haamanum 
Mwam twnk nyiwq-nyitopan hvl ruum humnum 
Mwv lwxiam nyi tuulug dayab nyin-wwnum

Mwam atv goodwrsuinup hvl mwwnum

Mwv dookum hoqg doogbo akv

Suyumg agub wwl dvnamsam hogub mvtayin?
Tomla Meeri buny alub doobasudwi?

Opisho hogub nyido?

Teren xarnukoho hogub ngo wwtayin?
Sokv ngo hogub svdin tumkumkob wwtayin?

Hogub nyil ngo mood xikjaqho nyiumtayin?
Hogub nyil no ngam abykumadvn?
Hogub nyil Tom vcdo hvl no belapan?
Hogub nyil ngulv soqg vs-axaqso haapan?
Hogub nyil no soqg twnksam haagpan?

Hoqhv nyitayi hvl no hogub cengpan?
Hogub nyil no vcloodab narl soolaqpan?
Hogub nyil no Tokyoho doolayaadwn?
Hogub nyil sam koam ngulv betomlatayikun?
Mwwg nyiqtuq nyilin lamanumam hogub nyil betomlatayikun?
Hogub nyil no aljaqnbo doktoram xuqladvn?
Hogub nyil no hvb beladvn?
Galf olo nyob panamam hogub no mwwdo?
Hogam no nyiyindvn ham no hogub nyil cengdwn?
No atv swwdub hogub no mwwdo?
Hogub nyil no noqg nitbo namham abydvn?
Inglisho "kaisha" hvl benam ham hogub no bedwn?
Noqg gvvdaho doonyi-poolv hogub nyidwn?
Dookumho hvd moodnamgob no dootayin?
So Tom hvd hoqgv boon nyil doopan?
Hvd hoqgv no ngam kaal doopan?
Hvd hoqgv no ngulam kaal doopan?
Soqg vs-axaqsi hvd hoqgv nam nyipan?
Nunyv hvd hoqgv nyem-nyega begaqminspakun?
Bostonho no hvd moodgob boon nyil doopen?
Olo wwcdub hvd mood gob nyiyindo?
Inglis agumam gomkgo no cengdo?
Noqg laiberiho kitapv taqkgo doodo?
No huku kuqkgo vcin dvtnum?
Swcir kuqkgo no dvpen?
Noqg ajin jingbwngv akgo doodwn?
Tvtomnanho megajinv hvdgo doodo?
So noqg honynamv akgo doodo?
Luxuqkv hvdgo nooqgv doodo?
Noqg dookumho nyiv hvdgo haanum?
Sendhucv hvdgo dvngongv doodo?
Ma hvl hvdgo ngo betayin?
No olo lwkgo wwnum?
Ham nyidub hvdgo nyiangv doodwn?
No so hvd vnyigo doopakun?
Ngoqg ikyam aspirin hvdgo ngo jitayin?
Kaar hwrxako hvdgo no mvlatayin?
Hoqg doony kaan nan hoqg korv hvd do?
Vj hoqgab hvdgo koram no bepan?
Mwlwngam kor kooi yaanbo kaarv hvd dvn?
Soqg cwrwsoqg korv hvdgopan?
Tom nam twnk hvdgo jitayin hvl dingrnum?
Twnk hvdgo no boon nyil nvvnwdo?
Porcnam hvdgo nam jinum?
Hvdgo no noqg an-abam pun mvdwn?
Noqg profayilam hvdgo no xeqdardvn?
Hvdgo no noqg vjam niixaqdvn?
Vs-axaqkam hogub nyil nyitayin?
Bostonho otuqjaqb noqg aiho hogub nyinum?
Nam kwbalo no hogub nyiyindo?
Idin peemwqnamam hvdgo no nyinwdvn?

Nyibiajaqb, ho no baasam wwptayin 
Nyibiab, hvbmalo no baasam wwplaram 
Nyibiab, hvbmalo no terenam wwplaram 
Nyibia! Ngulgv moodv vigo dookma

Tomwn ngo soolo nyibiajaqb wwmdub jipan 
Punia lvgab ngo dvmadukub nyidatatkun 
Ngo rediyongam takmab nyidatatkun 
Ngo lwxiam haaba yoqciqkam bakydvn 
Ngo lwxiam Franc ham alub mvkydvn 
Ngo bees loqlum acam hoqg nyi akv 
Ngo Huyogo Yunibarsity ho poorybo akv 
Ngo pobungam swwroblatayin 
Ngo doonyu keemab nyikydvn 
Mwv nyimurtayi hvl ngo bosydo 
No ham kaapamab nyitayi hvl ngo bosydo 
Ngo ngoqg abwn tox xvdudvn 
Mwv nyimurma hvl ngo mwwjdo 
Ngo aljaqb saqnupaku 
Ngo aaramam Tokyob wwtayin 
Ngo aaramam loqlum sootayin 
Ngo aaramam teenis sootayin 
Noqg ngam svkajigomgab paqyaco 
Kitapgab twnk hiqdub ngo hempdvn 
Ngo mwwg ajinv ho ajin jingkytayin 
Ngo nam kaapadub mwwdul doodwn 
Ngo nyem naapkun ho ngoqgv kov vnygo doodkun 
Vjw aalam ngo lwxiam namho dookymaadwn 
Ngo nyetma, ho ngo nyetdubkam mwwmadvn 
Ngo ngoqg bwrm lvgab soodwn 
Ngo vj niin nan misin ham mvdardvn 
Ngo mood-mooma dooma hoqgab nam ngo svkalaram 
Lizy vcjaqb hvmptayi hvl ngo mwwkydo 
Mwv jvqtwbo nyi akvjaqbo hvl ngo mwwkydvn 
Ngo ngaapaku ho ngo yubtayikun 
Yookasumdub ngo svpuram honygvdwn 
Hoqg pagoqham ngo loomin gvlama 
Puiam tadub ngo hvmpjaqdo 
Atorjaqb boon nyinam hoqgv ngo ngaapaku 
Noosumngam mvkomvdub ngo kaayal doodwn 
Goosam ngo xeqdul doodwn 
Ngo gamsado hoggab ngo yumydo 
Ngo gomcarham xuqgamgab ngoqg nyimuram opaqtub 
Ngo ngoqg heqkonan ham hoggol pvvtba hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngam noqg svqgwnamgab ngo nam paqdwn 
Sool-nyerl nyikho ngo nyibiab hvvc lamanum 
Ngoqg meepanamam Tomwn kaactvk hvl benum 
Ngo Tomwn ngoqg pui bepadub xeqnamsam poory kaatbvk hvl bepan

No Tomwn bekydo hvl ngo mwwkynum 
Tom Meerin kaayado hvl ngo mwwkynum

Ngo asaq dvma hvbmabdv wtwngamla ho bataramtwq 
Ngo akwn ham dvxonum ho kookwb akwn hamkam dvnum 
Ngo mwjwdo mwv doktor akvbo hvl 
Ngo ngoqg ofisgab nitbo dootam ak rvpan 
Ngo ham lamtaho puqkarbo ak hoqgv rvpan 
Ngo kaar sam 10% aniodvb kuml rvpan 
Ngo poorydvb ngoqg kitap meegwn rvpan 
Ngo ngoqg vxiam vxy mvxaqnan ak hoqgv mvxaqdvn 
Ngo ngoqg ayam ogbo ala hoqgv gumpan 
Ngo atam hudul doonbo iss hoqgv tooyaq sunum 
Ar komc akwn ho ngo Tomwn goqnum 
Ngo ngoqg sendhuc hoqgv papogon nam jilatayin 
Xarknam kaar ham ngo rvlaram 
Ngo soqg dunam-xaanam sam meegta talanyoram 
Laabojaqkam ngo 100 doolar gootwq jilatayin 
Ngo hoqg gus tuuluham mwwpalatayin 
Ngo Tomwn Franc agumam alyab beyadvn 
Ngo vigo Afrikan agum tuulugo goolaqdvn

Hogmwlwngam ngo ajin jingbwngam betom latayin 
Ngo iskulho 10 minitho wwclatayin 
Soq vnyiso ngo nit kaar rvnyram 
Sam Tom ngam nyipan hvl ngo mwjwlama 
Nyodongv hvraqb hoodo hvl ngo mwjwlama 
Kokwjaqso sam ngulv mvlapaku hvl ngo mwjwlama 
Sam no looinvp hvl ngo mwwjwlama 
Sam ngam no nyipan hvl ngo mwwjwlam 
No so haatayi hvl ngo micungookam mwwpamaatwn 
Nam ngo ninlwqlaram  Si ngoqg nyimurvs 
Soqg diksonarisam opaqtvl ngo hog ak kam nyilama 
Ngo Tomwn ngamkam goorwqkoolama 
Hvgjaqpa ham ngo nam betomlama

Ngo hoolu luuxiam horxalaram 
Ngo nam atam pwr jixamvlaram

Ngo asaq lamta meekarlakram

Ngo Teenis soocin maadwn hvbkalam Tomkam

Oloq baayum olo ngo iclaram

Soqg pagoqgab ngo cooikab doonylaram 
Tomwg pagoqkam ngo hog ak kam benylaram

Soqg pagoqgab ngo megta hog belaram 
Ngo hvdgo hwrcisudnvyv ham belama 
Ngo hogvxe mwwl doodwn ham betomlama 
Soq moodso ngo sam mwwdarlama 
Sijada ngo mwwg eminam mwwpalama 
Hoggab mwv alam nyispanyv ham ngo mwwclama 
Ngo ngoqg lamkho vvijaqnbov baqnum 
Ngo vigo doktor nyinbo imiq hoqgvpan 
Ngo mwwg nyiqtuq lengknamgab alpa hvl mwam paqpan

Ngo sam atv dvladub bwwanyoram

Ngo hem anioyikho issam alub jaalaqkimpan 
Ngo vpub meeg aal vigo nyilakinum 
Ngo mwam wm twwnam ham mvturlakmaanum

Ngo mwwc-mwwya ak kam mwwlama 
Ngo sam nyipan hoggab sam mwlwngv nyipan 
Ngo sam hvdjaqgo kooipan hvl mwwtma 
Ngo ngoqg vcmaadvb nyipan

Ngo sam hvdjaqgo korv kooyinp hvl mwwtma 
Ngo mwwdar-saqparmab nyitwn 
Ngo kenlwg kvnho Bostonwb wwma 
Ngo sam nyibiajaqb cengma

Tom hogam poorysudnvi ham ngo cengma 
Noqgv nyemko ajinv doodwn hvl ngo cengtma 
Tomwn ngoqg vxy nwrxaqnan ham ngo jima 
Nyi ak kam ngui cwrkam nootunam ngo kaapama 
Ngo hiyamkam betoma, Tom neekama 
Tom haainvp hvl ngo mwwtma 
Kenlwg ileksonho ngo buut jima 
Ngo ham Tomwn vpub nyimdub mwwtma 
Nam ngo noqg baasam wwlvqmvdub mwwma 
Mwn mwnwg namho doodnup hvl ngo mwwma 
Soqg gaqnamsam ngo haqxiajiram 
Ngo noqg eminam naatwn hvl ngo mwjwma 
Tomwn mwwg birnamam ngo alma hvl mwswqjima 
Ngo opu tuulungam vcjaqb hvvmin maadwn 
No ngam svkagv ho svkamaagv ngo hog mwwma 
Ngo ogbo ecinam vigo mwwmadvn 
Hogv noqg an bepan ham ngo hogbvkam mwwjma 
Sam Tom hiyam jipan ham ngo hog mwwma 
Mwv ngam svkayinump hvl ngo mwuma 
Tom sija hogloho doodwn hamkam ngo cengma 
Ngo sam lwgkam nyitintvs hvl mwwma 
Ngo Tomwn lwgta kvvnwkuma 
Ngo nam lwgta kvvnwkuma 
Nam ngo ngoqg ajin nyisv hvl mwwma 
Ngo aram ngoqg ikyam dvs jima 
Hoq lvgab ngo hempyooma 
Ngo meegta yubnwkuma 
Ngo Tomwn aky jis doomata 
Poorydub ngo kitap taqgkam dooma 
Soigab ngo hogub nyitayin ham mwwx-mwaqmata 
Ngo sam alyab nyis kaapakuma 
Ngo ngoqg nwwsv hogkam dooma 
Ngo soqgab cwqlanan dooma 
Ngoqgv mood gookam ho twnk gookam dooma 
Soolo ngo nyiin gab mood dooma 
Ngo Boston pagoqkam hog ak kam cengma 
Ngo mwnwn cengma, mwnwn cengnwxama 
Ngo hvdgo wwdub nyis yiyv ngo cengkma 
Ngo pyuulyam hogub tabsdvnyv cengma 
Ngo gomcwram hogub betayin ham ngo cengma 
Ngo cengkma ngo sam nyilasuikuyv 
Ngo cengkma ngo soqgab mwx-mvaq sulayikyv 
Ngo cengma hoq aksi algo akv jaqs kuyv 
Ngo hogv nyiyinpan ham ngo cengkmaanum 
Tom hogv vs-axaq sudnvyv ngo cengma 
Oyum dvsgab hogub mvstainvyv ngo cengma 
Soqgab hogub mwwtayin ham ngo cengkma 
No hogam tvnwdo ham ngo cengkma 
Tomwg lvgab hogv vs-axaq supanvyv ham ngo cengma 
Hvdlo Tomla Meerin buny kaapminsnumyv ngo cengma 
Mwv hvdlo hookur sutayiknvyv ham ngo cengma 
Tom hvdlo heqkonanam kis sunmvyv ham ngo cengma 
Tomwg ofisv hogloho doosdvnyv ham ngo cengma 
Tomwg muqja tulungv hogloho doospanyv ham ngo cengma 
Baas xarnukov hogloho doospanyv ngo cengma 
Mwn gab hogloho kaaya sutayinyv ngo cengma 
Soq puisam hvdlo xeqspanyv ham ngo cengma 
Ham ngo hoggab nyikil doospanyv ham ngo cengma 
Ham Tom hoggab nyiky sudnvyv ham ngo cengma 
Tom hoggab hvdgo hwqsdvnyv ngo cengma 
Hogam nyiyindvn ham ngam ngo betom koonwmaadwn 
Ngam ngo gus naak nwwmadvn 
Hvdlo vcjaqb ogyin ngo ham abymaadwn 
Nampumho ngo doonwmaadwn 
Gonho ator taqm nyigbo doomabo ham ngo mwwbymaadwn 
Soqg ogso ngo poorynwwmadvn 
Ngo mwam jvqtwngam betomyin ngo tvnwmaadwn 
Mwwg dook hoqg namho ngo doonwmaadwn 
Soqg boopyag ojsam ngo kvvnwma 
Soqg nyidunamsam ngo mwwbyma 
Ngo noqg gvvdagab mwwl bejham tvnwma 
Soqsam meeg hvyiqmvbalo ngo mwwr ram 
Doony poolv ogyin ngo ham mwwr ram 
Yubtaqnanho yubnam ham ngo mwwr maado 
Haatyho yubnamam ngo mwwr maado 
Mwv hogv bedwn ham ngo mwwjwyooma 
Si hogub nyipan ham ngo mwwjwyooma 
No hogv mwwsdvnyv ham ngo hog mwwmado 
Nam svkatvbwk hvl konam ham ngo mwwdarlakmabo 
Oloq nyi tuulu oloqkv ak kam ngo kaacinma 
Soqg xeqnbosam ngo kaacinma 
Soqg pagoqsam ngo hog ak kam mwwgobma 
Nam so hvvtwk hvl goqnamam ngo mwwgobkumala 
Ngo ngoqg abwn mwwgoblakma 
Oloq xeqnam alam jilwqnamam ngo mwwgoblakma 
Hoqg beminsunam ham ngo mwwgoblakma 
Soqsam hoglokv ngo rvskunmvyv ham ngo mwwgoblakma 
Soqsam hoggab ngulv nyisdvnyv ham ngo hog kaapama 
So nyodo hotayi hvl ngo kaapama 
Hvdgo ngo kaayadub mwwlakumabo 
Ham ngo nyil hemptainvbo hvl mwwmabo 
Ngo pvvb ak kam juqbopan hvl mwwmaya 
Ngo xuqdardub vigo doodo hvl kaapakuma 
Tomgv nyemko ajin doodwn hvl ngo mwwmaya 
Sijaxab Tom Meerin kaapapanup hvl mwwma 
Soqsam hoqhvb Tom kaadnup hvl ngo mwwma 
Ham Tom tacinpa hvl ngo mwwma 
So nyi mwlwngv hookumpanup hvl ngo mwwma 
Soqsi alub goopa hvl ngo mwwma 
Mwn Franc goolaqdvn hvl ngo mwwmaya 
Hoqham naayinpa hvl ngo mwwmaya 
Hoq hvvkam nyilayindo hvl ngo mwwmaya 
Ngam atam opaqtvl ngo hiyamkam mwwgwma 
Ngo hiyamkam mwwgwma, Tom neekam 
Hogv nyidudvn ham ngo cengkmaabo 
Ngo noqg benam gomgkam tvnwma 
Ngo hogam nyiyindo ham ngam betomab 
Ngo hog ak kam vs-axaqdub nyinwjima 
Ngo Tomwg lvgab aal dvsam dvmingvnwma 
Nam ngo lwgta kvvnwjaqdo 
Ngo issub hvvnwma 
Ngo ngoqg alaqkam kacdub mvnwma 
Ngo soolo yirkumb wwnwma 
Ngo soolo iskulub wwnwma 
Ngo hospitolob wwnwma 
Ngo noqg mwwjam mwdwqdub mvnwjima 
Ngo noqg pvvbho doonwma 
Ngo lamtaho doonwma 
Ngo ngoqg nyemko ajinam opaqnwwma 
Ngo Tomwg lvgab golf soonwma 
Nam ngo so lwgta kvvnwma 
Ngo sam sijaxab Tomwn kaatomnwwma 
Ngo iky akam kaal doonwma 
Ngo soq pagoqsam so benwma 
Ngo Tomwn jvqtwngam betom nwwma 
Ngo nam ngoqg yuma maanamam betom nwwma 
Ngo olo boon nyinwkuma 
Ngo nam mwwdwq mvm nwwma 
Ngo aaxyvbo hvl nam mwwknwwma 
Ngo hoqg goqlwham lwgta kvvnwkuma 
Ngo Tomgab aky jis sijaxab naamata 
Ngoqg bvvl doognam pensil ham paqlnum 
Ngo hvdlokam Taai dvsam kaapayin ngo dvkydvn 
Ngo oyum dvsam kvnwl ang paleqkam dvdwn 
Ngo mwwlaqbog goomin sunamam tabydvn 
Ngulv lwkin goob yvl doonamam abydvn 
No hogv bepan mwlw ham ngo loodwn 
Aal loogam ngo swlw duur vnygob juqy-juqcal nyidwn 
Ham Tom nyiram hvl ngo mwwdo 
Hvdlojaqkam mwam haamdvb ngo mwwdo 
Ngo kolnamgob Tomwn cengl doodub mwwdwn 
Ngo tiiswrbo meeg dvnwdo 
Ngam nyi ak kaal doodwn hvb ngo hengdo 
Ngulam nyi ak kaal doodwn hvb ngo hengdo 
Ngo kitap poory yin yumy aldvn 
Ngoqg ayvso dwql vcnum ak hengpado 
Golfho no hvdgo alub soopan ham ngo mwwpakuma 
Kenlwg poolho ngo mwnwn kaapanumam mwwpakuma 
Ngo Tomwg tomswrkoosam mwwpakumab nyipaku 
Hogv Tom bepan ham nam ngo betomdvb mwwpakuma 
Oloq noosu olo nyiitakunbo istamp ak ngo kaapapeeba 
Ngo mwnwn hempdub nyilama 
Ngo hwrxaql dooyikho sam kaapanum 
Ngoqg cukso twnk dookmaanamam ngo kaapakunum 
Tom hogloho doodwn ham ngo kaapakunum 
Ngo heqkonan ham epin uuraho kaapakunum 
Ngo Tomwn ngoqgab boon nyik koodwb lamta ak mvkajinum 
Ngoqg aniokogo twnk doonam ham mwam jiknum 
Ngo mwam vjv ho meeg dvsv jinum 
Ngo mwam wwleqdub bosnum 
Ngo yubtakub ayam mood vyingam wwdwn 
Ngo yirkumb pool ludum-lukongam lwg wwtwqdvn 
Ngo sa sugurho lwgpalo aal looxiam wwkadede 
Ngo filum kaatab lwkin gob wwtwqdvn 
Ngo Tomwn nit boon nimdub tip nwwrmvnum 
Ngam Tom sor komc ho pun mvnum 
Iskul hoqgv ngam soolo pun mvpan 
Moodjaqho ngo baas xarnukoho wwckunum 
Ngo mwwdo soq moodso nvtaqnam ak kaapapa 
Ngo nam muyig aiho yuma maapatvn 
Ngo hoqg bemin ham lwg tatkun 
Ngo sam mooyo mvyumdub mwwtkun 
Otuqho ngo lwgkam ura jaajho wwkamaanum 
No haatayi hvl ngo micung gookam mwwpatvmanum 
Ngoqg gusam mvnbo ak kaapapa 
Soq lvgab ngo 5 doolargo jitamdub nyinum 
Ngo cwrwb haadvb opadub nyiknum 
Ngo koofingam lwkin gootwq twwpade 
Ngo ngoqg door-doopwngam lwgkam goorwq kaamadvn 
NASAgab boon nyinbo ngoqg ajin ak doodwn 
Nyoodo nyookho poorydub ngoqg dumpongv aljaqpan 
Ngo aram komcub gorabdub nyinyoqnam ak doopan 
Soqg kitap sam ngo kooijaqb mwwnam ak doopan 
Toj needarsaknam nam ak ngoqgv doopan 
Ngam svka deedbo ajinv vigo doodwn 
Nam ngo betomsanamv vigo doodo 
Bostonho ngoq kwiyvla ho mwiyv doodwn 
Soolo mwn haatayi hvl ngo mwwdo 
Haai iskulho dooxeqdub ngoqgv vnyi nyiigta doodo 
Ngo ngoqg doktoram luux cirgab mwwgwdvn 
Hoyat Hausho ngoqgv pun mvnan ak doopan 
Ngo hogv nwwdwn hv so mwlwngv doodo 
Tomwn ngo haang lengdub vigo doodo 
Ngoqg bwrm ham mvqlwqyab ngoqgv vjv doopan 
Ngo xinamya nyisv vigo doodo 
Mwwg hvb nyinbo nyi ak kam kaapama 
Soqsib nyinbo lwgkam ngo kaakama 
Nyikasukho ngo lwgkam nyiyakaamadvn 
Si hvdgo mood naas yikyv ngo cengkma 
So ngo hogv nyil doosduk nvyv ham ngo cengkma 
Ngo jujadub nyiduma 
Ngoqgv twnk dooma, hvbmabde ngo mwwl doodwn 
Jabsy-japedub ngo mood dooma 
Ham ngo vbidub hog ak kam dookma 
Soq moodso ngo hog ak kam nyis dooma 
Ngoqgv bor ak ho bwrm vnygo doopan 
Ngo hvvminl kaas meeg doopan 
Ngo noqgab takamanam pui akja doopa 
Ngo ngoqg looyaram goqdub nyiladvn 
Ngo noqg vcnam hvbja nyido 
Noqg vs-axanam hvb ngo nyipaku 
Ngoqgv bwrmv oumgo ho borv ak doodwn 
Ngo soqg pookanamsam loorwqdub nyipa 
Ngo ngoqg kompyutaram mvdardub nyipa 
Ngo pulis istaton ho wwdub nyipa 
Ngo ofisam Tomwn doogdub nyipa 
Vs-axaqkam ngo atv nyidub nyipaku 
Ngo Tomwn nyibiajaqb goodub nyido 
Ngo ham nyimkumadub mvturdub nyipa 
Ngo bayoloji testgab poorydub nyipa 
Ngo Astraliyangam mwlwngam gaqyumpan 
Ngoqgv borv vnygo ho bwrmv akin go doopan 
Ngo sam vigo moodgob nyima 
Ngo soq vnyiso vigo nyima 
Ngo faayilam daonlood sijaxab mvmata 
Ngo sijaxab namho nyisam nyiyum maata 
Ngo ngoqg puiam sijaxab xeqrwmaata 
Vnyi mwlwho hoqg eminam ngo tapatvma 
Ngo mwam mood vigob kaapakuma 
Hoq mood hoqgv mwam ngo kaapakuma 
Mood vigob ham ngo kaapakuma 
Ngo mood vigob nam kaapakuma 
Hoq mood hoqgv ngo Tomwn gookma 
Kvn akgob ngo ngoqg duumam hwrxaqkuma 
Ngo sijaxab ngoqg namho nyisam nyiyumaata 
Mwn yuunam ekteresvk hvl ngo tapatvn 
CIAho noqg ajin tuulungv doodwn hvl ngo tapatvn 
Kenda nam Bostonho doodo hvl ngo tapatvn 
No nitbo nyem ajin ak doopa hvl ngo tapatvn 
Imiqho Tom bemin bedudvb ngo tapatvn 
Nyemko ak svkatub hvl sogoqnamam ngo tapatvn 
Lamk hoqgv ngoqg eminam goqdub ngo tapatvn 
Tom mwwg nywxwngam opaq paku hvl ngo tapatvn 
Tom sam haagabjab nyimapade hvl ngo mwwdo 
Tom mwwg mwwjam kwlymaalo alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Nam so haadudvb nyi ak kam kaapama hvl ngo mwwdo 
Mwn nyibiajaqb vc hoqgv altaiku hvl ngo mwwdo 
No nyibiajaqb vc hoqgv altaiku hvl ngo mwwdo 
Noqg borv namya alub nyiyatayi hvl ngo mwwdo 
Aal loog gol oloq dvn alam ngo nyem naainvp hvl ngo mwwdo 
Aal loog gol ngoqg atgv namv dootayi hvl ngo mwwdo 
Hiil poolam nam ngo lwgta kaapayinup hvl ngo mwwdo 
No vcjaqb haang homabo hvl ngo mwwdo 
No ngam mwwsydeemabo hvl ngo mwwdo 
No ngulug dookub hempwl doopa hvl ngo mwwdo 
No ngam bemasu hvl ngo mwwdo 
Soq pui tulusam ngo kaatom tomdumdub mwwdo 
Dvraso ngo nyoodo nyookho poorydubja mwwdo 
Mwnyi vnyiho ngo Roomub wwdumdubja mwwtwn 
Tom ngam hogv nyitwk hvpan ham ngo nyitwn 
Ngam bulv hogam nyitwk hvl bepan ham ngo nyitwn 
No ngam hogv nyitwk hvpan ham ngo nyitwn 
Ngo sijada gorob nwwkma 
Ngo sijada naaxangam mvxaq mvyum tukun 
Ngo sija pobu tuugin buqxadub nyipa 
Ngo sija gorbw ak xabl doomdub nyido 
Aal loum otuqho hem tuulu nulam kaapatvn 
Ngo soqg boqra soqgv sija lengnwduku 
No ngam abydvnwi hamtwq ngo tvnwdo 
Tom neela ho Meeri bunyam ngo aljaqb cengdwn 
Ngulv namho dookinpan hvl ngo cengcosunum 
Tom Francam cengmadvnbo hvl ngo cengdo 
Ham Tom ar roxam nyidwn hvl ngo cengdo 
Boston pagoqkam ngo hog ak kam cengmab nyida tapa 
No hogamja mwwdwn hamja ngo cengdo 
No Tomwn hvdgo hvvmindvn ham ngo cengdo 
Sibin idinam hogub xwwtayin ham ngo cengdo 
Bostonho doonbo nyi ak ngo cengdwn 
Twnkv hogmwlwma hvl ngo cengdo 
Oloq daqnbo nyegako alam ngo cengdwn 
Mwam hoglo namho ko bvvpan ham ngo cengdwn 
Sam loorwqdub vs-axaqdo hvl ngo cengdo 
Otuqho no hogv mwwldoopan ham ngo cengdo 
Obiyongam hogloho Tom opaqpan ham ngo cengdo 
Kenlwg kvnho Tom hogloob wwnum ham ngo cengdo 
Ngo vcjaqb nyirgumgab ngoqg kepongv vcdo 
Jarman ham cengsam opaqtvl ngo Francam poorynum 
Tomwrbo hoqkv ngo hog ak kam cengma 
Ngoqgab moodv haadakam ngo opaqtukun 
Muyig aiho ngo ngoqg obiyongam so opaqtvn 
Ngo hvdgo twnk dootwqpan hoq mwlwngam mwam nwrwqtvn 
Ngo Tomwn ngoqg bees loqlum nootunan loqlupam nwrk koonum 
Ngo Tomwn abydvn, hvbmabe ngam mwv abyma 
Ngoqg kofiho tiiswrbo vigo vlwqkoodub mwwdwn 
Ngoqg alangam gubam goyam mvdub mwwdwn, ogmvdub mwwma 
Ngo idin dingxo nwrwqbo ham abydvn 
Ngo mwnwg kangam karam yoomadub vj koonam alam kaabydvn 
Ngo soqg ebysam abydo  Ngo sam kookas i?
Swkwr poolam ngo Jarmaniho doonwdvn 
Banila ayiskrim ham ngo vcjaqb abydvn 
Ngo faunten peen lvgab xeqdub abydvn 
Bulv hvyiqmaadab ngo bulam abydvn 
Nam ngo lwgta kaapadub mwwdwn 
Mooyo ngoqg heqkonanam hog gol nyiimtvba 
Ngo ngoqg tiketam nyiim tukba  Ngo hogub mvtayikun?
Ngo ngoqg ajin tulu lvgab gaqgaql yvnwdvn 
Ngo jiikambo, hupeqtvyiqbo tvyin alangam twwnwdvn 
Ngo nam abydvn ho ngo nam nywxwb nvvnwdo 
Aal looya-loog ngo nam viyag abydo 
Ngo Tomwn moodjaqkam haatayikun hvl dingrjitkun 
Ngo rugaqsukam pakyv, hvbmabdi ngo pacama 
Ngo noqg svkakogab nam paqyaco hvl paqdwn 
Sookumkoho ngo mwam kaapatvn 
Soomin-nyirminkob wwdub dooyikho ngo Tomwn lamtaho kaapatvn 
Laibreriho ngo mwnwn haqmapagob nyil kaapanum 
Ngo Meksikoho dooyikho mwnwn kaapanum 
Ngo mwnwn noosuho haqmapagob nyil kaapanum 
Ngo mwam kenlwg aalho kaapatvn 
Ngo lwgpalo Hiil poolwg aal 20ngam Tomwn kaatab wwkamyinpv 
Sam nyimdub nyigbov hiyv sam ngo meelinkindo 
Ngo akwn xarnuko olo ipoqdukub nyido 
Ngo atam atv vcloodab goosdub nyipa 
Ngo mwwg mwwkjaqho swwdub nyido 
Ngo pui xeqnamam jilwqdub mwwpadub nyido 
Ngo naara ak naadub nyido  No ngam ak nvrwqlakindvi?
Pataqkam silo jiitin nadub kvny ak naadub nyido 
Daqnbo Kolar doonbo sula ak naadvb nyido 
Ngo sini meeg nvvnwdo  No meeg doodwi?
Soqg pagoqsam ngo meeg mwwkadub nyido 
Soq pui xeqnamsam ngo tvqumgo naadub nyido 
Nam toxkimanam ak toxtayin 
Moodgob ngo atv nyil doosdub nyido 
Kooyub jinan boonlo ak ngo meedub nyido 
Tomwg haamadab ngo wwleqdub nyido 
Ngo ham bejaqbalo nyinwmaasnum 
Sam ngo mvkodub lwgkam haang pwtlamanum 
Ngo noqg mwwgwngam swwrob mvdub hvl mwwtma 
Ngo seksopunam lwgkam sookama 
Nam ngo so booamalo alkinpa 
Oloq hem alam ngo lwgkam kvvnwkuma 
Ngo Bostonso meegta doonwkuma 
Tom mwwg nyinam ham hoggab mwv nyipan ham ngo sija cengdku 
Ngoqg nyegakoam nyoodo gvvdaho poory mvnwmvmanum 
Ngo lwxiam pobuho wwl iss jaakynum 
Ngo beearam upum pumun gootwq twwnum 
Saa sugurho ngo nyi oum gootwq kaapanum 
Ngu udumam mvkol ho uurab kvvlwqnum 
Ngo udumam mvkonum, hvbmabde hv asarnum 
Hoqg kitap tuuluham ngo Jarmani hoqgv jilwqkoonum 
Ngoqg nyiqtuq lengnamv mwnwn nyimin gvnbo hoqgab nyipan 
Ngo soolog swwnamsam ngo lvr-tak poorynamgab nyipan 
Soqg giitarsam ngo 300 doolargo rvpan 
Puiam ngo mwwam jiseqnum 
Soqsam mwam nyimingvmdub ngo ninteqnum 
Ngo mwwdo, ngo tenisam aljaqb soodwn hvl 
Ngoqg mood doominam ngo giitar soodwn 
Mooyo ngo Tomwg lvgab tenis soonum 
Hun ak ham opaqtvl ngo rup hamya nvvnwnum 
Ngo Tomwn kaacin maadwn hvb nyinum 
Ngo olo swlw duur ak kookwngam hvvctayin hvl ngo dingdwn 
No Soqgab mwwkurdvb nyiram hvl ngo dingdwn 
Nam ngo lwgkam opaqram hvl ngo nam dingrdvn 
Ngo hiyamkam betomram hvl ngo Tomwn dingrtukun 
Ngo xabram hvl Tomwn dingrtvn 
Mwnyi vnyiho ngo meeg vvyv kooikunum 
Ngo toxdub ngoqg alaqkv irobnum 
Ham ngo nyilatayin hvl ngo mwwma 
Ngo jvqtwjaqb albo tomswrbo akvb nyinwdo 
Ngo jvqtwjaqb Astraliyab wwnwdo 
Ham no nyimalo aljaqkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngo ngoqg ajin hoqgv pui xeqnam ak nvvrwqnum 
Ngo ngoqg bwrm hoqgv pui xeqnam ak nvvrwqnum 
Ngulug wwd moodv haapaku hvl ngo soq moodsam mwwpado 
Otuqho ngoqg filum kaanamam mwwpado 
Meeg ngo nyima hvl ngo mwwdwn hvl betwn 
Ngo Tomwg bwyirg soofa dootomkoho doanum 
Oloq hotel olo Tomwn hoodudub ngo kaapanum 
Ngo Tomwn mooyo laibrariho kaapatvn 
Nyooroho ngo kaakamaanam wm ak kaapanum 
Mooyog arho ngo pvtangv vigo kaapanum 
Ngoqg bwrmv pui xeqnamham pudub ngo kaapanum 
Doony-pool aotolo ngo kaakamanam ak kaapanum 
Ngo ngoqg twnk cukam hog golo pvvxatvba 
Noqg konam twnk ham ngo jilwqtvn 
Ham Tomwn nyimdub ngo bekakindo 
Mooyo ngo ngoqg nan doojo twnk ham jilo alhebanyi 
Ngo nam hog ak kam betom maalo alkiybanyi 
Mwv hemptayin hvlja ngo mwwdo 
Mwlwngam kaaikam ngo aal looxiam swlw duur axgo yubdnyi 
Ngo Frenc goodwn hvbkalan mwnkam goolaqdvn 
Ngo aal loopwho Tomwn mwwl doonum 
Kenlwg wjw aalho ngo gon tulugo pooryl doonum 
Ngo Bostonho vnyi nyiumgob doonum 
Ngo nam uraho doonum hoggab hvblo hoq aalho nyodo honum 
Ngo sijaxab soomindub vigo moodv doodo 
Ngo sijaxab pun twnk hiqsv doodo 
Ngo sijaxab namho nyisam nyium maata 
Ngo ham sijaxab vcjaqb mwwgabxeqdo 
Ngo sijaxab Tomwn mwwjam tvnwdo 
Ngo wm twwnamam lwkin tatuho opaqtukun 
Ngo olo dooyikho ngo Inglisam poorynum 
Iskulho haadub ngo vcjaqb poorynum 
Ngulv swwrab aalam agub gaql yvtjuk hvl ngo benum 
Nam ngo Tomwg lvgab gootwk hvl bepan 
Ngo mwwgamv ngo lamyin himanyi 
Ngo mwwdo ngo jvqtwjaqb hog ak kam nootumaabo hvl 
Ngo hoq hwkwngam lwgkam nyiram hvl ngo dingrpan 
Ngo aal mvqlwq yaagwn bwyirhoqg lamtab wwkydvn 
Aal looxiam ngo boon nyitab terenb wwdwn 
Aal loogwn hoda ngo Tomwn gootwn 
Aljaqnbo akyam jigamgab ngo mwam paqyaco hvl paqtwn 
Hoqg pagoqgab mwwdgo ngo cengs ak doogpa hvl 
Ngo nyooroho oram ak kaapatvn hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngo vcyayab poorylo alkinybanyi 
Ngo noqg ajinb nyiyinpa hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngo soqg lwwcibo suitarsam gvtso hvl ngo mwwdo 
Tomla Meerin buny benswma hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ham Tom nyiduml nyipa hvl ngo mwwdo 
Meeri hogloho doopan ham Tom cengdo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Tom hog ak dvnwdo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Mwv nam kaapasv hvl mwwdo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Soqsi soqg bwyir-bwcwrso doodnup hvl ngo mwwdo 
Soqsi hingxwjaqb nyiyindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Hoqhvvbja nyiyinpa hvl ngoq mwwnamam nyipa hvl ngo mwwdo 
Nyodongv vcyayab hoayi hvl ngo mwwdo 
Bulv ngam bedudo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Soq kitapsi xinamjaq poorysanam gooj hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngulv aljaqb hvvminkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngulv goodwrkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngulv cwqtwdub nyido hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngulv googwsam kwlynyo alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Koram aniodub ngulv belkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Hogv Tom bedwn hv kvtaqdo hvl ngo mwwdo 
No ham nyiduml nyipa hvl ngo mwwdo 
No mwnwn betomdub nyido hvl ngo mwwdo 
No Tomwg lvgab agum wwmin gvyindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngo kooijaqnbo ab akvb nyitayi hvl ngo mwwdo 
No Tomwn hog nyiladeema mwwdo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Tomwn no haang lengmdub nyipa hvl ngo mwwdo 
Noqg cengconam ak hv almaapa hvl ngo mwwdo 
Noqg mwwonam ak hv kvtaqpa hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngo mwam cengpan hvl mwwnum, hvbmaabdi ngo cengma hibanyi 
Tomla Meerin buny kanodo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Meerin Tom wwbopa hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tom Meerin nywxw nvvnwdo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tom Meerig nyegako ajin ka hvvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tom paca caayumjaqnbo ngvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Ham Tom nyitadvnlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tom noqg ajin jingbw ngvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tomwn mwwg cwrwho doopnvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Sam nyinamv nyipwram hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Mwwg mwwnamv mwwjwqdvnlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Hoqhv kaakamanam akvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tomwn no kaalaqyinpv hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Tomwn cwwbyongv mengpakunlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
No kwm-kor mvtab haadnvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
No atorjaqb nyitayin hvl bepnvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
No so boon nyinum hvl bepanvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
No Bostonob wwdnvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
No Tomwg lvgab doodnvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Sam nyiram hvl ngo bepanvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Mood kaapadaho no juqpnvlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
No Tomwn ajin kumadvnlo hvl ngo mwwtwn 
Ngo Tomwn ham twwyin himanyi hvl mwam ngo betwn 
Ngo ngoqg nyilajaqnamho nyitayin hvl Tomwn betomtvn 
No ham cengnwdo hvl Tomwn ngo betomtvn 
Ham ngo hoggab nyinwpan hvl ngo Tomwn betomtvn 
Tom wnwmado hvl ngo nam betomtvn 
Hoqhvb ngam nam goqmabvk hvl ngo betomtvn 
Olo moodjaqkam wwcdub ngo teksi naal wwnum 
Mwwg kaagaho ngo xabram hvl aljaqb nyikatvn 
Ngulam svkatvbwk hvl Tomwn aljaqb bekatvn 
Ngo mwwg benamam aljaqb tagabdub nyikanum 
Ham Tomwn nyimdub ngo bekakindo 
Ngo ngoqg laqc alaq lvgob xeqdub nyikanum 
Ngo batar kwlyib margarin namya ngo mvn nanum 
Ngo so lwxiam komcam haakydvn 
Ngo lwxiam ecinam silo lvgab dvkydvn 
Ngo ngoqg xox an ho nyekan abwn wjw aalam haal kaadwn 
Ngo vyapb lengl ho ham mvkonum 
Ngo kayabo luxuqkam naara, lwwma-lwwsaboam naatayin 
No nyixotukul hoq tuuluham ngam jikurlaka 
Muyig nyinam ham ngam opaq koodub mwwdo 
Ngo hogv nyipan hoqgab ngam opaq koodub mwwdo 
Ngo swwcil swwl doonbog gus naanbo akvb nyinwdo 
Ngo baas xarnuko akwn olo ipoqtaikun 
Haatadvn dug-dvkangam ngo Habaib wwnwdo 
Tom hog hvl betadvn ham ngo tvnwdo 
Sam mwv hogub mwwl nyipan ham ngo cengnwdo 
Tom, noqg pagoqkam ngo meegta cengnwdo 
Soqsam hog hvl bedwn ham ngo cengnwdo 
Giitaram hogub soodwn ham ngo cengnwdo 
Ngo soqg dooksam nyibiajaqb wwleqnwnwdo 
Ngo nyiam kvvrwql ho soonwdo 
Kanadaho ngo ngoqg ajin tuulungam kvvnwdo 
Nam ngo kooijaqnbo ak kaatom nvnwdo 
Ngam svkakogab nam ngo paqyaco hvl paqnwdo 
Oyum dvsam dvdub moodam namub haaksv hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ngo hogub nyisjaqkam ngam no abysv hvl mwwdo 
Ngo nam meeg ngoqgab dingrmvdub mwwdo 
Soq moodsam nam ngo mwwgabsv hvl mwwdo 
No hogv nyipan ham ngo nam kaamdub mwwdo 
Hogv nyitayi ham ngo cengnwdo 
Ngo meeg vigo pun mvnwdo 
Vnyi nyium otuqho ngo boon nyinam hoqgv doonu dukub mwwnum 
Ngam klas dook hoqgv lengmkunum 
Ngam Tokyoho ko bvvnum ho olo ngo swwrobnum 
Mwv nyimurpa hvl ngo mwwpan 
Mwwg goonam hv ngam haang lengdub mvpa 
Nyiqtu lengnam hv ngam haang lengmdub nyipa 
Noqg potahv ngam haang lengmnum 
Ngo albo boon nyis ak kaapatvl aljaqpa 
Noqg nyiqtuq nyilin numam tapatvl ngo hempdo 
Ngo mwwgabdum vcloodab vs-axaqnum 
Ngo Astraliyaho kvn meegub doonum 
Dug pool mwlw yaqgwn ngo Londonho doonum 
2013ho ngo vnyi nyium gob nyitwqnum 
Ngo hvdlo anioyikho ngo kaangam jaqnum 
Ngo Tomwn mwwjwnamhv pacaloodapa 
Mwv feelpa hvl tapatvl ngo lomnum 
Ngam vm mvdub pookanum, hvbmabde ngo vmvmaanum 
Ngo akintwq cengmabob akvb nyinum 
No hogv bepan ham ngo mwwl doonum 
Ngo ngaaaknum, hvbmabde boonam nyidutwql doonum 
Bulv ngam hem anioko hvb nyinum 
Ngo ngoqg namho nyisam nyiyumlakmab nyinum 
Oloqgab ngo ai yupwho boon nyil doonum 
Hvdlo ngo anio yikho ngo pwt pwlumnum 
Hoq moodho ngo yaapanum ho hem aniob nyinum 
Tom dvskunmvyv ngo vbwqmanum 
No haas tainvyv ma haamab nyistadnvyv ngo mwwbwqmab nyinum 
Ngo Amirka lamtab wwl Yurupb wwpenum 
Iskul wwxopeel ngo Tomwg namub wwpen 
Bostonho ngo cengrob iskulam wwnum 
Ngo kenlwg kvnho mwwg bwrmam kaatab wwpenum 
Aaramam ngo aal loopwngam boon nyil dootayin 
Ngo nam kaatab wjw aal akwn olo haatayin 
Ngo nam aaramam twnk jitab haatayin 
Nyodongv hajaqkam ngo saikol dul wwtayin 
Hvdam bulv soo hookuryin ngo wwtayin 
Ceesam hogub soodwn ham ngo nam tomswrtayin 
Ngo ngoqg xabnam-riinamam cwqlalo alkinpa 
Ngo nyemko ajingab mood ak doolo alkinpa hvl mwwdo 
Tom ngoqg borub nyinyokam al hibanyi hvl ngo mwwdo 
Mwv dookumam doomin gvlo alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Tom odmab doolo alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Mwn wm twwkmab nyiklo alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
No swwca mwlwho hempwl doolokam alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Noqg betomnam hvb no nyinyo alkindo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ham lwgta nyitwn mvkram 
Nyirobdvn soodmoodam ngo doomin gvla deema 
Ngam no hogv nyipan ham ngo opaq nyooram 
Ngoqg konam mwlw ham ngo kaapalaram 
Hogub nyijaqkam ngo wwlaram 
Nyodongv hoonyin maadeedib ngo wwlaram 
Nam ngo hog ak kam nyimram 
Ngo hogv nyinwdo ham Tomwn betomram 
Tom sijaxab nyem naamam doolo ngo mwwclaram 
Tom Caina dvs ham abylo ngo mwwclaram 
Ngam Tom sijaxab mwwpadvlo ngo mwwclaram 
Hog ak nyiklo ngo mwwclakram 
Hoqhv hog ak doominsudlo ngo mwwclakram 
Udumho hogv kaapasuiyv ham ngo mwwclakram 
Etlantisam hogv nyipanvyu ham ngo mwwclakram 
Kaar lvgab hogv nyipanvyu ham ngo mwwclaram 
Oloq iss jaaj v hoglob wwdenvyu ham ngo mwwclama 
Nunyv hiyv wm mwwsdvnyv ham ngo mwwclama 
Hoglo lamta ak hv koc sudnvyv ham ngo mwwclama 
Hoggab karokengv hvdgo yuudnvyu ham ngo mwwclama 
No hoggab nyem naamadvn ham ngo mwwclama 
Hoggab nyiv ngam rogabsudnvyv ham ngo mwwclama 
Bostonho ngo vnyi nyiumgo boon nyil dootwn 
Nam ngo ngam hog ak nyik koodub mwwdo 
Ngo noqg dookumho hvvnwdo 
Hogub narl soodwn ham ngo cengnwdo 
Ngo nam hog ak betom nwwdo 
Ngo lwxiam mwwg lvgab tenis soodwn 
No doomalo ngo ayinram 
Hoqg nyinam ham ngo xitaqram 
Ngo Tom nvkam mwwgwma 
Ngo mwnwg luxuqb nyinwma 
Ngoqg abwn mwwpadub hvl ngo pooyam ak xeqnum 
No ngam svkabalo ngo nam paqyaco hvl paqtan 
Hoqhv nyijaqkubalo ngo vcjaqb mwdwqkindo 
Tomwn ngo hvdgo abydvn ham mwwpakuram 
No mwwpakuma hvl ngo mwwpakuma 
Ngo ciis bargar hamla kook ak ham abydvn 
Nam ngo meg tox nwwdo 
Nam ngo alvb cengnwdo 
Oloq aky jis alam puuci nwwdo 
Tom hogloho doodwn ham ngo cengnwdo 
Tom olo hogub nyil haapan ham ngo cengnwdo 
Boston pagoqkam ngo meegta cengnwdo 
Tom hog bvxe nyidkun ham ngo cengnwdo 
No hogv nyil doodwn ham ngo cengnwdo 
No hoggab nyibiab haamapan ham ngo cengnwdo 
Ngo albo nam ak gol doonwdo 
Ngo seebing ekont ak mvko nwwdo 
Otuq pagoqham ngo ngulug kookwb oxanwwdo 
Suyum oyumam ngo nam kaapanwwdo 
Ngo soqg filumsam lwgta kvvnwdo 
Soqsam nam ngo keswl ap mvmdub mwwdo 
Lwgwn ngo noqg bemin benamam tvnwdo 
Hv hogub nyipan ham ngo cengnwdo 
Tomwg nam uura ham ngo kvvnwdo 
Sam dvs salinbol ngo kanolya doonwdo 
Hoglojaqkam ngo Tomwg dunamam talaqtayin 
Noqg anianamam ngo lwxiam mwwpatayin 
Soq nyiqsoqg hindib nyinamam ngo birwqnwwdo 
Ngo Hil poolwg aal 20ngam haactayin 
Tomwn ngulgab tiketlo naatwk hvl ngo betayin 
Ngo Tomwn kaapakalam hookurtaikun 
Ngo sijada hookurtayin 
Suyum daya mwlwngam ngo ngoqg ofisho dootayin 
Aal meeg gob ngo jila soqgv wwtayin 
Suyumam ngo Meerin kaatayin 
Hogub nyijaqkam ngo 2 30gam olo hvvctayin 
Swlw duur kookw darangam ngo olo hvvctayin 
No ngam hogv nyimdub mwwdwn hvb ngo nyitayin 
Suyig aiso ngo ai ywwlywngam wm pwrnam ham pwrtayin 
Ngo Bostonho hvvcyin nam ngo goqtayin 
Soq pagoqsam ngo meegta kaakatayin 
Boon sam nyiyumtvl ngo caatayin 
Nam ngo hogv svkalatayin ham ngo nyitayin 
Ngo hvdgo nyiladvn hvdgo nyibiab nyiyumtayin 
Ngo cwrwngam aljaqb dvrwqdub mvtayin 
Ngo haamadab nam ngo bepatayin 
No ngam hoglob wwmdub mwwdwn ho ngo wwtayin 
Ngo sam kesil aptayin  Mwwdwqmab 
Kvn akwn olo ngo Astraliyab wwtayin 
Sam ngo nyi asaqlo ak nyimtayin 
Tom hwdam hvvctayin ham ngo nam bepatayin 
No ngam hogv betompan ham ngo lwgkam mwwyuram 
Ngo ham lwgta nyimur nyitinkuram 
Klas dooduyin ngo lwgta odkuram 
Pookanamho Tomwn ngo haang haakam mvdub mvtayin 
Tom caatayin bvde ngo kaakatayin 
Sam lwgta nyitin mvmadukub ngo kaatayin 
Ngo hvdgo swwtayin hvdgo ngo nam svkatayin 
No jibalo hog boon sujakam ngo nyilatayin 
Nam ngo hwrci jaqnbo gon ak xwwtomtayin 
Soq pagoqsam ngo hogv cengpan ham ngo nam betomtayin 
Tomwn hoggab ngo abymaadwn ham ngo nam betomtayin 
Tomwg so hookur namgob ngo kaayatayin 
Ngo olo wwcyikun nam xeqtayin 
Ngo Iris nyiv, hvbmabde ngo Iris goocin maadwn 
Ngo sija twnkv aniogo dootwqdo 
Ngo hoqg pagoqham goonwma ngo bosdo 
Ngo ham tacinma ngo bosdo 
Nyoodo nyookso ngo arotwqpa 
Ngo dooksoqgv lengdkun hvb mwwdo 
Tomwn ngo ree goqnamam mwwkurduku 
Hogv no bedwn ham ngo kaarobdukun 
Sor komcso ngo nam aljaqdo 
Ngo namja kaapadub hempjaqpa 
Nyodongv honyinkogab ngo hempjaqpa 
Noqgab boon nyilinkugab ngo hempjaqdku 
Nunyv lwkin goob yvbom yikun ngo hempjaqpaku 
Astraliyab toolko ho ngo wwtayin 
Ngo soolo nyibiajaqb mvtumtayin 
Ngo hogam nyirobpan ham ngo nyiyumtadku 
Tomwn ngo alub wwnku hvl ngo wwl betadeen 
Ngo wwl kaakayetadeen 
Ngo ai yubg otuqyab wwcotayin 
Ngo meeg asaq kitaplo poorytayin 
Ngo nam aljaqb kaal doogtayin 
Ngo nam meeg karatilo tomswrtayin 
Ngo iss naadvb sokumb wwdeen 
Ngo suyam nyibiajaqb haatayin 
Nam ngo honynam akvb kaapatvl hempjaqdo 
Ngo so nam meeg nyij-wwjlo tomswrtayin 
Ngo Japan gonam hwrcijaqdo 
Si nyilatayi hvl ngo bedwn 
Ngo nam cengdub nyidudvn 
Ngo ngoqg nyemgab aky ak kaagaqdvn 
Ngo akwn oloqg dugam kaayal doodkun 
Ngo nyiipaku  No ngam svkalakindvi?
No ngam mwwnamham ngo vcloodab akam yaapakun 
Nam lwgkam ngo opaqkuram 
otuq hoqg alnum hvb ngo alkuma 
Ngo hoqgab lwgta holkuma 
Ngo hoqg pagoqham hvbja vbwqma 
Ngo ak kam bos kuram 
Ngo sam nam betomram 
Ngo nam mwnwg eminam betomram 
Ngo hog mwlwngam hobiq-hobiqb mvlamaadwn 
Ngo so swkwngam alub nyikymaadwn 
Ngo noqg opaqtubwk hvnam ham hwrcima 
Ngo noqg mwwj ham hwrcima 
Ngo rugaqma  Ngo haang lengtwqnum 
Ngo 150 sentimitar ao twqma 
Ngo Tomwn alyaadwn hvl ngo bema 
Hoqhv alub mwwnamvsyv ham ngo mwwbwqma 
Tomwg lvgab hogv nyispanyv ham ngo mwwbwqma 
Tom hvdam haas yiyv ngo cengkma 
Tom hiyam nyem naas tainvyv ngo hingbwqma 
Soqg pui sam hiyv xeqsnumyv ngo hingbwqma 
Ngo nam hvdjaqgo vviyaasdvnyv ngo cengma 
Tomwn abybov ngootwqma 
Nyi maqpwrho ngo gookama 
Meerin nyem naadwb hvl Tom nyikydvbo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Ham Tom dvkyram hvl ngo mwwdo 
Lwgpalo ngo mood mooma doomab nyibiab nyitayi 
Ngo pilosopiham vigo hwrcido 
Ngo agam tuulu pagoqgab ngo kitap ak poorydvn 
Soqsi ngoqg nyimurgo hvl loorwqdub mwwdwn 
Ngo jvqtwjaqb lusaq akub hengpado 
Ngo jvqtwjaqb soqgab kaayal doopan 
Ngo jvqtwjaqb sam nyidumdubja nyitma 
Doogum tayamam jvqtwjaqb ngo bosydvn 
Tom ngam mengtayi hvl ngo bosydo 
Nam kaayal dookymvdub nyinam ham ngam opaqtub 
Ngam opaqtub, hvbmabde ngo noqg lvgab wwmin gvlaram 
Ngam opaqtub, hvbmabde ngo sam opaqlakmaanum 
Ngam opaqtub, hvbmabde ngo moodv vigo dookma 
Ngam opaqtub, ngoqg an namho dooma 
Franc gramar lvgab ngo vigo vs-axaq gvnum 
Tom nam jvqtwjab kvvnwdo hvl ngo mwwdo 
Sija hoolu luuxe altaikunbo hvl ngo mwwdo 
No hog akub mwwtayi hvl ngo mwwkydo 
No sam kaabykeetayi hvl ngo mwwkydo 
Noqg ham benamam tatwl ngo lamdku 
Ham begbov ngoojipa 
Gaqkaqyvdub hvl ngo mwwldoodwn 
Ngo noosu ak mvkodub hvl mwwldoodwn 
Nam mvxaq xaqkul ngaadku 
Sija moodso nam svkadub mood moomado 
Soqg pagoqgab ngo vigo akam paku 
Ngo hog ak kaalindub nyikadvn 
Ngo alyanbo ak mwwlindub hvl ngo nyidudvn 
Ngo mood dooma hoqgab ngam xitaqmab 
Ngo namub nyibiab haalakuma ngam opaqtub 
Nam so kaatwl ngo vigo lamdo 
Ngo noqg apogab vigo mwwdwqdo 
Sam no lwgta nyikyo hvl ngo nam beogvyin 
Soqgab ngo Tomwn kenl gootkun 
Ngo noqg swwg gab lwnygo ywwtkun 
Soq pagoq mwlwgab ngo Tomwn betomtuknum 
Ngo hogv mwwdwn ham nam betomtuknum 
Ngo lwxiam ngoqg bor dookub soonum 
Ngo lwxiam Franc agum ham poory nwwnum 
Ngo jiidub hvl nyikynum 
Ngoqg swca bumpwho ngo sookasukho nyinum 
Ngo kwm-kor nyil vnyi camumgob nyiitkun 
Mood mwlwho ngo tal doonum 
Mwlwho ngo Tomwn kaakarl yvnum 
Nam mwlwho meetar tukun 
Ngo hog akgab mwwly doonum 
Ngo Astrliyab lwumgo wwtkun 
Ngo swlw duur papogob kaayal doonum 
Ngo swlw duur ak gobkam kaayal doonum 
Ngo aljaqnbo ak mwwlinpa 
Ngo mwwg eminam mwwyuloodatukba 
Ngo vcloodab narl soogamgab ngo sum dormaduku 
Ngo injinar nyidub mwwbwqpaku 
Otuqho ngo Tomwg lvgab kwm-kor mvl doonum 
Ngo opungam iss jiyumtukba 
Soolo ngo boon nyisv viloodago doopa 
Ngo nyem naapaku ho kov oumgo doopakun 
Ngo mood mwlwho gvvdaso kaapapaku 
Iskul wwdub ngo vj koodudvn 
Ngo borv vnygo ho bwrmv ak doodwn 
Ngo sijada ngoqg yubtaq olo nitbo vjv puutkun 
Ngo Tomwn vigo mood hoqgv kaalaqdvn 
Ngo Tomwn hvm anio hoqgv cengpan 
Tomwn kaal ngo vigo cengpaku 
Ngo pacal vigo nyimur tukba 
Otuqho ngo soqsib lwgkam nyimanum 
Otuqho ngo oloq wkwg vs-axaq lwgkam doomanum 
Otuqho ngo soqg wkwg vs-axaq lwgkam doomanum 
Hoqhvkwg dunam lwgkam otuqho ngo takamaanum 
Soq swksam otuqho ngo lwgkam kaapamaanum 
Hwdja doortbo Hoel lwgkam ngo kaapamaanum 
Ngo ham otuqho hiyamkam betom maanum 
Sam otuqho ngo hiyamkam betom maanum 
Ngo sijaxab boon nyisv vigo dooxeqpa 
Ham ngo nam lwwgub betomtukun 
Ngookam, hog ak kam tacinma 
Ngo sam cengbalo, hiyvkam cenglatayin 
Ngo ham nyibalo, ngam Tom nyirjtayi 
Ngo sam sija nyimabalo, ngo lwgkam nyiram 
Ngoqg mvvkub nyimbalo, ngo sija namub wwtwqtaikun 
Ngo alap dootwqlo, ngo sija jvrtwqtayin 
Ngo nyetlo, ngam twnk jiyinpa 
Ngo ngoqg an-ab roxongam tal swwtwqlo!
Tomgv mood vigo doobalo, mwv ham nyitayi 
Tom ham bedlo, hv lwgpalo jvqtwpade 
Mwv atorjaqb nyikalo, mwv nyilinbade 
Hv jvqtwbalo, hogv no nyitayin?
Hv nyibalo, ngo vcjaqb hemptayin 
No ham dvbalo, Tom haang lengtayi 
No boon ak nyikadub mwwdlo, wwgdvl Tomwn kaapata 
No ma hvbalo, Tom haang lengtwrtayi 
No cengpalo, noqg alaqkam irobto 
No swrsongam kaapanwwdlo, nyob padub mwx-mvaqto 
Nyoodo gvvda hoqg kaar baqanam tuulungam nyiv vigo meedo 
Ngo mwwpamab nyibalo, ngamja bepalabka 
Wm yaqkbalo, soqg pupum sam mvpyalaka 
Wm yaqkbalo, soqg sam ninlwqlaka 
Doogum tayamv nyiskujaqkam, mwv lengpan 
Oyumam, ngo ngoqg iky lvgab wwl yvdwn 
Dug poolam, pwpv nyibiajaqb almab nyidwn 
Dug poolam, so vcjaqb ogdvn 
Nyob payin, nyiv vigo yaapatvl sidwn 
Tom laqcbvi ma laqbiqbvi jiidwn?
Ham Tom sijaxab nyidubja mwwdwi?
Hvvyi baayumsi aaxyvi ma oo ngvi?
Mwv nam svkajaqkindvi?
Tom xeqcin reecin jaqmadvnwi?
Tomwn benam pagoqsi jvqtw ngvjaqi?
Soqsiyi nam Tomwg jinam kitapv?
Hotelho kitap puuqkv doodnvi?
Soq bwyirso gees naakv doodnvi?
Hotelho gus naal mvnbov doodnvi?
Soq bwyirso post ofisv doodnvi?
Yaapa nyi akv, so hog vs-axaq doodwi?
Hoq nyijogab twnk jidub nyidnvi?
Soq bwyirso teren xarnuko doodnvi?
Imiqho koofi ak doodwi?
Olo nyi Inglis goolaqbo doodnvi?
Ngam noqgab hog ak nyik koonwdo i?
Olo ngoqg geqnuko ak doopai?
Olo ngam svkadeedbo ak doopai?
Nam hog meeg ngo naajsanam doopai?
Nyi akta dook doodwi?
Soqsi nam ak rvdub mood aldvi?
Soqsi nyijir Tom benam hvbja dunum 
Ngoqg mwwnam kor ham si kooi yaapaku 
Ham no hogub nyigtayin ho dootayin 
Hoq mwlwhv geql nyipa 
Hoqhv ngam vnyi nyiig otuqho nyipan 
Wm twwnamsam opaqdub nyilajaqmado 
Soq toxnamsi birwqdub hog vs-axaq dooma 
Suyumam nyodosi hotayi 
Akwn akwn svka kaamin sunamsi xinamjaqgo 
Soq gus sam toj neenbov ngoopa 
Mwn tapanumv mwn vcin aljaqb mvlaqdvn hvl 
Mwv camx kvnpan hvnamsi jvqtw ngvjaqyi 
Gvvdasi olum jaqdnvi 
Soq kitapsi poorydubja nyinbo goojy 
Soqsi Alaska hvbja swkwrma 
Franc goodub hog vs-axaq doomasulak 
Kaanamv mwn haakin hengpama 
Hoq nyinam hv ngoqg nyimurma 
Nyiingam rogabnamv aljima 
Hoqhv noq hvbja nyibiabdo 
Soqsi kaanamv nyodo hoyinjaqpa 
Si kaanamv ngo alman moodjaqsi haapaku 
Si kaanamv ngo nyibiajaqb so haapa 
Kaanamv TV ngv alkumanyi 
Soqsi lwgpalo mwwgab nyibiamaapade 
Lwgpalo mwv mwn gab alman nyi maab nyipade 
Ayam nyodo hokam taipade 
Kaanamv nyi mwlwngv golfam abydo 
Si nor ak yaanbojab suupado 
Si aal looyigob tapamv hol doodo 
Si tanamv noq aljaq mood ak doopanyi 
Fuuji puutuho caodvb ai yupwgob nyipa 
Jakson gab hv vcloodab kooyub mvyanamgo 
Hoq aal hv nyem naadub aljaqnbo aal goobanyi 
Sa sugurgab hoq aal hv kvtaqjaqnam aal gobanyi 
Tom, hoqhv aljab nam kaapadv aal goobanyi 
Hoqhv noq lvgab hempjaqb boon nyinam goobanyi 
Hoqhv oyug nyicijaqb nyinam ak goobanyi 
Hoqhv mwwxalamanam nyinam goobanyi 
Hoq moodho Hoasington gab swkwr ciidwqdvja goobanyi 
Mooyo soologab swkwr yaabanyi 
Ngo namub haaikuho kan kunum 
Hoqg doconam baisaikelhv mwwg hibanyi 
Hoqhv jeenyeq pengkolo pwrtin nan akub nyibanyi 
Hoqhv swrdorxe ham anio yaama hibanyi 
Ngo olo wwcyikugho kan kunum 
Sookumkoho jvqtwjaqb vcloodab od dunum 
Murwg arhv vcloodab swkwr hibanyi 
Wm parl soonam ham wm rwlwqbov Tom ma 
Kaanamv mwn lwwm-lwws yin ngam boskunum 
Ham lwgta nyikurdub hwwybwjwrdo 
No doomabalo jvqtwjaqb ngo vp cwkwb mwwtayi 
Ura jaajho wwbalo noqgab twnkv vigo wwtayi 
Hvdlo no akamyikun hv nam mwwlaqmvtayin 
Suyumam nyodosi hokamyinpv 
Soqgv Boston gab 300 maayilgob nyido 
Soqg nyooksi kaol doogdub vs-axaqjaqpa 
No haakmaagumgab ngo aniamwwpanum 
Soqsi gvvdag nyiv hookuml kaak nyookgo 
Soqg kornamsi albo dayab wwgdo 
Noqg iskul wwyikho hv mood hikbanyi 
Gaari xarnuko hv soqgv swlw duur akgob wwdwn 
Si kvn gob nyodongv hodub dooiku 
Si kenyum oyum hoqgv nyodongv hol doodku 
Tom mvyasutayinyv mwumjaqpa 
Ham no bepakinybanyi mwwnyirjaqpa 
So noqg kaaram xarpnum hv pvvb juqbodo 
Ngoqg mwwnamham si kooiyab kaal gooknyi 
Noqg mwwnam ham si kooiyab vs-axaqgooknyi 
Kofi twwnam ham si kooiyab twwngambo kunyi 
Si vnyi lwwg palekunbo ak goonyi 
Nobvl Prayij hv ngoqg naadub mwwl dooknam akv 
Kayabo alam wwbol loqlum jwwkdookma 
Gwwi tooxakugab xabnamv hog nyiqtuqdooram 
Tomwn binyubdub benam hv hog nyiqtuqdooram 
Franc goodub hog vs-axaq doomasulak 
Tomwn nyega naanamsi hog swrso kaapama 
Soqsi noqg filumam kaal xabnam hvbmalak 
Si aaramam hog og kindo hvl kaapama 
Si hog vcjaqb lamdub nyima, hvbma i?
Nyi asaqkam rogam nam hv aljima 
Si hog samya kooyub pooryl nyiqtuq kaapayima

Si axa tulug pengkolo vigo nyidwn

Tomv, no sija nam hoqg atgob nyipaku i?

Nyi tuugin mwv jvqtwjaqdnvi hvl toxnum 
Nyi tuugin noqg benamam loodwn hvb nyido 
Tuugin bemab opaqnamv alyaadwn 
Nyi tuugin vcboam kaayadub nyido 
Nyi ak Tomwg lvgab imiq v yvdo 
Ngulam Tom hwwgaqdo hvl nyi ak betomnum 
Tuugin ham oxanamv aldo 
Doony pool aotolo ngoqg vnyiqkv hog ak kaapanum 
Breksi hog ak almab nyido 
Hog ak mwam nyikampade 
Ngam hog ak kacdo hvl kaapanum 
No hog ak mwwldoodo, hvbma i?
Lwgwn no nyikadub nyido 
Noqg atorb nyinamv nyibiab aky kaapatayi 
Opaqto, ngo nam vbwqmaapa 
Sooseki Ogaig svvtum akgo 
Ispagvtisi ngoqg xinamjaq akv 
Istokhomv Suidin gv lvpwngv 
Nyikyo noqg hwkwngv ngam cengto 
Doony poolam supyo 
Supnamam opaqtvl ho boonam nyirobtuku 
Soonamam opaqto  Si soosma 
Ngam nyimurpa hvl mwwdunumam opaqtuku 
So kaakamanamv nyikydvn 
Sam goodub nyima, sam ngo kaapajiyimaanyi 
Nyiqtuq lengnamv ator taqm hoqgv haakydvn 
Soq swk akv Japanho kaapamaadwn 
Haqmapagol, mwv takamaanam ak tapanum 
Akwn Hvvi aal oloqkv dug doonunamv doorobtaikun 
Suuparmenv roket akwg jvrnam hvbkalam jvrdwn 
Otuq yobu hoqgv lvqbwq dayab wwto 
Fridj hoqgv rvvtlo naalinto 
Inglis tomswrnamv mwwg nyikynamv 
Tomwn nam sabn nanlo meeg jitwk hvl beta 
Ngo horsydo hvl mwnwn betomta 
Ngo kaayade hvl mwnwn betomta 
Nam Tomwg benam mwlwngam ngam betomto 
Vs-axaqkam hogub nyil no nyiknum ham ngam betomtub 
Noqg imiq pagoqkam ngulam meeg betomtvb 
Topumv nam tuulungam mvpya gvdeku 
Soqgsam tox jigumgab paqyaco 
Mwwclamanam oyum dvs dvg jigumgab nam paqyaco 
Svkakogab otuqso nam paqyaco paqdwn 
Mood naalin svkakogab paqyaco 
Bulam paqyaco, ngo kookwjaqso alpaku 
Oloq baisaikel v ngulug iskulgv 
Oloq kayabo pvta v kayabo pvtama 
Hoqhv alaq jaq hoqgv haapan, hvbma i?
Oloq ko ak v vcjaqb vs-axaqdub nyipa 
Oloq ko v mwwg soon nanam horpaqpa 
Hoqg toj hv ngoqgab kaataqma 
Hoqg toj hv noqgab alyi 
Hoqg kompyutar hv alkuma 
Haatadv moodgab hv ngam vigo hiqdub nyitayi 
Hoqg nyook hv atv swwlinbov doodwn 
Hoqg vc hv bekteriya hoqgv nyidwn 
Hoqhv jvqtwjaqb hog nyiqtuq kaapakeeram 
Hoqg hem hv ngoqg twnk cukam naag neeba! Mwam nootuto!
Hoqg boopya hoqg korv doolar camngv 
Hoq namho ngam koo bvvpan 
Hoqg boqra nyook hv tropikel nyodo issib nyidwn 
Hoqhv ngam hog kaapama 
Hoq hwkv hog xinam doomadvn 
Hoqg filum hv meeg kaadub nyima 
Nit bemin hoqg eminv "Lolipop" hvl 
Oloq nyook v lwgta wwl kaadub nyijpa 
Hoqg lwcwbo suitar hv noqgab kaataqdo 
Oloq noosu v ngulam koofi lvgab jido 
Oloq honynam v nyibiajaqb xardo, mwv xarma i?
Hohvvpa mwnwg tuugabnam jaqkv 
Hoq ai hvvpa ngoqg Tomwn otuqjaqb kaapakuv 
Hoqhv ngam ngoqg vijaqg vs-axaqkam ywwtayin 
Hoqg dooi hv ngulug atarjaq wmam yiqmebov 
Hoqhv jvqtwjaqb noogab hengkajaqb alkimpa 
Hoqhv tacindub nyijpa, hv hvbma i?
Hoqhv hoolu luuxygab Tomwg birwqnamv 
Oloq honynam hvvpa ngoqg abwg tomswrnamv 
Hoqhv jvqtwjaqb vs-axaqjaq toxnumjago 
Hoqhv jvqtwjaqb aljaqnbo mwwlinam akgo 
Soologab hv jotvpaku  Ngo ngaadku 
Hoq hvvpa ngoqg tvnwjaqnam akv 
Hoqhvbv nyil mwv misinam pwlinum 
Hoq hvvpa tapam puutug nyiqtuqkv 
Hoqhv lwgkam ngulam otuqho nyikamaamapan 
Hoq hvbja nyimdub ngo mwwmatvn 
Hoqhv aljaqmanam nyinam ak hvvma 
Hoq hvvmapa ngoqg mwwnamv  Ngam opaqtvb 
Hoq hvvtwqpa tapam puutu hoqg nyiqtuqkv 
Hoqhv meeg loodub xinam akgo 
Hoq hvvpa aljaqb bedminsnam lamtangv 
Hoq nam hvvpa ngoqg dookv 
Hoq nyi hvvpa ngoqg nam bwyirho doonbongv 
Hoq hvb nyil kukingv jiqdkun 
Hoqg dvn hoqg nyegakovpa vcbov 
Hv aljaqpa gon ak hv jvqtwpade 
Hvvpa no kenlwg benamv 
Hoq hoopa maj-talam liikv 
Hoq hvvpa bul Tomwg svvmangam kaapakov 
Hoqgab ngo nam goonwpan 
Hoqgab no Tomwn toxdub nyipan 
Hoqhv doolar lwumgo kor xinamgo

Mwv noqg nyoodo gvvdab boonamam wwmram hvtayi 
Mwv mwnwn mwwg dookub mood meegta doomin gvlo hvl benum 
Mwv dookumho mood jaqgam haaram 
Mwv mwwg swqbwho lwwcibo ak gvnum 
Mwv ar hoqgv oyum namgob bon nyinum 
Mwv otomabayil pwkho bon nyidwn 
Mwv lwxiam Wjw aalam piisuq suqtab wwdwn 
Mwv pui xeqnamam ngoqg alaq hoqgv pul twqreqnum 
Vnyi nyiumho mwv kitap tvqumgo xeqnum 
Mwv boonam nyisam aljaqb nyil nyiyumtayin 
Mwv lwxiam hog nyisam nyicu-nyiyadvn 
Mwv vcil aal loopygob karl doonum 
Mwam kaangam jaqnbo dvn ak bosjaqdvb nyilamnum 
Mwv nyem naaknum ho kov oumgo doopakun 
Mwv lamgadvn ho nyibiajaqb bosdvn 
Mwv ngoqg benamam hog tagabma 
Soq moodso mwv vigo boon nyilama 
Hoq pagoqkam ngam mwv betompan 
Mwv yaapado, hem anio nyinam hvb nyido ho hog cengka nyika maada 
Mwnwg duumv mwnwg gorbw namgob ipaku 
Mwnwg nyij-wwjv hoq mood hoqg nyij hvb nyima

Mwnwg vj sabe namhv soqg moodso koonam vj hvb ak kam nyima namgo 
Mwnwg vj sabe namv lwcw cimo cilo lvgab potaq pomabogo

Si otuqjaq bemin bilwqnam bemin akv

Pulis isteson ho hogub nyil ngo wwclatayin?
Aado hoqgv ngo hogub nyil goqlatayin?
Hoq hvkwg nyiny-nyiyanamam hogub nyil no cwqlatayin?
Hoqhvb hogub nyil no belatayin?
Tom pulis nyiv hvl hogub no belatayin?
Hogub nyil no Tomwg pagoqkam hvdgo cengladvn?
Ham hogub nyil Tom cengnum?
Hoqhvl hogub no ngam nyiladvn?
No ngam hvb hog haakam jaqb nyil beladvn!
Vvcoqko doomab nyil hogub geqnum?
Siibjaq hogub nyil ngulv vs-axaqpak nvyu?
No hogub nyil pulis offisarub nyipan?
Hogub nyil no noqg ko bvvdam nyitwn?
Hogub nyil no hvdgo twnk doogpan?
Hogub nyil no soqg vs-axaqsam belinpan?
Hogub nyil no mwnwg lvgab cengpan?
Hogub nyil no vs-axaqkam mvyanum?
Hogub nyil no oloq nyi alam cengnum?
Tom olo dootayi hvl hogub nyil no cengnum?
Mwv nyem naapaku hvl hogub no cengnum?
Ngulam Tomwn svka koodub hogub nyil no bengumnum?
Hogub nyil no ngoqg ikyam iky dvs ham dvmdub mvnum?
Hogub nyil ngulv soqg vs-axaq soqgv lengtayinyu?
Mwnwg benamam no hogub mwwdo?
No abydo hvl hogub nyil no cengdo?
Noqg vtwr emin ham hog hvl no goqdwn?
Hogub nyil no ngam hempa mvdub mwwdwn?
Hogub nyil Tom hvdjaqgo sooriqkob nyilasupa nvyu?
Boqra nyookho hvd moodgo no dootwn?
Olo soqg terensi hvd moodgob doonutayin?
No hvd moodgob no edin dvmab dootwn?
Soq jila so hvd mood gob no dootwn?

Hvd moodgob no boon nyikydvn?
Kvn ak kam hvd swlw duurgob no boon nyidwn?
No hvd swlw duurgob no yubnwdo?
No muqjangv hvdjaqgo doodwn?

Sija hvd nyiigo emin xeqpaku?
Biiyar torgv hvdgo twnk wwdwn?
Si hvd moodgo hvraqb nyiyindo?
Noqg lvgab twnkv hvdgo doodo?
No hvd moodgob lwxiam noqg duumam hwrxaqkindo?

No olo vpub wwl pacagosla!
No hogub nyil vs-axaqkam nyitayin?

Tom mwv Meerigab lvqc ak rvdub mwwnum
Tom mwv Japan gaari ak rvdub mwwnum
Tom mwv mwwg namam cirsaq-bvraqdvb mvdub mwwnum
Tom mwv tagu aaxy hoqg wtw mvnam ak dvnwnum
Tom mwv hogub nvrl sootain ham soonyoqdub mwwnum
Tom nam hog ak kaatomdub mwwdo
Tom mwv sa sugurho yubnwnum
Tom mwv Astraliyaho poory nvnwnum
Tom mwv hospitolho boon nyinwnum
Tom mwv ngulam opisho hookur mvdub mwwnum
Tom mwv wm rwlwqdub bosynum
Tomwn baisaikel ak tubda tanum
Tom sookumko nyookwg dootamho vpub doonum
Tomwn nyiam leepnvk hvl pvtw tumnum
Tomwn iky gaqgabo ak cenum
Tom nyoroho svmci mvl dvra pool bumpwho doonum
Tom ngarabkunamam mwv hengpasuknum
Tomwn nyoro svdinv cenum
Tomwn Doony lvlaqkv ducinum
Tom mwv arobo imiqho mwam ko bvvnum
Tom mwv nyetbo imiqho mwam ko bvvnum
Tom Astraliyaho swwrobnum
Tomwn mwwg nywxw bwyirho svma liinum
Tom hog ak gab kvtaqjaqdo
Tomwg vcam dislexiya lvgab kaan num
Tomwn klas hoqg prvsidentub mvnum
Tomwn pvbiangv opaqjiknum
Tomwn mwwg poorykoho sil doodub kaapa kunum
Tom Meerin vpub kaapatvl hempnum
Tom puutuho kesil doonum
Tom kenlwg poolho Astraliyaho yenum
Tom sorwg arso mooma jaqdo
Tom geqlayil uun gvpa
Tom mwwnyirdub nyikapa
Tom hura hol layil sinkun
Tom tapamv lyuutinbanv siknum
Tomwn daaci nwwxo ak lvgab mengnum
